text: Taco Soup Brown 1 pound hamburger with 1 chopped onion and drain. Add 1/2 package dry taco seasoning, 1 can kidney beans, 1 can butter beans, 1 can tomatoes, 1 small can tomato sauce and 1 can tomato juice or V-8 juice. Simmer for 20 minutes and serve with Cheddar cheese, sour cream, crushed corn chips and chopped avocado, letting each person add their own toppings.
json: {"title": "Taco Soup", "ingredients": ["1 lb. hamburger", "1 onion, chopped", "1/2 pkg. dry taco seasoning", "1 can kidney beans", "1 can butter beans", "1 can tomatoes", "1 small can tomato sauce", "1 (12 oz.) can tomato juice or V-8 juice"], "directions": ["Brown hamburger with onion. Drain.", "Add taco seasoning. Combine meat mixture with all remaining ingredients.", "Simmer 20 minutes.", "Serve with Cheddar cheese, sour cream, crushed corn chips and chopped avocado.", "Let each person create their own. Delicious and fun!"]}

text: Frosty Pudding Cones In a bowl mix 2/3 cup sweetened condensed milk with 2 tablespoons lemon juice. Add 8 ounces fruit yogurt and mix well. Spoon mixture into 6 sugar cones, stand upright in glasses and freeze for 3 hours. Top each cone with 1 tablespoon whipped cream before serving.
json: {"title": "Frosty Pudding Cones", "ingredients": ["2/3 c. sweetened condensed milk", "2 Tbsp. lemon juice", "6 sugar cones (the hard type)", "1/2 c. whipped cream or Cool Whip", "8 oz. fruit yogurt"], "directions": ["In a mixing bowl, combine milk and lemon juice. Mix well.", "Add yogurt.", "Mix well.", "Spoon mixture into cones.", "Set upright in glasses or jars and place in freezer.", "Freeze 3 hours.", "Top each cone with 1 tablespoon whipped topping.", "Serves 6."]}

text: Easy Marinade Mix together 1/2 cup soy sauce, 1/4 cup oil, 1/4 cup red wine vinegar, 1 teaspoon oregano, 1 teaspoon basil, 1 teaspoon minced onion and 1/4 teaspoon pepper. Pour over chicken and marinate for at least 1 hour or overnight for juicier results.
json: {"title": "Easy Marinade", "ingredients": ["1/2 c. soy sauce", "1/4 c. oil", "1/4 c. red wine vinegar", "1 tsp. oregano", "1 tsp. basil", "1 tsp. minced onion", "1/4 tsp. pepper"], "directions": ["Mix all ingredients together and pour over chicken. Let set as little as 1 hour or overnight for really juicy chicken."]}

text: Pina Colada Muffins Prepare 1 box yellow cake mix according to package directions using an electric mixer. Stir in 1 teaspoon coconut flavoring, 1 teaspoon rum flavoring, 1 cup coconut, 1/2 cup chopped nuts and 1 cup drained crushed pineapple. Pour into greased or lined muffin pans and bake at 350°F for 15 to 20 minutes. Frost with cream cheese frosting if desired.
json: {"title": "Pina Colada Muffins", "ingredients": ["1 box Pillsbury yellow cake mix", "1 tsp. coconut flavoring", "1 tsp. rum flavoring", "1 c. coconut", "1/2 c. chopped nuts", "1 c. drained crushed pineapple"], "directions": ["Use electric mixer.", "Prepare cake as directed on box.", "Stir in remaining ingredients and mix 1 minute.", "Use muffin cups or grease muffin pans well.", "Preheat oven to 350°.", "Bake for 15 to 20 minutes.", "I frosted mine with cream cheese frosting."]}

text: Oriental Tossed Salad Mix together 3/4 cup sugar, 1/2 cup red wine vinegar, 1 cup oil and 3 tablespoons soy sauce. Just before serving add 2 packages crushed ramen noodles, 1 cup chopped walnuts, 1 bunch chopped green onions, 1 bunch broccoli florets and 2 packages romaine lettuce. Toss well and serve.
json: {"title": "Oriental Tossed Salad", "ingredients": ["3/4 c. sugar", "1/2 c. red wine vinegar", "1 c. oil", "3 Tbsp. soy sauce", "2 pkg. Serves 12 to 15."]}

text: Applesauce Cake Beat together 1/2 cup white sugar, 2 cups brown sugar and 1/2 cup oil. Add 2 eggs and beat again, then mix in 2 cups applesauce, 1 cup ground raisins, 2 teaspoons soda, 1/2 teaspoon salt and 2 1/2 cups flour. Stir in 1/2 cup walnuts or pecans and bake in a 13 x 18-inch pan at 350°F until done.

Add eggs and beat again. Add applesauce, raisins, salt and soda, then flour. Stir in walnuts or pecans.", "Bake in large flat pan, 13 x 18-inches, at 350°."]}

text: Mayonnaise Lightly mix 1 egg yolk, then add 1 pint oil a drop at a time until the mixture thickens, then continue adding oil slowly. Stir in juice of 1/2 lemon and 1 teaspoon honey and store refrigerated.
json: {"title": "Mayonnaise", "ingredients": ["1 pt. oil", "juice of 1/2 lemon", "1 egg yolk", "1 tsp. honey"], "directions": ["Mix egg yolk slightly.", "Add oil, 1 drop at a time, until it begins to thicken, then add slowly and steadily.", "Add lemon juice and honey.", "Store in fridge."]}

text: Shepherd’s Pie Fry 1 pound hamburger with 1/4 cup chopped onion until browned and drain. Season with 1/4 teaspoon salt and 1/8 teaspoon pepper. Spoon into a 1-quart casserole, top with 1 cup mashed potatoes, dot with butter and sprinkle with paprika. Bake at 425°F for 15 minutes.
json: {"title": "Shepherd'S Pie", "ingredients": ["1 lb. hamburg", "1/4 c. chopped onion", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/8 tsp. pepper", "1 c. mashed potatoes"], "directions": ["Fry hamburg and onion until brown.", "Drain off liquid.", "Add salt and pepper.", "Spoon into 1-quart casserole and place potatoes on top.", "Put butter and paprika over potatoes.", "Bake in a 425° oven for 15 minutes."]}

text: Fresh Apple Cake Mix together 3 cups chopped raw apples, 2 cups flour, 2 cups sugar, 1/2 cup shortening, 2 eggs, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 2 teaspoons vanilla, 1/2 teaspoon nutmeg, 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon and 1 cup chopped nuts. Bake in a greased and floured 13 x 9-inch pan at 350°F for 45 minutes.
json: {"title": "Fresh Apple Cake", "ingredients": ["3 c. chopped, raw apple", "2 c. flour", "2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. shortening (I used 1 stick oleo)", "2 eggs", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. baking soda", "2 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 tsp. nutmeg", "1/2 tsp. cinnamon", "1 c. chopped nuts"], "directions": ["Mix all ingredients together.", "Bake in a greased and floured 13 x 9-inch pan.", "Bake at 350° for 45 minutes.", "I use a tube pan."]}

text: Brown Rice Pizza (Light) Combine 1 1/2 cups cooked brown rice, 1/2 cup shredded part-skim mozzarella, 1 beaten egg and 1/2 teaspoon oregano. Press into a Pam-sprayed 12-inch pizza pan and bake at 400°F for 25 minutes. Sauté 1 cup broccoli florets, 1 cup sliced zucchini, 1 cup sliced mushrooms and 1 small sliced onion in a Pam-coated skillet until tender. Mix 8 ounces tomato sauce with remaining oregano, spread over crust, top with vegetables and remaining 1 cup cheese and bake 10 minutes until heated through and cheese melts.
json: {"title": "Brown Rice Pizza(Light)", "ingredients": ["1 1/2 c. cooked brown rice (without salt or fat)", "1 1/2 c. (6 oz.) shredded part skim milk Mozzarella cheese, divided", "1 egg, beaten (I use Second Nature)", "1 tsp. oregano, divided", "Pam", "1 c. broccoli flowerets", "1 c. sliced zucchini", "1 c. sliced fresh mushrooms", "1 small onion, sliced", "8 oz. can tomato sauce (no salt)"], "directions": ["Combine rice, 1/2 cup cheese and 1/2 teaspoon oregano in a medium bowl.", "Stir well.", "Press mixture evenly into a 12-inch pizza pan coated with Pam.", "Bake at 400° for 25 minutes.", "Coat a large nonstick skillet with Pam.", "Place over medium-high heat until hot.", "Add broccoli, zucchini, mushrooms and onion.", "Saute until tender.", "Combine tomato sauce and remaining oregano.", "Spread evenly over baked crust.", "Top with sauteed vegetable mixture. Sprinkle with remaining 1 cup cheese.", "Bake at 400° for 10 minutes or until pizza is thoroughly heated and cheese is melted.", "Yields 4 servings (255 calories each)."]}

text: Creamy Shells With Broccoli And Ham Cook 1 (1 lb.) box medium macaroni shells according to package directions. Sauté 1 crushed garlic clove, 1/2 lb. cooked ham cut into cubes and 1 (10 oz.) package frozen broccoli, thawed and cut, in 1/2 cup margarine for about 5 minutes until broccoli is tender. Stir in 1 cup heavy cream and cook 3 minutes, then add 1 cup grated Parmesan cheese and cook on low heat until melted. Drain shells and toss with sauce before serving.
json: {"title": "Creamy Shells With Broccoli And Ham", "ingredients": ["1 (1 lb.) box medium size macaroni shells", "1/2 lb. cooked ham", "1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen broccoli, thawed", "1 clove garlic, crushed", "1/2 c. margarine", "1 c. heavy cream", "1 c. grated Parmesan cheese"], "directions": ["Cook shells according to package directions.", "Slice or cube ham; cut broccoli into 1/2-inch pieces.", "Saute garlic, ham and broccoli in margarine in a large skillet until broccoli is crisp and tender (approximately 5 minutes).", "Stir in cream.", "Cook over medium heat 3 minutes.", "Stir in cheese.", "Lower heat and cook, stirring often, until cheese is melted.", "Drain shells and toss with sauce.", "Serve."]}

text: Chicken Over Rice Boil 1 chopped onion, 2 chopped bell peppers, 1/2 bunch celery, 2 chopped potatoes and 1 can chicken broth until tender, seasoning lightly with soy sauce and thickening with a small amount of cornstarch if desired. Serve hot over cooked rice.
json: {"title": "Chicken Over Rice", "ingredients": ["1 chopped onion", "2 chopped bell peppers", "1/2 bunch celery", "1 can chicken broth", "2 chopped potatoes", "little soy sauce and cornstarch"], "directions": ["Boil all ingredients until tender.", "Serve over rice."]}

text: Meatball Chop Suey Mix 2 lb. ground beef with 1/2 cup bread crumbs, 1 cup milk, 2/3 cup chopped onion, 1 egg, 1 tsp. salt and 1/8 tsp. pepper, shape into about 24 meatballs and brown in 3 Tbsp. lard or drippings. Dissolve 2 beef bouillon cubes in 3 cups hot water and add to meatballs with remaining onion, 1/4 cup soy sauce and 2 cups celery strips, simmer 15 minutes. Remove meatballs, thicken sauce with 3 Tbsp. cornstarch mixed with 2 Tbsp. cold water, add 2 cups bean sprouts and 1 cup mushroom stems and serve with meatballs over rice or chow mein noodles.
json: {"title": "Meatball Chop Suey", "ingredients": ["2 lb. ground beef", "1/2 c. bread crumbs", "1 c. milk", "2/3 c. onion, chopped", "1 egg", "1 tsp. salt", "1/8 tsp. pepper", "3 Tbsp. lard or drippings", "2 beef bouillon cubes", "3 c. hot water", "1/4 c. soy sauce", "2 c. celery, cut in 1/2-inch strips", "3 Tbsp. cornstarch", "2 Tbsp. cold water", "2 c. bean sprouts, drained", "1 c. mushroom stems (4 oz.)", "cooked rice or chow mein noodles"], "directions": ["Mix ground beef, bread crumbs, milk, 2 tablespoons onion, egg, salt and pepper.", "Shape into 24 meatballs and brown in lard or drippings.", "Pour off drippings.", "Dissolve bouillon cubes in hot water; add bouillon, remaining onion, soy sauce and celery to meatballs.", "Cover tightly and cook slowly for 15 minutes.", "Remove meatballs."]}

text: Vegetable Beef Soup Place 1 lb. cooked and drained ground beef, 1 large can whole tomatoes, 1 can tomato soup and 1 chopped small onion in crock-pot. Add 2 cups water, 1 package frozen mixed vegetables, 1 cup cooked diced potatoes, 1 cup diced celery, 1/4 tsp. salt and 1/4 tsp. pepper. Stir well and cook on low 4 to 6 hours.
json: {"title": "Vegetable Beef Soup", "ingredients": ["1 lb. ground beef, cooked and drained", "1 large can tomatoes (whole)", "1 can tomato soup", "1 small onion, chopped", "2 c. water", "1 pkg. frozen mixed vegetables", "1 c. potatoes, cut up and cooked until tender", "1 c. diced celery", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. pepper"], "directions": ["Add beef, tomatoes, soup and onion in crock-pot.", "Add water, frozen vegetables, potatoes and celery.", "Add salt and pepper and other spices of preference.", "Stir well.", "Cook at lowest setting for 4 to 6 hours."]}

text: Hawaiian Marshmallow Pie Microwave 24 large marshmallows or 3 cups miniature marshmallows with 1/2 cup reserved pineapple liquid until smooth, stirring halfway. Chill 30 minutes, then fold in 2 cans (8 oz. each) drained crushed pineapple and 2 cups thawed Cool Whip. Pour into 1 prepared 6 oz. graham cracker crust and refrigerate several hours or overnight.
json: {"title": "Hawaiian Marshmallow Pie", "ingredients": ["24 Kraft jet-puffed marshmallows or 3 c. Kraft miniature marshmallows", "2 cans (8 oz. each) crushed pineapple, drained, reserving 1/2 c. liquid", "2 c. thawed Cool Whip nondairy whipped topping", "1 prepared graham cracker crumb crust (6 oz.)"], "directions": ["Microwave marshmallows and reserved 1/2 cup pineapple liquid in large microwave safe bowl on High 2 to 2 1/2 minutes, or until smooth when stirred, stirring halfway through heating time. Refrigerate 30 minutes or until slightly thickened; mix until well blended.", "Fold in pineapple and whipped topping.", "Pour into crust. Refrigerate several hours or overnight.", "Garnish with pineapple chunks and maraschino cherries.", "Makes 6 servings."]}

text: Sugar-Free Sweet-N-Sour Stir-Fry Heat 1 tsp. vegetable oil in skillet and cook 2 stalks sliced celery, 1 head shredded cabbage, 3 sliced carrots, 1 chopped onion and 2 sliced zucchini for 2 minutes, then add 1/2 cup water chestnuts and 1/4 cup chopped green pepper. Cook until crisp-tender and stir in prepared sugar-free sweet-and-sour sauce.
json: {"title": "Sugar-Free Sweet-N-Sour Stir-Fry", "ingredients": ["1 tsp. vegetable oil", "2 stalks celery, sliced diagonally", "1 head cabbage, shredded", "1/2 c. water chestnuts", "1 recipe Sweet-N-Sour Sauce", "3 carrots, sliced diagonally", "1 chopped onion", "2 zucchini, sliced", "1/4 c. green pepper, chopped"], "directions": ["Cook vegetables 2 minutes and add water chestnuts and green pepper.", "Cook until crisp and add Sweet-N-Sour Sauce."]}

text: Graham Cracker Bars Preheat oven to 350°F and grease pan. Line bottom with graham crackers. Melt together 1 stick butter and 1 stick margarine, add 1/2 cup sugar and boil 2 minutes, remove from heat, stir in chopped pecans to taste, pour over crackers and bake 6 minutes on bottom rack.
json: {"title": "Graham Cracker Bars", "ingredients": ["Graham crackers", "1 stick of margarine", "1 stick of butter", "1/2 c sugar", "pecans"], "directions": ["Preheat oven to 350°.", "Grease pan.", "Divide graham crackers into smallest part and put into bottom of pan.", "Melt together the butter and margarine.", "Add 1/2 c sugar boil for 2 minutes.", "Remove from heat add pecans (as many as desired).", "Mix and pour over graham crackers.", "Bake for 6 minutes on the bottom rack."]}

text: Red Cabbage Sauté 1 chopped onion in 3 Tbsp. bacon drippings or olive oil until tender. Add 1 large shredded red cabbage and sauté 10 minutes, then add 2 chopped cooking apples, 1/2 cup wine vinegar, 1 Tbsp. sugar and 1 tsp. salt. Cover and simmer 2 hours, stir occasionally, add 1/2 jar currant jelly and simmer 30 minutes more.
json: {"title": "Red Cabbage", "ingredients": ["3 Tbsp. bacon drippings or olive oil", "1 onion, chopped", "1 large red cabbage, shredded", "2 cooking apples, chopped", "1/2 c. wine vinegar", "1 Tbsp. sugar", "1 tsp. salt", "1/2 jar currant jelly"], "directions": ["Saute the onion in the bacon drippings or olive oil until tender.", "Add the cabbage and saute 10 minutes.", "Add the apples, wine vinegar, sugar and salt.", "Simmer, covered, 2 hours.", "Stir and check for burning.", "Add the jelly and simmer 1/2 hour more."]}

text: Ambrosia Salad Drain 1 can chunk pineapple, 1 can mandarin oranges and 1 small jar maraschino cherries, combine with 1 container sour cream, 1 small package miniature marshmallows and 1 can flaked coconut, mix well and refrigerate before serving.
json: {"title": "Ambrosia Salad", "ingredients": ["1 can chunk pineapple", "1 can mandarin oranges", "1 small jar maraschino cherries", "1 container sour cream", "1 small pkg. miniature marshmallows", "1 can flaked coconut"], "directions": ["Drain pineapple, oranges and cherries, put in bowl and mix all ingredients together.", "Put in refrigerator."]}

text: Sour Cream Pound Cake Cream together 3 cups sugar, 2 sticks margarine and 1/4 cup Crisco. Add 6 eggs one at a time, beating on low speed. Mix in 3 cups sifted cake flour, 8 oz. sour cream and 1 tsp. vanilla and bake at 325°F for about 1 hour and 15 minutes.
json: {"title": "Sour Cream Pound Cake", "ingredients": ["3 c. sugar", "2 sticks margarine", "1/4 c. Crisco", "6 eggs", "3 c. sifted cake flour", "8 oz. sour cream", "1 tsp. vanilla flavoring"], "directions": ["Mix sugar, margarine and Crisco.", "Add eggs, one at a time. Beat on low.", "Add flour, sour cream and vanilla.", "Bake at 325° for about 1 hour and 15 minutes."]}

text: Soft Delicious Pumpkin Bars Mix together 2 cups flour, 2 tsp. baking powder, 1 tsp. soda, 1/2 tsp. salt, 2 tsp. cinnamon, 2 cups sugar, 1 cup oil, 4 eggs, 2 cups pumpkin and 1 cup nuts. Pour into pan and bake at 350°F for 25 to 30 minutes.
json: {"title": "Soft Delicious Pumpkin Bars", "ingredients": ["2 c. flour", "2 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 tsp. cinnamon", "4 eggs", "1 c. nuts", "2 c. pumpkin", "1 tsp. soda", "2 c. sugar", "1 c. oil"], "directions": ["Bake at 350° for 25 to 30 minutes."]}

text: Barbecue Sauce Combine 1 can tomato sauce, 1/4 cup brown sugar, 1/4 cup vinegar, 1/2 cup minced onion, salt and pepper to taste and 1 tsp. garlic powder. Simmer over medium heat 5 to 8 minutes.
json: {"title": "Barbecue Sauce", "ingredients": ["1 can tomato sauce", "1/4 c. brown sugar", "1/4 c. vinegar", "1/2 c. minced onion", "salt and pepper to taste", "1 tsp. garlic powder"], "directions": ["Combine tomato sauce, brown sugar, vinegar, onion, salt, pepper and garlic powder.", "Simmer on medium heat 5 to 8 minutes."]}

text: Sausage Strata Arrange 6 slices crustless bread in greased 10 x 6-inch dish. Brown and drain 1 1/2 lb. sausage and spoon over bread, sprinkle with 1 cup grated Swiss cheese. Mix 4 beaten eggs with 1 1/2 cups milk, 3/4 cup light cream, 1/2 tsp. salt, a dash of pepper, a dash of nutmeg and 1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce, pour over all and bake at 350°F for 25 to 30 minutes.
json: {"title": "Sausage Strata", "ingredients": ["6 slices bread (crusts removed)", "1 1/2 lb. sausage", "1 c. Swiss cheese, grated", "4 eggs, slightly beaten", "1 1/2 c. milk", "3/4 c. light cream", "1/2 tsp. salt", "dash of pepper", "dash of nutmeg", "1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce"], "directions": ["Arrange bread in bottom of greased baking dish (10 x 6-inch). Brown sausage and drain off fat.", "Spoon sausage evenly over bread. Sprinkle with cheese.", "Combine remaining ingredients and pour over all.", "Bake at 350° for 25 to 30 minutes.", "Can be made ahead and refrigerated until needed.", "If so, bake for 30 to 35 minutes."]}

text: Pepperoni Spaghetti Cook 1 chopped large onion, 1 chopped green pepper, 1 lb. ground beef and 1 (3 oz.) package chopped pepperoni until beef is browned. Add 1 (32 oz.) jar spaghetti sauce with mushrooms and simmer 20 minutes. Serve over cooked 12 oz. spaghetti and top with 1 cup shredded mozzarella and 1 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese.
json: {"title": "Pepperoni Spaghetti", "ingredients": ["1 large onion, chopped", "1 green pepper, chopped", "1 lb. ground beef", "1 (3 oz.) pkg. sliced pepperoni, chopped", "1 (32 oz.) jar spaghetti sauce with mushrooms", "1 (12 oz.) pkg. spaghetti", "1 c. (4 oz.) shredded Mozzarella cheese", "1 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese"], "directions": ["Combine onion, green pepper, ground beef and pepperoni in a large skillet.", "Cook over medium heat until beef browns, stirring to crumble.", "Add spaghetti sauce and bring to a boil.", "Cover, reduce heat and simmer 20 minutes, stirring occasionally."]}

text: Florida Punch Bring 1 cup sugar and 2 cups water to a boil until sugar dissolves. Add 4 cups cranberry juice, 4 cups pineapple juice and 2 cups orange juice, chill and add 1 quart ginger ale just before serving.
json: {"title": "Florida Punch", "ingredients": ["1 c. sugar", "2 c. water", "4 c. cranberry juice", "4 c. pineapple juice", "2 c. orange juice", "1 qt. ginger ale"], "directions": ["Bring to a boil the sugar and water until sugar is dissolved. Add cranberry, pineapple and orange juices.", "When ready to serve, add ginger ale."]}

text: “Peachy” Cake Beat 4 eggs, then add 3 cups flour, 1 cup oil, 3 tsp. vanilla, 2 cups sugar, 3 tsp. baking powder and 1/2 cup peach juice, beat until creamy. Layer batter and 1 (20–29 oz.) can drained sliced peaches with sugar and cinnamon in greased tube pan and bake at 350°F for 1 to 1 1/2 hours.
json: {"title": "\"Peachy\" Cake", "ingredients": ["3 c. flour", "1 c. oil", "4 eggs", "3 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. sugar", "3 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 c. peach juice from can", "1 (20 or 29 oz.) can sliced peaches"], "directions": ["Beat eggs.", "Then add flour, oil, vanilla, sugar, baking powder and juice.", "Beat at medium speed until creamy.", "Grease and flour or spray with \"Pam\" a 10-inch tubular pan.", "Pour 1/2 batter; line with sliced peaches (drained), 1/2 can.", "Sprinkle sugar and cinnamon.", "Pour remaining batter.", "Line with remaining sliced peaches; sprinkle with sugar and cinnamon.", "Bake at 350° for 1 to 1 1/2 hours, until \"tester\" comes out of cake dry.", "(I use a long knife.) Enjoy!"]}

text: Fruity Ice Blend 2 peeled oranges, 2 peeled bananas, 2 cups crushed ice, 2 cups unsweetened applesauce and 1/2 tsp. cinnamon until smooth.
json: {"title": "Fruity Ice", "ingredients": ["2 peeled oranges", "2 peeled bananas", "2 c. crushed ice", "2 c. applesauce, unsweetened", "1/2 tsp. cinnamon"], "directions": ["Mix ingredients in blender, adding ice slowly."]}

text: Five Way Chili Lightly brown 2 lb. ground beef, add 3 cups water, 1 (15 oz.) can tomato sauce, 2 bay leaves, 1/2 tsp. salt, 2 tsp. cumin, 1 tsp. cinnamon, 1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce, 1 1/2 tsp. vinegar, 1 1/2 tsp. allspice and 2 Tbsp. chili powder and simmer uncovered 3 hours.
json: {"title": "Five Way Chili", "ingredients": ["2 lb. ground beef", "3 c. water", "1 (15 oz.) can tomato sauce", "2 bay leaves", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 tsp. ground cumin", "1 tsp. ground cinnamon", "1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1 1/2 tsp. vinegar", "1 1/2 tsp. ground allspice", "2 Tbsp. chili powder"], "directions": ["Lightly brown beef. Add water and mix. Add all other ingredients. Simmer, uncovered, 3 hours. Stir occasionally or cook in crock-pot."]}

text: Hot Tomatoes And Cucumbers Sauté 2 sliced cucumbers and 1 sliced onion in 2 Tbsp. butter for 5 minutes, add 4 tomato wedges, season with 1/2 tsp. salt and dash of pepper, heat briefly and sprinkle with 1 Tbsp. fresh dill.
json: {"title": "Hot Tomatoes And Cucumbers", "ingredients": ["2 medium cucumbers, cut into 1-inch pieces", "1 medium onion, sliced and separated into rings", "2 Tbsp. butter or margarine", "4 medium tomatoes, cut in wedges", "1/2 tsp. salt", "dash of pepper", "1 Tbsp. fresh dill or 1 tsp. dried dill"], "directions": ["Cook and stir cucumbers and onion in butter or margarine in a skillet for about 5 minutes. Stir in tomatoes.", "Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Cook until tomatoes are just heated through. Sprinkle with dill and serve hot."]}

text: Fluffy White Icing Beat together 2 cups powdered sugar, 2 Tbsp. flour, 1 egg white, 1/2 cup Crisco, 1 Tbsp. butter and 1 tsp. vanilla, then slowly beat in 2 Tbsp. milk until fluffy.
json: {"title": "Fluffy White Icing", "ingredients": ["2 c. 10x sugar", "2 Tbsp. flour", "1 egg white", "1/2 c. Crisco", "1 Tbsp. butter", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 Tbsp. milk"], "directions": ["Mix all ingredients together, except milk.", "Beat at high speed; slowly add milk."]}

text: Dishpan Cookies Cream 2 cups brown sugar, 2 cups granulated sugar, 2 cups oil and 4 eggs, add 1/4 tsp. baking powder, 1 tsp. salt, 4 cups flour and 1 1/2 cups oats, then mix in 2 cups coconut, 4 cups corn flakes, 6 oz. chocolate chips and 1 cup nuts. Drop on sheets and bake at 325°F for 10–12 minutes.
json: {"title": "Dishpan Cookies", "ingredients": ["2 c. brown sugar", "2 c. granulated sugar", "2 c. oil", "4 eggs", "1/4 tsp. baking powder", "1 tsp. salt", "4 c. flour", "1 1/2 c. quick cooking oats", "2 c. coconut", "4 c. corn flakes, not crushed", "6 oz. chocolate chips", "1 c. nuts (optional)"], "directions": ["Cream together the sugars, oil and eggs.", "Add baking powder, salt, flour and oats; mix well.", "Then add coconut, corn flakes, chocolate chips and nuts (optional).", "Mix well.", "Drop on cookie sheet.", "Bake 10 to 12 minutes at 325°.", "This takes a very large bowl to mix in."]}

text: Toll House Pie Beat 2 eggs until foamy, add 1/2 cup flour, 1/2 cup sugar and 1/2 cup brown sugar, blend in 1 cup melted butter, stir in 6 oz. chocolate chips and 1 cup walnuts, pour into 9-inch pie shell and bake at 325°F for 1 hour.
json: {"title": "Toll House Pie", "ingredients": ["2 eggs", "1/2 c. all-purpose flour", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. packed brown sugar", "1 c. butter, melted and cooled", "6 oz. chocolate chips", "1 c. chopped walnuts", "1 (9-inch) unbaked pie shell", "whipped cream or ice cream"], "directions": ["Preheat oven to 325°.", "In large bowl, beat eggs until foamy. Add flour, sugar and brown sugar.", "Beat until well blended.", "Blend in melted butter.", "Stir in chocolate chips and walnuts.", "Pour into pie shell.", "Bake for 1 hour.", "Serve warm with whipped cream or ice cream."]}

text: Crunchy Onion Burger Mix 1 1/2 lb. ground beef with 2/3 cup French fried onions, 3/4 tsp. salt and 1/4 tsp. pepper, shape into 6 patties and grill or broil until done, serving on rolls topped with remaining onions.
json: {"title": "Crunchy  Onion Burger", "ingredients": ["1 1/2 lb. ground beef", "1 1/3 c. (2.8 oz. can) French fried onions or fried onion rings", "3/4 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. salt", "6 rolls"], "directions": ["Mix beef, 2/3 cup French fried onions and seasonings; shape into 6 burgers.", "Grill or broil 10 minutes or until no longer pink in center, turning twice.", "Serve on rolls and top with 2/3 cup onions.", "Makes 6 servings."]}

text: Cheese Ball Mix 16 oz. softened cream cheese, 1 1/2 lb. grated Cheddar, 1 tsp. lemon juice, 2 tsp. grated onion, 1 tsp. dry mustard, 1 tsp. soy sauce, 1/2 tsp. paprika, 1/2 tsp. salt and 2 Tbsp. parsley. Chill, shape into ball, roll in chopped pecans and refrigerate overnight.
json: {"title": "Cheese Ball", "ingredients": ["16 oz. cream cheese, softened", "1 1/2 lb. Cheddar cheese, grated", "1 tsp. lemon juice", "2 tsp. grated onion", "1 tsp. dry mustard", "1 tsp. soy sauce", "1/2 tsp. paprika", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 Tbsp. parsley"], "directions": ["Combine all ingredients in a large bowl.", "Mix at low speed until well blended.", "Chill until firm.", "Shape into ball and roll in chopped pecans.", "Wrap in foil and refrigerate overnight."]}

text: Pumpkin Squares Combine 1 cup flour, 1/2 cup oats, 1/2 cup brown sugar and 1/2 cup butter, press into 13 x 9-inch pan and bake 15 minutes at 350°F. Mix 1 can pumpkin, 1 can evaporated milk, 2 eggs, 3/4 cup sugar, 1 tsp. cinnamon, 1/2 tsp. ginger and 1/4 tsp. cloves, pour over crust and bake 20 minutes. Top with mixture of 1/2 cup nuts, 1/2 cup brown sugar and 2 Tbsp. butter and bake 15–20 minutes more.
json: {"title": "Pumpkin Squares", "ingredients": ["1 c. flour", "1/2 c. quick oats", "1/2 c. brown sugar", "1/2 c. margarine", "1 (1 lb.) can pumpkin", "1 (13 1/2 oz.) evaporated milk", "2 eggs", "3/4 c. sugar", "1 tsp. cinnamon", "1/2 tsp. ginger", "1/4 tsp. cloves", "1/2 c. walnuts", "1/2 c. brown sugar", "2 Tbsp. butter"], "directions": ["Combine flour, oats, 1/2 cup brown sugar and 1/2 cup butter in bowl.", "Mix until crumbly.", "Press into greased 13 x 9-inch pan. Bake at 350° for 15 minutes.", "Combine pumpkin, evaporated milk, eggs, sugar and spices in mixing bowl.", "Beat well.", "Pour into crust.", "Bake at 350° for 20 minutes.", "Combine nuts, brown sugar and butter.", "Sprinkle on top.", "Bake for 15 to 20 minutes until filling is set."]}

text: Old Time Buttermilk Pie Cream 1/2 cup butter and 2 cups sugar, beat in 3 rounded tsp. flour and 3 eggs, stir in 1 cup buttermilk, 1 tsp. vanilla and dash nutmeg, pour into 9-inch unbaked shell and bake at 350°F for 45–50 minutes.
json: {"title": "Old Time Buttermilk Pie", "ingredients": ["9 inch unbaked pie shell", "1/2 c. butter", "2 c. sugar", "3 tsp. flour, rounded", "3 eggs", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "dash of nutmeg (optional)"], "directions": ["Soften butter and add sugar; cream together. Add flour and eggs; beat well. Stir in buttermilk, vanilla, and nutmeg. Pour into unbaked pie shell. Bake for 45 to 50 minutes at 350°. Place on wire rack to cool before serving."]}

text: Two Sweet Potato Pies Boil and mash 4 large sweet potatoes, mix with 3 eggs, 1 cup sugar, 1 tsp. vanilla and 3/4 cup milk, pour into 9-inch pastry shell and bake at 350°F for 30 minutes, rest 15 minutes before serving.
json: {"title": "Two Sweet Potato Pies", "ingredients": ["4 large potatoes", "3 eggs", "1 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "3/4 c. milk", "grated coconut (optional)", "1 (9-inch) pastry shell"], "directions": ["Boil sweet potatoes; peel and mash.", "Beat eggs and combine with potatoes, sugar and vanilla.", "Stir all together and pour into pastry shell.", "Bake at 350° for 30 minutes.", "Let set 15 minutes before serving."]}

text: Broccoli-Cauliflower Soup Cook 1 lb. broccoli and 1 lb. cauliflower in broth until tender. Sauté 1 diced onion in 1/2 cup butter, add 1/2 cup flour, slowly stir in 1 quart milk and cook gently until thick, combine with vegetables and serve with 1 cup grated sharp Cheddar and black pepper.
json: {"title": "Broccoli-Cauliflower Soup", "ingredients": ["1 lb. broccoli", "1 lb. cauliflower", "chicken broth, water or bouillon", "1/2 c. butter", "1 small onion, diced", "1/2 c. flour", "1 qt. milk", "1 c. grated sharp Cheddar cheese", "black pepper"], "directions": ["Cut vegetables into small pieces, discarding any of the stem too tough to poke with a fingernail. Barely cover with broth and slowly cook until tender. In another pan, saut onion in butter or margarine on medium heat.", "Add flour to make a roux; slowly add flour, stirring constantly to thicken and prevent lumping. Slowly add milk while stirring constantly. Lower heat and cook 45 minutes; continue stirring occasionally. Serve with grated cheese and pepper."]}

text: Fresh Apple Cake Mix 1 1/2 cups oil, 2 cups sugar, 2 beaten eggs, 3 cups chopped apples, 3 cups cake flour, 1 tsp. salt, 1 tsp. soda and 2 tsp. vanilla and bake in three 9-inch pans at 325°F for 25–30 minutes.
json: {"title": "Fresh Apple Cake", "ingredients": ["1 1/2 c. Wesson oil", "2 c. sugar", "2 eggs, beaten", "3 c. peeled, chopped fresh apples", "3 c. sifted cake flour", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. soda", "2 tsp. vanilla"], "directions": ["Mix.", "Bake", "in\tthree", "9-inch pans at 325° for 25 to 30 minutes or until done."]}

text: Russian Tea Mix 1 cup Tang, 1 cup sugar, 1/2 cup instant tea with lemon, 1/2 tsp. cloves and 1/2 tsp. cinnamon and use 1 heaping tablespoon per cup of hot water.
json: {"title": "Russian Tea", "ingredients": ["1 c. Tang", "1 c. sugar", "1/2 c. instant tea with lemon", "1/2 tsp. cloves", "1/2 tsp. cinnamon"], "directions": ["Mix all ingredients.", "Use 1 tablespoon (heaping) per cup of water."]}

text: Hunter’s Delight Melt 1 Tbsp. butter, sauté 1 Tbsp. onion, add 1 1/2 lb. ground beef, 2 tsp. salt and 1/4 tsp. pepper and brown. Stir in 1 (20 oz.) can cream-style corn and 1/2 cup milk, pour over 1 quart sliced potatoes in casserole and bake uncovered at 375°F for about 1 1/2 hours.
json: {"title": "Hunter'S Delight", "ingredients": ["1 Tbsp. butter", "1 Tbsp. onion", "1 1/2 lb. ground beef", "2 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. pepper", "1 (20 oz.) can cream-style corn", "1/2 c. milk", "1 qt. sliced pared potatoes"], "directions": ["Melt butter in skillet.", "Add onion and cook 5 minutes.", "Add meat and seasonings.", "Cook until browned.", "Add corn and milk.", "Put potatoes in a 2-quart casserole; cover with meat mixture.", "Bake, uncovered, in a 375° oven for about 1 1/2 hours.", "Yield:", "6 servings."]}

text: Pie Crust (Never Fail) Cut 1 1/4 cups shortening into 3 cups flour and 1 tsp. salt, mix 1 beaten egg with 5 Tbsp. water and 1 Tbsp. vinegar, add to flour mixture, blend just until moistened and bake at 450°F for 10 minutes.
json: {"title": "Pie Crust(\"Never Fail\")", "ingredients": ["3 c. flour", "1 1/4 c. shortening", "1 tsp. salt", "1 egg, well beaten", "5 Tbsp. water", "1 Tbsp. vinegar"], "directions": ["Cut shortening into flour and salt.", "Combine egg, water and vinegar.", "Pour liquid into flour mixture all at once.", "Blend with spoon, just until flour mixture is all moistened.", "This is an easy crust to handle and can be re-rolled without toughening.", "Bake at 450° for 10 minutes."]}

text: Burnt Caramel Cake Icing Heat 2 cups sugar, 3/4 cup milk and 1 Tbsp. white Karo syrup in saucepan, caramelize 1/2 cup sugar separately with water, combine and cook to soft-ball stage, beat until spreadable, adding butter and flavoring if desired.
json: {"title": "Burnt Caramel Cake Icing", "ingredients": ["2 c. sugar", "3/4 c. milk", "1 Tbsp. white Karo syrup", "1/2 c. sugar"], "directions": ["Put 2 cups sugar and milk in a saucepan.", "Add syrup.", "Put the 1/2 cup sugar in a small skillet and pour enough water over it to moisten good.", "Turn on low heat under saucepan.", "While it is heating, brown the sugar in the skillet.", "When brown, pour it into the saucepan.", "Cook until soft ball forms in cold water.", "Remove from stove and beat until ready to spread on the cake.", "Add butter, the size of a walnut, and flavoring."]}

text: Chicken Sweet-Sour Place cut-up chicken in baking dish, mix 1 jar apricot preserves, 1 bottle Catalina dressing and 1 envelope dry onion soup and pour over chicken, bake at 350°F for 1 1/2 hours.
json: {"title": "Chicken Sweet-Sour", "ingredients": ["cut up chicken", "1 jar apricot preserves", "1 bottle Catalina salad dressing", "1 envelope Lipton onion soup (dry)"], "directions": ["Mix ingredients; pour over chicken.", "Bake for 1 1/2 hours at 350°."]}

text: Microwave Fudge Microwave 2 cups semi-sweet chocolate chips, 1 cup sweet chocolate chips and 1 can condensed milk for 3 minutes, stir in 1 1/2 tsp. vanilla and optional nuts and pour into pan.
json: {"title": "Microwave Fudge", "ingredients": ["2 c. semi-sweet chocolate chips", "1 c. sweet chocolate chips", "1 can sweetened condensed milk", "1 1/2 tsp. vanilla", "nuts (optional)"], "directions": ["Stir and microwave first 3 ingredients for 3 minutes.", "Stir in vanilla and nuts.", "Put into pan."]}

text: Breakfast Rolls Place 1/2 cup chopped nuts in greased Bundt pan, top with 1 bag frozen dinner rolls, sprinkle with 1 (3 5/8 oz.) package butterscotch pudding, boil 1/2 cup butter, 3/4 cup brown sugar and 3/4 tsp. cinnamon and pour over, rest overnight and bake at 350°F for 30 minutes.
json: {"title": "Breakfast Rolls", "ingredients": ["1 bag frozen dinner rolls", "1 (3 5/8 oz.) pkg. butterscotch pudding (not instant)", "1/2 c. butter", "3/4 tsp. cinnamon", "3/4 c. brown sugar", "1/2 c. chopped nuts"], "directions": ["Place nuts in bottom of greased Bundt pan.", "Arrange rolls on top.", "Sprinkle dry pudding over rolls.", "Cook butter, sugar and cinnamon over low heat until sugar is dissolved and mixture bubbles; pour over rolls.", "Cover tightly with foil and let stand on counter overnight.", "Next morning, bake at 350° for 30 minutes (take foil off before baking).", "Let stand 5 minutes, then invert onto serving dish."]}

text: Kentucky Cream Candy Beat 8 oz. cream cheese with 1/4 tsp. salt and 1 tsp. vanilla, gradually add 6 cups confectioners sugar, chill, shape into balls and roll in coconut.
json: {"title": "Kentucky Cream Candy", "ingredients": ["1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla", "6 c. confectioners sugar", "finely chopped coconut"], "directions": ["Put cream cheese in mixer bowl 30 minutes to soften.", "Add salt and vanilla.", "Add 2 cups sugar; beat.", "Add 2 more cups of sugar; beat.", "Add remaining sugar and beat well.", "Cover and chill in refrigerator until firm.", "Shape into small balls and roll in coconut.", "Store in a foil-lined metal box in refrigerator."]}

text: Thousand Island Dressing Mix 4 cups Miracle Whip, 1 can tomato soup, 1 Tbsp. vinegar, 4 Tbsp. sweet relish, 2 Tbsp. chili sauce, 1 Tbsp. sugar, 1 Tbsp. dry mustard, 1 grated onion and 1 grated garlic clove.
json: {"title": "Thousand Island Dressing", "ingredients": ["4 c. Miracle Whip", "1 can tomato soup", "1 Tbsp. vinegar", "4 Tbsp. sweet relish", "2 Tbsp. chili sauce", "1 Tbsp. sugar", "1 Tbsp. dry mustard", "1 small grated onion", "1 clove grated garlic"], "directions": ["Mix all ingredients together.", "Makes 1 1/2 quarts."]}

text: Rolls Scald 1 cup milk with 1 stick butter, cool slightly, add 1/3 cup sugar and 1 tsp. salt, then 2 eggs, dissolved yeast cake and 4 1/2 cups flour, mix, refrigerate overnight, shape and bake.
json: {"title": "Rolls", "ingredients": ["1 c. milk", "1 stick butter", "1 yeast cake, dissolved in 1/4 c. warm water", "1/3 c. sugar", "1 tsp. salt", "2 eggs", "4 1/2 c. sifted flour"], "directions": ["Scald milk with butter.", "Pour into large mixing bowl.", "Add sugar and salt.", "Let cool.", "Add eggs (unbeaten), yeast cake and 1 1/2 cups flour.", "Mix well for two minutes.", "Stir remaining flour. Put in icebox and let rise overnight.", "Make rolls at least two hours before cooking."]}

text: Brownies Mix 1 1/2 cups white sugar, 1 1/2 cups brown sugar, 4 Tbsp. cocoa, 2 cups flour, 6 eggs, 1 1/2 sticks melted oleo, 1/2 cup milk, 1 tsp. vanilla, 1/4 tsp. salt and 1/2 cup nuts, bake at 350°F for 23 minutes.
json: {"title": "Brownies", "ingredients": ["1 1/2 c. white sugar", "1 1/2 c. brown sugar", "4 Tbsp. cocoa", "2 c. flour", "6 eggs", "1 1/2 sticks oleo, melted", "1/2 c. milk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. nuts"], "directions": ["Mix all ingredients together; add nuts.", "Pour into a greased and floured cookie sheet.", "Bake only 23 minutes in a 350° oven. Cool and frost."]}

text: Diabetic Cookies Mix 1 1/2 cups unsweetened applesauce, 3/4 cup margarine, 2 eggs, 1 Tbsp. vanilla and 1/3 cup brown Sugar Twin, add 2 cups oatmeal, 1 1/2 cups flour, 1 1/2 tsp. soda, 1/2 tsp. salt, 1 Tbsp. cinnamon, 1/2 tsp. allspice, 1 cup raisins and 1/4 cup nuts and bake at 375°F for 15 minutes.
json: {"title": "Diabetic Cookies", "ingredients": ["1 1/2 c. unsweetened applesauce", "3/4 c. margarine", "1 Tbsp. vanilla", "2 c. oatmeal", "1/2 tsp. allspice", "1 1/2 tsp. soda", "1 c. raisins", "2 eggs", "1/3 c. brown Sugar Twin", "1 Tbsp. cinnamon", "1 1/2 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/4 c. nuts"], "directions": ["Mix applesauce, margarine, eggs, vanilla and sugar.", "Add the remaining ingredients.", "Drop by teaspoon on cookie sheet and bake 15 minutes at 375°."]}

text: Chocolate-Dipped Strawberries Microwave 2 oz. semi-sweet chocolate with 1/2 Tbsp. whipping cream until melted, stir in dash almond extract, dip 8 strawberries and chill until set.
json: {"title": "Chocolate-Dipped Strawberries", "ingredients": ["2 (1 oz.) sq. semi-sweet chocolate, chopped", "1/2 Tbsp. whipping cream", "dash of almond extract", "8 strawberries"], "directions": ["Combine chocolate and whipping cream in a glass measuring cup or bowl. Microwave at Medium power for 1 minute or until the chocolate melts, stirring after 30 seconds. Stir in the almond extract and cool slightly. Dip each strawberry into the melted chocolate, allowing the excess to drip off. Place on waxed paper-lined baking sheet. Refrigerate or freeze for approximately 15 minutes, until the chocolate is set."]}

text: Working Mother’s “Mess” Brown 1 lb. ground beef and drain, stir in 1–3 Tbsp. tamari, sauté 1 cup chopped onions, 2–3 tomatoes and 1–3 garlic cloves, add 16 oz. chunky spaghetti sauce and 1 (16 oz.) can cooked beans, combine with meat and simmer.
json: {"title": "Working Mother'S \"Mess\"(Renamed Dad'S Quick Delight)", "ingredients": ["1 lb. ground beef", "1 c. chopped onions", "2 to 3 cut-up tomatoes", "1 to 3 garlic buds (adjust for size and taste)", "16 oz. chunky spaghetti sauce", "1 to 3 Tbsp. tamari sauce (use smaller amount for low sodium diet)", "1 (16 oz.) can cooked beans (navy, pinto, kidney or pork and beans)"], "directions": ["Brown meat over medium heat in a large skillet.", "Remove meat from pan and drain off fat.", "Stir 1 to 3 tablespoons tamari sauce into meat.", "Saute onion, garlic and tomatoes.", "Add spaghetti sauce and heat.", "Add cooked beans and meat mixture.", "Stir gently to mix; then simmer to blend flavors.", "Serve when blended and heated through.", "Serves 4. Serve with garlic bread and green salad."]}

text: Chicken With Tarragon Lightly brown 4 skinless chicken breasts, place in skillet meat-side down, add bouillon water to cover, top with 1/2 cup finely chopped onion and 1/2 tsp. tarragon, cover and simmer 30–45 minutes.
json: {"title": "Chicken With Tarragon", "ingredients": ["4 chicken breasts, skin removed", "1/2 c. onion, chopped fine", "1/2 tsp. tarragon", "chicken bouillon"], "directions": ["Lightly brown meat side of chicken breasts.", "Lay all 4 chicken breasts, meat side down, in small (8-inch) skillet.", "Add enough water, with chicken bouillon, added to just cover chicken.", "Add onion over top of chicken.", "Sprinkle with tarragon.", "Bring to boil and reduce heat to medium.", "Cover skillet with well-fitting lid and cook approximately 30 to 45 minutes or until chicken is done. Add a little water if necessary to replace any lost in steam."]}

text: Lemon Jello Vegetable Salad Dissolve 1 box lemon gelatin in 1 cup hot water, add 3/4 cup cold water, let thicken slightly then stir in 1/2 cup grated cabbage, 1/2 cup chopped celery, 1/4 cup grated carrot, 1/8 cup chopped green pepper and 1/2 cup pineapple tidbits and chill until set.
json: {"title": "Lemon Jello Vegetable Salad", "ingredients": ["1 box lemon jello", "1 c. hot water", "3/4 c. cold water", "1/2 c. grated cabbage", "1/2 c. small chopped celery", "1/4 c. grated carrot", "1/8 c. finely chopped green pepper", "1/2 c. pineapple tidbits"], "directions": ["Mix box of jello with the cup of boiling water.", "Mix until dissolved.", "Add cold water.", "Let jell slightly, then add all other ingredients.", "Mix and jell in a flat, 1 1/2-quart dish.", "Cut into squares to serve on a lettuce leaf."]}

text: Shrimp Batter Mix 1 cup flour, 1/2 tsp. cornstarch, 1/2 tsp. soda, 1/2 tsp. baking powder, 1 beaten egg, 1/2–1 cup cold water and paprika and use to coat shrimp for deep frying.
json: {"title": "Shrimp Batter", "ingredients": ["1 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. cornstarch", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. baking powder", "1 beaten egg", "1/2 to 1 c. cold water", "paprika"], "directions": ["Mix all ingredients with a mixer.", "Deep-fry shrimp."]}

text: Chicken-Cheese Ball Mix 1 small can chicken, 8 oz. softened cream cheese, 1 Tbsp. minced onion, 2 Tbsp. soy sauce, 1 Tbsp. mayonnaise, form into ball, roll in chopped pecans and garnish with cherry if desired.
json: {"title": "Chicken-Cheese Ball", "ingredients": ["1 small can chicken (all white meat)", "8 oz. cream cheese, softened", "1 Tbsp. minced onion", "2 Tbsp. soy sauce or lemon soy sauce", "1 Tbsp. mayonnaise", "chopped pecans", "maraschino cherry for garnish (if desired)"], "directions": ["Combine all ingredients, except nuts and cherry.", "Form into ball.", "Roll in enough nuts to cover.", "(If too soft, chill a little first, then roll in nuts.)", "Can garnish with cherry on top."]}

text: Salted Nut Squares Spread 1 1/2 cups salted peanuts in 11 x 7-inch pan, melt 3 Tbsp. butter with 2 cups peanut butter chips, add 1 can condensed milk and 2 cups miniature marshmallows, pour over peanuts, top with remaining peanuts and chill.
json: {"title": "Salted Nut Squares", "ingredients": ["3 c. salted peanuts without skins", "3 Tbsp. butter or margarine", "2 c. (12 oz.) peanut butter chips", "1 can sweetened condensed milk", "2 c. miniature marshmallows"], "directions": ["Place half the peanuts in an ungreased 11 x 7-inch pan.", "In saucepan, melt butter and peanut butter chips over low heat.", "Add milk and marshmallows.", "Cook and stir until melted.", "Pour over peanuts.", "Sprinkle remaining peanuts on top.", "Cover; refrigerate. Cut into bars.", "Makes 5 to 6 dozen."]}

text: Date Cake Sprinkle 1 package chopped dates with 1 tsp. baking soda and 1 cup hot water, cool, cream 1/2 cup margarine with 1 cup sugar and 1 egg, add 1 1/2 cups flour, 1/2 tsp. salt and 1/2 cup walnuts, pour into 8 x 8-inch pan and bake at 350°F for 45 minutes.
json: {"title": "Date Cake", "ingredients": ["1 pkg. dates, cut fine", "1 tsp. baking soda", "1 c. hot water", "1/2 c. margarine", "1 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. walnuts", "1 egg", "1 1/2 c. flour"], "directions": ["Sprinkle dates with baking soda and cover with hot water.", "Let stand until cool.", "Cream margarine, sugar and egg.", "Add dry ingredients, nuts and dates.", "Pour into lightly greased 8 x 8-inch pan and bake at 350° for at least 45 minutes."]}

text: Crescent Cake Mix 1 package yellow cake mix, 1 stick margarine, 1 beaten egg and 1/2 cup chopped nuts and press into 9 x 10-inch pan, beat 1 box confectioners sugar with 8 oz. cream cheese and 2 eggs, pour over base and bake at 350°F for 45 minutes.
json: {"title": "Crescent Cake", "ingredients": ["1 pkg. yellow cake mix", "1 stick margarine", "1 egg, beaten", "1/2 c. chopped nuts", "1 box confectioners sugar", "8 oz. cream cheese", "2 eggs, beaten"], "directions": ["Mix yellow cake mix, margarine, egg and 1/2 cup chopped nuts. This mixture will be thick.", "Press into greased 9 x 10-inch pan. Mix confectioners sugar, cream cheese and 2 eggs.", "Beat until smooth.", "Pour over cake batter.", "Bake at 350° for 45 minutes."]}

text: Freezer Pie Crust Combine 3 lb. shortening, 5 lb. flour and 2 Tbsp. salt in a very large bowl. Mix 3 cups water with 1 cup white syrup, add to dry ingredients and mix well. Divide into crust-size balls, wrap and freeze; makes about 20–24 crusts.
json: {"title": "Freezer Pie Crust", "ingredients": ["3 lb. shortening", "5 lb. flour", "2 Tbsp. salt", "3 c. water", "1 c. white syrup"], "directions": ["Combine water and white syrup in a very large bowl.", "Add all other ingredients and mix well.", "Roll into crust size balls, wrap and freeze.", "Rolls out great.", "Makes 20 to 24 balls."]}

text: Basic Graham Cracker Crust Process 1 1/3 cups graham cracker crumbs and 1/4 cup sugar until fine, add 5 Tbsp. melted unsalted butter and mix until moist. Press into a 9-inch pie pan and bake at 375°F for 8 minutes until lightly browned.
json: {"title": "Basic Graham Cracker Crust", "ingredients": ["1 1/3 c. graham cracker crumbs (about 16 whole crackers)", "1/4 c. sugar", "5 Tbsp. unsalted butter, melted"], "directions": ["Preheat the oven to 375°. In the bowl of a food processor fitted with the metal blade, process the graham crackers and sugar to fine crumbs. With the motor running, add the butter and process until the crumbs are moist and stick together. Press the graham cracker mixture into the bottom and sides of a 9-inch pie pan. Bake in the center of the oven for 8 minutes or until the edges are slightly brown. Makes a single 9-inch crust."]}

text: Creamy Chicken And Mushrooms Brown 4 skinless boneless chicken breasts in 1 Tbsp. margarine for 10 minutes and remove. In remaining 1 Tbsp. margarine sauté 1 1/2 cups sliced mushrooms, 1 small sliced onion and 1/8 tsp. garlic powder until tender. Add 1 can cream of mushroom soup, 1/2 cup milk, 2 Tbsp. dry sherry (optional) and 1/8 tsp. pepper, bring to boil, return chicken, cover and cook on low 5 minutes.
json: {"title": "Creamy Chicken And Mushrooms", "ingredients": ["2 Tbsp. margarine", "4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves", "1 1/2 c. sliced mushroom", "1 small onion, sliced", "1/8 tsp. garlic powder or 1 clove garlic, minced", "1 can (10 3/4 oz.) cream of mushroom soup", "1/2 c. milk", "2 Tbsp. dry sherry (optional)", "1/8 tsp. pepper"], "directions": ["In skillet, in 1 tablespoon hot margarine, cook chicken 10 minutes or until browned on both sides.", "Remove.", "In remaining 1 tablespoon hot margarine, cook mushrooms and onion with garlic powder until tender and liquid is evaporated (stirring often). Add remaining ingredients.", "Heat to boiling.", "Return chicken to skillet.", "Cover; cook over low heat 5 minutes or until chicken is no longer pink, stirring occasionally.", "Serves 4."]}

text: Sweet And Sour Red Cabbage Boil 1 head shredded red cabbage in salted water until just tender, drain and add 1 chopped onion glazed in pan. Stir in 1 tsp. salt, 1 tsp. pepper, 1 Tbsp. sugar, 1/2 cup cider vinegar and caraway seed to taste, stirring until cabbage becomes limp, then serve hot.
json: {"title": "Sweet And Sour Red Cabbage", "ingredients": ["1 head red cabbage, cut into small pieces", "1 Tbsp. salt", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. pepper", "1 Tbsp. sugar", "1/2 c. cider vinegar", "caraway seed to taste", "1 onion, chopped"], "directions": ["In a pot of water with 1 tablespoon salt, boil shredded cabbage until just tender.", "Cook it quickly, perhaps 10 minutes at most, to retain its Vitamin C.", "Drain; stir in chopped onion that has been glaceed in a nonstick frypan.", "Add salt, pepper, sugar and vinegar; stir at least two minutes until the vinegar permeates the cabbage, which will become limp.", "Serve hot with Best Herbed Pork Roast."]}

text: Hot Rolls Dissolve 1 pkg. dry yeast in 1/2 cup warm water. Mix remaining 1 cup warm water with 3 1/2 tsp. sugar, 1 tsp. salt and 3 tsp. melted Crisco. Add yeast mixture and knead in 4 cups flour. Let rise until doubled, shape rolls, rise again and bake until browned.
json: {"title": "Hot Rolls", "ingredients": ["1 1/2 c. warm water", "1 pkg. dry yeast", "3 1/2 tsp. sugar", "1 tsp. salt", "3 tsp. melted Crisco", "4 c. plain flour"], "directions": ["Use 1/2 cup water to melt yeast.", "Add remainder of water to other 4 ingredients.", "Mix well; knead in enough flour as for biscuits.", "Put in a greased bowl with Crisco and let rise until double in bulk.", "Grease top of dough with Crisco.", "When dough has doubled, make out rolls.", "Put in greased pan and let rise.", "Bake in moderate oven until brown."]}

text: Chicken Casserole Spread 1 1/2 cups uncooked rice in a 9 x 13-inch dish, sprinkle with 1 envelope onion soup mix, top with 8 chicken pieces, spoon over 1 can cream of mushroom soup and pour 1 1/2 cups hot water around chicken. Cover and bake at 325°F for 1 1/2 hours, uncovering last 30 minutes.
json: {"title": "Chicken Casserole", "ingredients": ["1 1/2 c. uncooked rice", "1 envelope onion soup mix", "1 can cream of mushroom soup", "1 1/2 c. hot water", "8 chicken breasts or thighs"], "directions": ["Spread rice in bottom of a 9 x 13-inch glass casserole dish. Sprinkle onion soup mix on top.", "Lay chicken pieces on top and spoon mushroom soup over all.", "Pour water around chicken pieces. Cover with foil and bake at 325° for 1 1/2 hours. Take foil off the last 1/2 hour.", "Check liquid content and add, if necessary."]}

text: Raisin Walnut Shortbread Bars Mix 1 1/4 cups flour and 1/2 cup sugar, cut in 1/2 cup butter until crumbly, press into greased 8-inch pan and bake at 350°F for 20 minutes. Beat 2 eggs with 1/2 cup brown sugar, 1 tsp. vanilla and 1/8 tsp. baking soda, stir in 1 cup walnuts, 1 cup raisins and optional 1/2 cup coconut, spread over crust and bake until set.
json: {"title": "Raisin Walnut Shortbread Bars", "ingredients": ["1 1/4 c. all-purpose flour", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. butter or margarine", "2 eggs", "1/2 c. firmly packed brown sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/8 tsp. baking soda", "1 c. chopped walnuts", "1 c. raisins", "1/2 c. flaked coconut (optional)"], "directions": ["Heat oven to 350°.", "Lightly grease an 8-inch square pan. Combine flour and sugar.", "Using pastry blender or fork, cut in margarine until mixture resembles fine meal.", "Press into greased pan.", "Bake for 20 minutes, or just until edges are golden."]}

text: Pineapple Parfait Pie Heat 3/4 cup pineapple liquid with water to boiling, remove from heat and dissolve 1 pkg. lemon Jell-O. Add 1 pint vanilla ice cream until melted, chill until thickened, fold in crushed pineapple and pour into baked 9-inch pie shell. Chill until firm and top with Cool Whip.
json: {"title": "Pineapple Parfait Pie", "ingredients": ["1 (9-inch) baked pie shell", "No. 2 can crushed pineapple, drained", "1 pkg. lemon Jell-O", "1 pt. vanilla ice cream", "Cool Whip"], "directions": ["Heat 3/4 cup liquid from pineapple plus water (if needed) to boiling.", "Remove from heat.", "Add Jell-O.", "Dissolve.", "Add ice cream until melted.", "Chill until thickened (10 to 15 minutes).", "Fold in pineapple.", "Turn into pie shell.", "Chill until firm, about 20 minutes.", "Top with Cool Whip."]}

text: Cherry Supreme Mix 2 cups graham cracker crumbs with 1/4 cup sugar and 1 stick melted butter, press into pan and cool. Blend 1 pkg. cream cheese, 1/2 cup powdered sugar and 1 small tub Cool Whip, spread over crust and top with 1 can cherry pie filling, refrigerate overnight.
json: {"title": "Cherry Supreme", "ingredients": ["2 c. graham cracker crumbs", "1/4 c. white sugar", "1 stick butter", "1 can cherry pie filling", "1 small tub Cool Whip", "1/2 c. powdered sugar", "1 pkg. cream cheese"], "directions": ["Mix graham cracker crumbs and white sugar together.", "Melt butter and pour over the sugar and crumbs; press into a cake pan. Stir and soften cream cheese, powdered sugar and Cool Whip until it is light and fluffy.", "Add to cool crust, then pour the cherry filling on top of the cream cheese.", "Store in refrigerator overnight."]}

text: Red Beet Cake Mix 1 1/2 cups sugar, 3 eggs, 1 1/2 cups mashed cooked beets, 1 cup Crisco oil, 2 squares melted unsweetened chocolate, 1 1/3 cups flour, 1 1/3 tsp. soda, 1/2 tsp. salt and 1 tsp. vanilla and bake at 350°F for 25–35 minutes.
json: {"title": "Red Beet Cake", "ingredients": ["1 1/2 c. sugar", "3 eggs", "1 1/2 c. cooked beets, mashed", "1 c. Crisco oil", "2 squares unsweetened chocolate, melted", "1 1/3 c. flour", "1 1/3 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. vanilla"], "directions": ["Mix all together.", "Bake at 350° for 25 to 35 minutes until done in center."]}

text: Reuben Casserole Spread 1 (7 oz.) can drained sauerkraut in baking dish, top with 1 sliced tomato, 2 Tbsp. Thousand Island dressing and 4 oz. chopped corned beef. Sprinkle with 3/4 cup Swiss cheese and 1/8 tsp. caraway seed, top with 1 cup rye bread crumbs tossed with 1 Tbsp. butter and bake uncovered at 375°F for 20–25 minutes.
json: {"title": "Reuben Casserole", "ingredients": ["1 (7 oz.) can sauerkraut, drained", "1 small tomato, sliced", "2 Tbsp. Thousand Island dressing", "1 (4 oz.) pkg. sliced corned beef, cut in bite size pieces", "3/4 c. Swiss cheese, shredded", "1/8 tsp. caraway seed", "1 c. rye bread crumbs (soft)", "1 Tbsp. butter or margarine"], "directions": ["Spread sauerkraut in baking dish.", "Top with sliced tomato, dressing and corned beef.", "Sprinkle with cheese and caraway seed. Toss rye bread crumbs with butter and sprinkle over casserole. Bake, uncovered, at 375° for 20 to 25 minutes."]}

text: Potato Casserole Mix 16 oz. sour cream, 16 oz. Cheez Whiz, 2 Tbsp. minced onions and 1 Tbsp. dried parsley, fold in 4 lb. boiled sliced potatoes and 1 lb. diced precooked sausage. Pour into pan and bake at 350°F for 45 minutes.
json: {"title": "Potato Casserole", "ingredients": ["4 lb. Irish potatoes (boil, peel and slice in 1/4 slices)", "16 oz. (large) sour cream", "16 oz. (large) Cheez Whiz", "2 Tbsp. minced onions", "1 Tbsp. dried parsley", "1 lb. precooked sausage (sliced in diced cuts)"], "directions": ["Mix sour cream, Cheez Whiz, onions and parsley.", "Fold in potatoes.", "Fold in sausage.", "Pour in large baking pan.", "Bake at 350° for 45 minutes.", "Top with red pepper and a few sausage slices for looks."]}

text: Carrot-Pineapple Bread Mix 3 beaten eggs, 2 cups sugar, 1 cup oil, 1 small can crushed pineapple, 2 tsp. vanilla, 1 cup grated carrots, 1 1/2 tsp. cinnamon, 1 tsp. soda, 1/4 tsp. salt, 3 cups flour and 1 cup chopped nuts and bake at 350°F for 1 hour in two loaf pans.
json: {"title": "Carrot-Pineapple Bread", "ingredients": ["3 beaten eggs", "2 c. sugar", "1 c. oil", "1 small can crushed pineapple", "2 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. grated carrots", "1 1/2 tsp. cinnamon", "1 tsp. soda", "1/4 tsp. salt", "3 c. flour", "1 c. chopped nuts"], "directions": ["Mix all ingredients well.", "Bake 1 hour at 350° in two loaf pans lined with waxed paper or foil."]}

text: Easy Chicken And Dumplings Layer 1 cooked chopped chicken in casserole and pour over 1/4 stick melted butter. Mix 1 cup self-rising flour with 1 cup milk and pour over chicken. Combine 1 can chicken soup with 2 cups chicken broth, pour over top, smooth gently and bake at 350°F for 45 minutes.
json: {"title": "Easy Chicken And Dumplings", "ingredients": ["1 chicken, cooked and cut into small pieces", "1/4 stick margarine or butter", "2 c. chicken broth", "1 c. milk", "1 can chicken soup", "1 c. self-rising flour", "salt and pepper to taste"], "directions": ["Layer chicken in bottom of casserole dish and pour melted butter or margarine over chicken.", "Next, mix flour with milk and pour over chicken.", "Mix soup and broth and pour over top of casserole and gently stir across top; smooth out.", "Bake at 350° for 45 minutes or until golden brown and done in center."]}

text: Delicious Scalloped Potatoes (Without Cheese) Slice 6 peeled potatoes thinly and layer in casserole with 3/4 stick margarine, salt and pepper. Pour 2 cans evaporated milk over potatoes to cover and bake uncovered at 475°F for about 1 hour.
json: {"title": "\"Delicious\" Scalloped Potatoes(Without Cheese)", "ingredients": ["6 large potatoes", "2 cans evaporated milk", "3/4 stick margarine", "salt and pepper"], "directions": ["Slice peeled potatoes in round, pretty thin slices.", "Layer in a deep casserole dish with butter and salt.", "Pour can of milk over the potatoes.", "Make sure they are completely covered with milk. Bake, uncovered, for about 1 hour at 475°."]}

text: Peanut Butter Oat Cookies Cream 1/2 cup butter and 1 cup brown sugar, add 1/2 cup corn syrup and 1 tsp. salt, mix in 4 cups oats and bake in greased 13 x 9-inch pan at 350°F for 15 minutes. Spread 1/2 cup peanut butter over warm base, melt 1/2 cup chocolate chips with 1 1/2 tsp. butter and drizzle on top, cool and cut.
json: {"title": "Peanut Butter Oat Cookies", "ingredients": ["1/2 c. butter", "1 c. packed brown sugar", "1/2 c. corn syrup", "1 tsp. salt", "4 c. quick cooking oats", "1/2 c. peanut butter", "1/2 c. chocolate chips", "1 1/2 tsp. butter", "2 tsp. vanilla"], "directions": ["Cream butter and brown sugar.", "Add corn syrup.", "Mix well. Spread mixture evenly in greased 13 x 9-inch cake pan.", "Bake at 350° for 15 minutes.", "Cool slightly.", "Spread peanut butter evenly over top.", "Melt chocolate chips and butter together until smooth. Drizzle over peanut butter.", "Cool to set, then cut in squares."]}

text: Cherry Salad Mix 2 cans cherry pie filling, 1 can crushed pineapple with juice, 1/2 cup pecans, 1 cup miniature marshmallows, 1 large container Cool Whip and 1 can sweetened condensed milk and refrigerate 1 hour.
json: {"title": "Cherry Salad", "ingredients": ["2 cans cherry pie filling", "1 can crushed pineapple, not drained", "1/2 c. pecans", "1 c. miniature marshmallows", "1 large container Cool Whip", "1 can Eagle Brand milk"], "directions": ["Mix all ingredients together and refrigerate 1 hour before serving."]}

text: Scalloped Oysters Layer 1 pint oysters with 2 cups cracker crumbs mixed with 1/2 cup melted butter, seasoning with 1/2 tsp. salt and dash pepper. Combine 3/4 cup cream, 1/4 cup oyster liquid and 1/4 tsp. Worcestershire sauce, pour over and bake at 350°F for 40 minutes.
json: {"title": "Scalloped Oysters", "ingredients": ["1 pt. oysters", "2 c. cracker crumbs (Ritz)", "1/2 c. melted butter", "1/2 tsp. salt", "dash of pepper", "3/4 c. cream", "1/4 c. oyster liquid", "1/4 tsp. Worcestershire sauce"], "directions": ["Drain oysters, saving liquid.", "Combine crumbs, butter, salt and pepper.", "Spread 1/3 of butter and crumbs in greased casserole (2-quart).", "Cover with 1/2 of the oysters.", "Using another 1/3 of buttered crumbs, spread second layer and add remaining oysters. Finish with last 1/3 of buttered crumbs on top.", "Combine liquid ingredients and pour over top.", "Bake at 350° for 40 minutes."]}

text: Pie Crust Cut 2/3 cup shortening and 2 Tbsp. butter into 2 cups flour and 1 tsp. salt, add 1/4 cup cold water gradually, form dough, divide for two crusts and bake shells at 475°F for 8 minutes if pre-baking.
json: {"title": "Pie Crust", "ingredients": ["2/3 c. shortening", "2 Tbsp. butter, softened", "2 c. flour", "1 tsp. salt", "1/4 c. cold water"], "directions": ["Cut shortening and butter into flour and salt mixture.", "Slowly add water while mixing with a fork (depending on weather, slightly more or less water can be used).", "Form into ball.", "Cut in half for 2 crusts.", "Roll out, using only a little flour.", "For baked pie shells: prick with fork and bake 8 minutes at 475°."]}

text: Oatmeal Cake Pour 1 1/2 cups boiling water over 1 cup oatmeal and cool 20 minutes. Add 1/2 cup butter, 1 cup white sugar, 1 cup brown sugar, 2 eggs, 1 1/2 cups flour, 1/2 tsp. salt, 1 tsp. cinnamon, 1 tsp. soda, 1 tsp. baking powder and 1 tsp. vanilla, bake at 350°F for 35–40 minutes.
json: {"title": "Oatmeal Cake", "ingredients": ["1 1/2 c. boiling water", "1 c. oatmeal", "1/2 c. butter", "1 c. white sugar", "1 c. brown sugar", "2 eggs", "1 1/2 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. cinnamon", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. baking powder", "1 tsp. vanilla"], "directions": ["Make oatmeal.", "Cool about 20 minutes.", "Add remaining ingredients; beat until well blended.", "Bake in a 9 x 13-inch pan at 350° for 35 to 40 minutes."]}

text: Candle Salad Place lettuce leaf on plate, top with pineapple slice, stand 1/2 banana upright in center, spoon on mayonnaise and top with a cherry.
json: {"title": "Candle Salad", "ingredients": ["lettuce", "pineapple slices", "banana", "mayonnaise", "cherries"], "directions": ["Put one lettuce leaf on each plate.", "Lay a pineapple slice on top of each lettuce leaf.", "Stand 1/2 a banana in the hole of each pineapple.", "Top the banana with a bit of mayonnaise.", "Put a cherry on top of the mayonnaise."]}

text: Salmon Croquettes Mix 1 can pink salmon, 1 1/2 cups mashed potatoes, 1 grated onion, 1 egg and 1/2 tsp. pepper, form into 8 patties, coat with 1/4 cup bread crumbs and fry in 3 Tbsp. oil until golden.
json: {"title": "Salmon Croquettes", "ingredients": ["1 (14 3/4 oz.) can pink salmon, drained", "1 1/2 c. mashed potatoes", "1 small onion, grated", "1 large egg", "1/2 tsp. pepper", "1/4 c. packaged bread crumbs", "3 Tbsp. vegetable oil"], "directions": ["Mix salmon, potatoes, onion, egg and pepper until blended. Form into 8 patties, each about 3/4-inch thick.", "Spread crumbs on waxed paper.", "Gently press patties in crumbs to coat.", "Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet.", "Add patties and cook over medium heat about 4 minutes per side until heated through, golden and crisp. Serves 4."]}

text: Croquettes (Chicken, Fish Or Meat) Mix 2 cups chopped cooked meat, 1 cup croquette sauce, 1 egg, 3/4 cup breadcrumbs, salt and pepper, chill if needed, shape and cook as desired.

text: Corn Relish Boil 1 large can corn, 6 chopped onions, 1 chopped celery stalk, 1 pint vinegar, 3 chopped red peppers, 3 chopped green peppers, 2 cups sugar, 1 tsp. turmeric, 1 Tbsp. dry mustard, 1 Tbsp. celery salt and 2 Tbsp. salt uncovered for 15 minutes, jar and process.
json: {"title": "Corn Relish]", "ingredients": ["1 large can corn", "6 onions, chopped", "1 stalk celery, chopped", "1 pt. white vinegar", "3 red sweet peppers, chopped", "3 green sweet peppers, chopped", "2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. turmeric", "1 Tbsp. dry mustard", "1 Tbsp. celery salt", "2 Tbsp. salt"], "directions": ["Combine ingredients and boil uncovered 15 minutes.", "Thicken with a small amount of flour if the mixture is too thin.", "Ladle into warm canning jars, leaving 1/8-inch headspace.", "Seal immediately.", "Process in boiling water bath 15 minutes.", "Very good with roast, men love it!"]}

text: Flossie’s Gingerbread Mix 1/2 cup sugar, 1/2 cup shortening, 1 egg, 1 1/2 tsp. soda, 1 tsp. cinnamon, 1 tsp. ginger, 1/2 tsp. salt, 2 1/2 cups flour, 1 cup hot water and 1 cup molasses and bake at 350°F.
json: {"title": "Flossie'S Gingerbread", "ingredients": ["1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. shortening", "1 egg", "1 1/2 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. cinnamon", "1 tsp. ginger", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 1/2 c. flour", "1 c. hot water", "1 c. molasses"], "directions": ["Mix in order given and bake in loaf pan in moderate oven, 350°."]}

text: Vanilla Wafer Cake Cream 2 sticks butter and 2 cups sugar, add 6 eggs one at a time, alternate 12 oz. crushed vanilla wafers with 1/2 cup milk, stir in 7 oz. coconut and 1 cup pecans, bake in greased tube pan until done.

Pour into a 12 cup tube pan greased with nonstick spray.", "Cook completely before removing from pan.", "May be glazed with powdered sugar and topped with pecan halves and maraschino cherries. Freezes well."]}

text: Double Baked Potatoes Bake 6 potatoes at 350°F, halve and scoop centers. Mix with 1 diced onion, 1 lb. crumbled bacon, 1 1/2 cups diced ham, 1 1/2 cups cheese, 2 Tbsp. butter and 1/4 cup milk, refill shells and bake until hot.
json: {"title": "Double Baked Potatoes", "ingredients": ["6 medium size baking potatoes", "1 medium to large onion, diced", "1 (16 oz.) pkg. bacon, cooked and crumbled", "1 1/2 c. cooked, smoked ham, cut in small cubes", "1 1/2 c. cheese (I use part Mozzarella and part Cheddar)", "2 Tbsp. butter or margarine", "1/4 c. milk"], "directions": ["Wash the potatoes, rub them with oil and bake at 350° until done.", "Let them cool and cut in half lengthwise, leaving about 1/4-inch around the shell.", "Scoop out the potato.", "Set the shells aside."]}

text: Crabmeat Au Gratin Mix 1 can cream of shrimp soup, 1/2 can milk, 1 lb. crabmeat, 4 cups chopped celery, 1/2 cup green pepper, 2 chopped pimentos, 2 Tbsp. onion, 1/3 cup almonds and 4 chopped eggs, top with 1 cup Cheddar and buttered crumbs and bake at 350°F for 35 minutes.

text: Hobo Stew Brown 2 lb. ground beef, drain and add 1/4 cup catsup, 1/4 cup mustard, 1/4 cup barbecue sauce, 2 cans sliced potatoes, 2 cans pork and beans, 1 can corn and 2 Tbsp. onion flakes, simmer 15–20 minutes.
json: {"title": "Hobo Stew", "ingredients": ["2 lb. ground beef", "1/4 c. catsup", "1/4 c. mustard", "1/4 c. barbecue sauce", "2 (16 oz.) cans sliced potatoes, drained", "2 (16 oz.) cans pork and beans", "1 (16 oz.) can whole kernel corn, drained", "2 Tbsp. minced onion flakes"], "directions": ["In skillet at medium heat, brown ground beef; drain.", "Add catsup, mustard, barbecue sauce, potatoes, pork and beans, corn and onion flakes.", "Reduce to low heat; simmer for 15 to 20 minutes or until heated through."]}

text: No Name Cake Beat 1 box butter recipe cake mix, 1 cup milk, 4 eggs and 3/4 cup oil, mix in 1 can coconut pecan icing and 1 cup pecans, bake in Bundt pan at 340°F for 45 minutes then 315°F for 25 minutes.
json: {"title": "No Name Cake", "ingredients": ["1 box Duncan Hines butter recipe cake mix", "1 c. milk", "4 eggs", "3/4 c. oil", "1 can ready to spread coconut pecan icing", "1 c. pecans"], "directions": ["Beat cake mix, milk, eggs and oil together. Add can of coconut pecan icing and mix well. Add pecans. Grease and flour a Bundt pan. Bake at 340° for 45 minutes, then turn the oven down to 315° and bake for 25 more minutes. Do not open the door during the first 45 minutes."]}

text: Gold Rush Brunch Prepare 1 pkg. potatoes O’Brien, make sauce with 1/4 cup butter, 1/4 cup flour and 2 cups milk, stir in 1 cup sour cream and potatoes, pour into pan, top with 8 slices Canadian bacon, bake 20 minutes, add 8 eggs and bake until set.
json: {"title": "Gold Rush Brunch", "ingredients": ["1 pkg. potatoes O'Brien or homemade", "1/4 c. butter", "1/4 c. flour", "2 c. milk", "1 c. sour cream", "salt and pepper to taste", "parsley", "8 slices Canadian bacon", "8 eggs"], "directions": ["Prepare potatoes according to directions.", "In large saucepan melt butter; blend in flour, salt and pepper.", "Add milk and stir until thick and bubbly.", "Remove from heat.", "Add sour cream, parsley and potatoes.", "Place mixture in 9 x 13-inch baking pan.", "Arrange bacon in a row down center, overlapping.", "Bake at 350° for 20 minutes.", "Make a depression in mixture on each side of bacon.", "Slip 1 egg into each depression.", "Bake until eggs are set, 10 to 12 minutes.", "Serves 8."]}

text: Ham Cheese Oven Omelet Beat 8 eggs with 1 cup milk and 1/2 tsp. seasoned salt, stir in 3 oz. chopped ham, 3 Tbsp. onion and 1 cup Cheddar cheese and bake at 325°F for 40–45 minutes.

text: Never Fail Rolls Mix 1 cup butter, 3/4 cup sugar, 1 cup boiling water, 1 cup lukewarm water, 2 pkgs. yeast, 2 beaten eggs, 1 tsp. salt and about 6 1/2 cups flour, refrigerate 2 hours, shape, rise and bake at 375°F for 18 minutes.

text: Taco Casserole Brown 1 lb. ground beef and drain, add 1 chopped onion, 1/2 tsp. garlic powder, 1 envelope taco seasoning and 8 oz. tomato sauce. Layer with 1 cup sour cream, 1 cup cottage cheese, 2 cups crushed tortilla chips and 2 cups shredded cheese and bake at 350°F.

text: Delicious Baked Potato Dish Layer 4 thinly sliced potatoes with 2 Tbsp. butter, salt, 1/2 cup Cheddar cheese and 1 cup whipping cream, sprinkle with chives and bake at 450°F for 45 minutes.

text: Quick Cream Of Broccoli Soup Boil 3 cups milk with 10 oz. broccoli for 5 minutes, add 1 envelope chicken soup mix and 1 Tbsp. flour blended with remaining milk, simmer 10 minutes.

text: Zucchini Pizzas Mix 3/4 cup spaghetti sauce with onions, pepper and oregano, top 24 zucchini slices with sauce, mushrooms and mixture of 1/2 cup mozzarella and 2 Tbsp. Parmesan and broil until bubbly.

text: School Girl Pickles (Sweet Spear) Soak 12 lb. cucumbers in salt water 2 weeks, rinse, soak in alum water 6 hours, heat vinegar to cover, drain, layer with 8 lb. sugar and spices and stand 3 days before jarring.

text: Earthquake Cake Sprinkle 1 cup coconut and 3/4 cup pecans in 13 x 9-inch pan, pour prepared German chocolate cake batter over, top with mixture of 8 oz. cream cheese, 1 stick butter and 3 cups powdered sugar and bake at 350°F until done.

text: Mayonnaise Cake Mix 2 cups flour, 4 Tbsp. cocoa, 1 cup sugar, pinch salt, 1 cup water with 2 tsp. soda and 1 cup mayonnaise and bake at 350°F for 20–35 minutes.

text: Party Pink Punch Blend 46 oz. pineapple juice, 1 cup sugar, 6 oz. frozen lemonade and 48 oz. cranberry juice, freeze, thaw to slush and add 2 liters chilled ginger ale before serving.

text: Country Style Beef And Macaroni Cook and drain 8 oz. macaroni. text: Peanut Butter Cream Pie Beat 3 oz. fat-free cream cheese with 2 Tbsp. skim milk and 1/2 cup reduced-fat peanut butter until smooth, then stir in 1 cup powdered sugar. Fold in 1 large container Cool Whip Lite, spoon into 1 low-fat baked pie shell, and refrigerate several hours until set.

Stir in sugar.", "Mix in Cool Whip.", "Pour into pie shell. Refrigerate several hours."]}

text: Scalloped Corn Whisk 1 beaten egg with 1/2 cup milk, add 1 (8 3/4 oz.) can cream-style corn, 1 (7 oz.) can drained whole-kernel corn, and a dash of pepper; pour into a 1-quart casserole and bake at 350°F for about 35 minutes, until a knife inserted near the center comes out clean (makes about 4 servings).

text: Waldrop Banana Pudding Whisk 2 cups milk, 1 cup sugar, 1/2 cup flour, 2 eggs, 1 tsp. vanilla, and a pinch of salt until smooth; cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until thickened, then remove from heat and layer the warm pudding with sliced bananas (amount not specified) and vanilla wafers (amount not specified); serve warm or chilled.
json: {"title": "Waldrop Banana Pudding", "ingredients": ["2 c. milk", "1 c. sugar", "1/2 c. flour", "2 eggs", "1 tsp. vanilla", "pinch of salt", "bananas", "vanilla wafers"], "directions": ["Mix first 6 ingredients together; beat well.", "Stir constantly when cooking; cook over medium heat until mixture thickens. text: Hungarian Goulash Brown 2 lb. cubed stew beef with 1 medium sliced onion and 1 small clove garlic in 1/4 cup shortening; drain. Stir in 1 1/2 cups water, 3/4 cup catsup, 2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce, 1 Tbsp. packed brown sugar, 2 tsp. salt, 2 tsp. paprika, 1/2 tsp. dry mustard, and a dash of cayenne; bring to a boil, reduce heat, cover, and simmer 2 to 2 1/2 hours until tender (or cook on low in a slow cooker 8 to 9 hours). Shake together 1/4 cup cold water and 2 Tbsp. flour, stir gradually into the stew, bring to a boil stirring constantly, boil 1 minute, and serve over hot noodles.

text: Plain Pound Cake Mix 3 cups sugar, 3 cups Swans Down cake flour, 7 medium eggs, 1 cup milk, 1/2 tsp. salt, 1 tsp. vanilla flavoring, 1 tsp. butternut flavoring, and 1 1/2 cups Crisco until well combined; pour into a pound-cake pan and bake at 300°F for about 1 1/2 hours.

text: Ham And Country Dumplings Boil a ham bone (amount not specified) in a large pot of water until flavorful; remove the bone, return any picked meat to the broth, and season with ham bouillon (amount not specified). Make dumplings by mixing flour (amount not specified) with 2 eggs and 1 cup cold water to form a dumpling dough/batter, then cook dumplings in the simmering ham broth until done (exact proportions and timing not specified in the data).

text: Broccoli Rice Casserole Sauté 1 chopped onion and 1 chopped celery rib in 1/2 stick butter until tender. Combine with 1 (10 oz.) package cooked, well-drained frozen broccoli, 2 1/2 cups cooked rice, 1 (10 3/4 oz.) can condensed cream of chicken soup, 4 oz. Cheez Whiz, a dash of Tabasco, and pepper to taste; pour into a greased 1 1/2-quart dish and bake at 350°F until hot and bubbly (time not specified); this is best made a day ahead and freezes well.

text: Buckeyes (Cookies) Melt 1 stick oleo and mix with 1 (18 oz.) jar crunchy peanut butter, 3 cups Rice Krispies, and 1 lb. powdered sugar; roll into small balls and place on wax paper. Melt 1 (12 oz.) bag chocolate chips with 1/2 stick paraffin wax, dip the balls, return to wax paper, and cool until set (makes about 120 pieces).

text: Broccoli-Raisin Salad Combine 1 bunch broccoli heads (chopped), 2 green onion stems (or 1/2 medium onion), 1/4 cup sunflower seeds, 1/2 cup raisins, and 6 fried-and-cooled bacon slices (crumbled). text: Low-Fat “French Fries” Heat oven to 425°F. Cut 1 1/2 to 2 lb. baking potatoes into 2-inch strips (peeled or unpeeled). Toss in a container with 1 to 1 1/2 Tbsp. olive oil and 1/8 to 1/4 tsp. cayenne, then season with 1/3 to 1/2 tsp. garlic powder and 1/4 to 1/2 tsp. salt; coat a baking sheet with nonstick cooking spray, spread potatoes out, and bake until crisp and browned (baking time not specified in the data).

text: Chicken Pot Pie Grease a shallow 2-quart dish and add 3 cups cooked diced chicken plus 1 small package frozen Veg-All. Mix 1 cup chicken broth with 1 cup cream of celery soup, 1/2 tsp. salt, and 1/4 tsp. pepper; pour over chicken. Stir 1 cup self-rising flour with 1 cup milk and 1/2 cup melted margarine until smooth, pour over the filling, and bake at 400°F for 40 to 50 minutes.

text: Old-Time Bread Pudding Grease a 1 1/2-quart baking dish and place 4 slices buttered toast cut into quarters inside; sprinkle with 1/3 cup seedless raisins. Mix 2 slightly beaten eggs with 1/4 cup sugar, 1/8 tsp. salt, 1 cup Pet milk, 1 cup boiling water, and 1 tsp. vanilla; pour over toast and let stand 10 minutes. Sprinkle with 4 tsp. sugar mixed with 1/4 tsp. cinnamon and bake at 350°F for 30 minutes, until a knife inserted in the center comes out clean (about 4 servings).

text: Original Mayfair Dressing In a blender, blend 1 (2 oz.) can anchovies, 1 Tbsp. black pepper, 1 Tbsp. Accent, 2 celery stalks, 1 medium onion, 1/4 cup mustard, 1 1/2 cloves garlic, and 1 tsp. lemon juice until smooth. Add 3 eggs one at a time, blending after each, then slowly blend in 2 cups Mazola oil a little at a time until thick and creamy (makes about 1 quart).

text: Apple Cake Beat 3 eggs with 2 cups sugar and 1 1/4 cups oil. Add 3 cups flour, 1 tsp. soda, 1/2 tsp. salt, and 1/2 tsp. cinnamon; stir in 2 cups chopped apples, 1 cup pecans, and 1 cup coconut. Bake at 375°F for 25 to 35 minutes.

text: Cheeseburger Pie Brown 1 lb. ground beef with 1 Tbsp. onions, 1 tsp. salt, 1/4 tsp. pepper, and 3/4 tsp. Italian seasoning; drain. Stir in 1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste, spread over 1 pizza crust, top with 8 oz. shredded mozzarella, and bake at 375°F for 10 to 15 minutes.

text: Fried Cabbage Chop 1 head cabbage, 1 onion, 1 bell pepper, and 1 ripe tomato, then mix with 2 Tbsp. sugar, 1 tsp. salt, and 1 tsp. pepper and let stand at least 1 hour. text: Jello Salad (Almost Like a Dessert) Heat 1 cup water with pineapple juice (from 1 No. 2 can crushed pineapple, drained) and 12 large marshmallows until dissolved. Stir in 1 package lemon gelatin and 1 package orange gelatin until dissolved; cool at room temperature until almost set. Fold in drained crushed pineapple, 1 cup grated carrots, 1 cup diced celery, 1 lb. cottage cheese, 1/2 cup mayonnaise, and 3/4 cup chopped nuts, then fold in 1 prepared package Dream Whip (or other whipped topping) and chill in a mold until firm.

text: Wedding Cookies Heat oven to 300°F and line 2 cookie sheets with parchment (or leave ungreased). Cream 1 stick unsalted butter (room temp) with 2 Tbsp. granulated sugar and 1 tsp. vanilla until light; mix in 1 cup sifted all-purpose flour, then 1 cup finely chopped walnuts. Roll rounded teaspoonfuls into balls, space about 2 inches apart, bake about 30 minutes until just turning golden, then roll hot cookies in 1 cup sifted powdered sugar and cool on sheets before serving.
json: {"title": "Wedding Cookies", "ingredients": ["1 stick unsalted butter (room temperature)", "2 Tbsp. granulated sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. all-purpose flour, sifted", "1 c. finely chopped walnuts", "1 c. powdered sugar, sifted"], "directions": ["Preheat oven to 300°. Line 2 cookie sheets with parchment paper or leave them ungreased. Cream the butter, sugar and vanilla until light and fluffy. Add the flour and mix on low speed until very well blended. Add the nuts and mix well until well blended. Measure out generously rounded teaspoonfuls of dough and roll them into balls with your hands. Place about 2-inches apart on the prepared cookie sheets. Bake the cookies until they begin to turn golden, about 30 minutes. To test for doneness, remove 1 from sheet and cut in half. There should be no doughy strip in the center. Roll the cookies in the powdered sugar while hot. Then cool on the cookie sheets. Serve after cookies have cooled."]}

text: Jezebel Sauce Blend together 1 (18 oz.) jar pineapple preserves, 1 (18 oz.) jar apple jelly, 1 (5 oz.) jar horseradish, 1 1/4 oz. dry mustard, and 1 Tbsp. coarse black pepper; serve over cream cheese with crackers.
