text: Cheese and Chilies Beat 2 eggs with 2 Tbsp. milk, mix in 2 cans chopped green chilies and grated Swiss and cheddar cheeses, pour into a square dish, top with Monterey Jack cheese, and bake at 350°F for 30 minutes until bubbly.
json: {"title": "Cheese And Chilies", "ingredients": ["2 eggs", "2 Tbsp. milk", "2 (4 oz.) cans chopped green chilies, drained", "4 oz. Swiss cheese, grated", "4 oz. cheddar cheese, grated", "4 oz. monterey jack cheese, grated"], "directions": ["Beat eggs and milk together.", "Add green chilies and mix well. Add grated Swiss and cheddar cheeses.", "Pour into 8x9-inch square pyrex dish.", "Sprinkle monterey jack cheese on top.", "Bake at 350° for 30 mins. or until bubbly and brown on top.", "Serve with crackers."]}

text: Rhubarb Cake Layer 5 cups chopped rhubarb, raspberry Jell-O, 1 cup sugar, and 3 cups marshmallows in a greased 9 x 13-inch dish, pour prepared yellow cake mix over, bake at 350°F about 1 hour, invert onto foil to cool, and serve with whipped cream.
json: {"title": "Rhubarb Cake", "ingredients": ["5 c. rhubarb, cut in small pieces", "1 (3 oz.) pkg. raspberry Jell-O", "1 c. sugar", "3 c. miniature whole marshmallows", "1 pkg. yellow cake mix, prepared according to directions"], "directions": ["Place rhubarb in a well-greased 9 x 13-inch baking dish. Sprinkle Jell-O over rhubarb, then follow with the sugar and marshmallows.", "Pour prepared cake mix over the top and bake at 350° for an hour or until tester comes out clean.", "Wait about 5 minutes and then take a sharp knife and cut carefully around the outside of cake.", "Turn cake out onto a heavy piece of aluminum foil which has been placed on a cookie sheet.", "Be sure cookie sheet is large enough.", "Foil must be long and wide enough.", "Turn edges up to form a rim.", "Place pan with foil on it and invert carefully.", "Cool to serve.", "Top with whipped cream.", "Makes 12 to 16 servings."]}

text: The Best Sweet and Sour Cook 1/2 cup green pepper chunks and 1/2 cup onion chunks in 1 Tbsp. oil, add a sauce of pineapple syrup, vinegar, brown sugar, water, soy sauce, cornstarch, and catsup, cook until thick, stir in pineapple chunks, and serve over meat or tofu.
json: {"title": "The Best Sweet And Sour", "ingredients": ["1/2 c. green pepper chunks", "1/2 c. onion chunks", "1 Tbsp. cooking oil", "1 (13 1/2 oz.) can pineapple chunks", "1/3 c. vinegar", "2/3 c. brown sugar", "1/4 c. water", "2 Tbsp. soy sauce", "3 Tbsp. cornstarch", "2 Tbsp. catsup"], "directions": ["Cook peppers and onions in oil until tender-crisp.", "Blend syrup drained from pineapple with vinegar, sugar, water, catsup and cornstarch.", "Add to vegetables and cook, stirring until sauce boils and thickens.", "Add drained pineapple.", "Serve over fried chicken or leftover chunked pork that has been fried or fried tofu chunks.", "Serves 6 to 8."]}

text: English Toffee Bars Line a 13 x 9-inch pan with foil, cover with graham crackers, boil 1 cup brown sugar with 1 cup margarine, pour over crackers, bake at 400°F 5 minutes, sprinkle with chocolate pieces and nuts, chill, and break into pieces.
json: {"title": "English Toffee Bars", "ingredients": ["15 graham crackers", "1 c. packed brown sugar", "1 c. margarine or butter", "1 (6 oz.) pkg. milk chocolate pieces", "1/4 c. chopped nuts"], "directions": ["Line a 13 x 9 x 2-inch baking pan with", "aluminum", "foil. Grease well.", "Arrange crackers on bottom of", "pan, breaking, if necessary, to completely cover pan.", "Combine", "brown", "sugar and margarine", "in a medium pan.", "Cook and", "stir", "over", "medium-high heat until mixture boils.", "Remove from heat;", "pour over crackers.", "Bake", "in a", "400°", "oven 5 minutes.", "Remove", "from", "oven. Immediately sprinkle with chocolate pieces.", "When chocolate is soft, spread over top of sugar mixture.", "Sprinkle", "with", "nuts. Chill in the refrigerator 30 minutes.", "Break", "into", "bite", "size pieces.", "Makes 24 to 36 pieces."]}

text: Fruit Cobbler Cream 1/2 cup sugar with 1/4 cup butter, add 1 egg, 1/2 cup milk, baking powder, salt, and vanilla, spread in an 8-inch pan, mix peaches with honey and boiling water, pour on top, and bake at 375°F until golden.
json: {"title": "Fruit Cobbler", "ingredients": ["1/2 c. sugar", "1/4 c. butter", "1 egg", "1/2 c. milk", "2 tsp. baking powder", "dash of salt", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. sliced fresh peaches (fruit)", "1/3 c. honey", "1 c. boiling water"], "directions": ["Preheat oven to 375°.", "Cream sugar and butter.", "Add egg and beat well.", "Stir in milk.", "Sift together flour, baking powder and salt.", "Add sugar mixture and beat smooth.", "Stir in vanilla. Spread evenly over bottom of 8-inch square baking pan.", "Mix peaches, honey, boiling water and margarine.", "Pour on top of batter.", "Cake will rise to the top during baking."]}

text: No Bake Cookies Boil 2 cups sugar, 1/2 cup milk, 1/2 cup margarine, and 4 Tbsp. cocoa for 2 minutes, remove from heat, add 1/2 cup peanut butter, 2 1/2 cups oats, 1/4 cup nuts, and 2 tsp. vanilla, drop by spoonfuls, and cool.
json: {"title": "No Bake Cookies", "ingredients": ["2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. milk", "1/2 c. margarine", "4 Tbsp. cocoa", "2 1/2 c. oats", "1/4 c. nuts, chopped", "1/2 c. peanut butter", "2 tsp. vanilla"], "directions": ["Mix sugar, milk, margarine and cocoa.", "Bring to boil.", "Let boil over medium heat for 2 minutes.", "Remove from heat, then add peanut butter, nuts, oats and vanilla.", "Drop by teaspoon onto waxed paper.", "Let cool.", "Yields approximately 36 cookies."]}

text: Cream Cheese Rolls Mix 8 oz. cream cheese with 8 oz. sour cream, 2 tsp. picante sauce, and 1/2 chopped onion, spread on 10 tortillas, roll tightly, chill overnight, slice, and serve.
json: {"title": "Cream Cheese Rolls", "ingredients": ["10 flour tortillas", "8 oz. cream cheese", "8 oz. sour cream", "2 tsp. hot picante sauce", "1/2 medium onion, chopped fine"], "directions": ["Mix all ingredients and spread lightly on tortilla.", "Roll the tortilla tightly.", "Place rolls on plate and cover with plastic wrap.", "Chill in refrigerator overnight.", "Slice and serve."]}

text: Wedding Bell Lemonade Punch Combine frozen lemonade and pineapple concentrate with water, chill, then add ginger ale, sparkling water, and ice just before serving to make about 50 servings.
json: {"title": "Wedding Bell Lemonade Punch", "ingredients": ["4 (6 oz.) cans frozen lemonade concentrate", "4 cans water", "4 (6 oz.) frozen pineapple concentrate", "4 cans water", "3 (28 oz.) bottles ginger ale", "1 (28 oz.) sparkling water", "ice cubes or block of ice"], "directions": ["Combine juices and keep chilled.", "When ready to serve, add other ingredients and stir gently.", "Yields 50 (4 ounce) servings."]}

text: Zucchini Bread Blend 3 eggs, 1 cup oil, 1 Tbsp. vanilla, 2 cups sugar, and 2 cups grated zucchini, mix with dry ingredients, add raisins or pecans if desired, pour into pans, and bake at 325°F for 1 to 1 1/2 hours.
json: {"title": "Zucchini Bread", "ingredients": ["3 eggs", "1 c. oil", "1 Tbsp. vanilla", "2 c. sugar", "2 c. grated zucchini", "3 c. flour", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. baking powder", "1 Tbsp. cinnamon", "3/4 c. raisins (optional)", "3/4 c. chopped pecans (optional)"], "directions": ["Blend first 5 ingredients and set aside.", "Mix dry ingredients. Mix dry ingredients with wet ingredients until blended.", "Optionals can be added if desired.", "Pour batter into greased and floured loaf pans and bake at 325° for 1 to 1 1/2 hours.", "Yields 2 loaves."]}

text: Barbecue Turkey Loaf Mix stuffing, vegetables, water, and butter and let stand, combine turkey, eggs, and barbecue sauce, layer with cheese and vegetable mixture, top with sauce, and bake at 350°F for 45 minutes or microwave as directed.
json: {"title": "Barbecue Turkey Loaf", "ingredients": ["2 c. Stove Top chicken stuffing", "1 c. frozen mixed vegetables, thawed", "1/2 c. water", "1 Tbsp. butter, melted", "1/2 c. barbecue sauce", "2 slices American cheese, halved", "1 lb. ground turkey", "2 eggs"], "directions": ["Combine 1 cup stuffing mix, vegetables, water and butter.", "Let stand 5 minutes.", "Combine remaining stuffing mix, turkey, eggs and 1/4 cup of barbecue sauce.", "Mix well.", "Spoon a third of turkey mixture into baking dish and shape into 8 x 4-inch rectangle. Cover with half the cheese.", "Spoon vegetable mixture in center. Cover with remaining cheese.", "Pat remaining turkey mixture over cheese and shape into a loaf.", "Brush with remaining barbecue sauce. Conventional oven:", "350° for 45 minutes.", "Microwave Oven:", "Cook High 5 minutes.", "Rotate dish half turn; cook 5 minutes longer.", "Let stand 5 minutes."]}

text: Haupia Cook 3 cans coconut milk with 1/3 cup sugar, 1/2 cup cornstarch, and a dash of salt over medium heat until thickened, then pour into a greased 9-inch pan to set.
json: {"title": "Haupia", "ingredients": ["3 cans coconut milk", "1/3 c. sugar", "1/2 c. cornstarch", "dash of salt"], "directions": ["Cook over medium heat until thickened.", "Pour into a greased 9-inch pan."]}

text: Onion Casserole Layer 4 cups sliced onions, mushroom soup, melted butter, almonds, and crushed cornflakes in a casserole and bake uncovered at 350°F for 1 hour.
json: {"title": "Onion Casserole", "ingredients": ["4 cups sliced onions", "1 can mushroom soup", "1/2 stick melted butter", "1/2 cup almonds", "1 cup cornflakes- crushed"], "directions": ["Place in casserole, onion on bottom, soup, almonds, cornflake crumbs and butter on top.", "Bake uncovered, at 350 degrees for 1 hour."]}

text: Warm Apple Crisp Toss 6 cups sliced apples with 1/3 cup sugar, cinnamon, salt, and melted butter, place in a greased dish, and top with a mixture of sugar, flour, and butter, baking until bubbly and golden.
json: {"title": "Warm Apple Crisp", "ingredients": ["6 c. sliced and peeled apples (slice thin)", "1/3 c. sugar", "1 tsp. cinnamon", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 Tbsp. butter or margarine, melted", "3/4 c. sugar", "1/2 c. flour", "1/3 c. butter or margarine", "whipped topping"], "directions": ["Mix together apples, 1/3 cup sugar, cinnamon, salt and melted butter.", "Place in greased 8-inch square baking dish; set aside."]}

text: Hamburger and Macaroni Casserole Brown 1 lb. hamburger with diced onion, cook and drain macaroni, mix with 2 cans tomato soup, combine everything, and bake at 350°F for 30 minutes, topping with cheese if desired.
json: {"title": "Hamburger And Macaroni Casserole", "ingredients": ["1 lb. hamburger", "1 small onion, diced", "1 c. macaroni", "2 cans tomato soup"], "directions": ["Brown hamburger and onion.", "Cook macaroni in 2 quarts salted water, then drain.", "Add 2 cans tomato soup to the hamburger and macaroni.", "Bake at 350° for 30 minutes.", "Can be covered with cheese, then heated until cheese melts.", "Can add chopped celery or peppers to hamburger as well."]}

text: One-Rise Monkey Bread Prepare a yeast dough with flour, sugar, salt, yeast, warm water, butter, and egg, knead briefly, cut into pieces, dip in melted butter, layer in a tube pan with optional poppy seeds, let rise once, and bake at 375°F for 20 to 25 minutes.
json: {"title": "One-Rise Monkey Bread", "ingredients": ["3 to 3 1/2 c. unsifted all-purpose or bread flour", "2 Tbsp. sugar", "1 tsp. salt", "1 pkg. active dry yeast", "1 c. very warm water (120~ to 130~)", "2 Tbsp. butter or margarine, softened", "1 egg", "1/3 c. butter or margarine", "poppy seed (optional)"], "directions": ["Grease a 12-cup fluted tube pan or a 10-inch tube pan.", "In large bowl blend 1 1/2 cups flour, sugar, salt, yeast, water, margarine and egg at low speed until moistened.", "Beat three minutes at medium speed.", "Stir in remaining flour by hand.", "Knead dough on floured surface until smooth, about 1 minute.", "Press or roll dough to 15 x 12-inch rectangle.", "Using sharp knife, cut dough into diamond-shaped pieces by cutting into 2 inch strips diagonally across dough.", "In shallow pan melt 1/3 cup butter.", "Dip each piece of dough in melted butter and place in prepared pan, making layers. Sprinkle each layer with poppy seeds.", "Cover; let rise in warm place until light and doubled in size, 45 to 60 minutes.", "Heat oven to 375°.", "Bake 20 to 25 minutes.", "Cool in pan 2 minutes.", "Invert into serving pan.", "Makes a 10-inch pull apart loaf."]}

text: Easy “Apple Festival” Pie (Microwave) Layer 4 sliced apples with brown sugar and cinnamon, top with a crumb mixture of flour, oats, sugar, butter, cinnamon, and nutmeg, and microwave on high for 11 minutes total, rotating halfway.
json: {"title": "Easy \"Apple Festival\" Pie(Microwave)", "ingredients": ["4 apples, sliced", "3/4 c. plain flour", "1/2 c. quick cooking oats", "1 c. brown sugar", "1/2 stick butter", "3/4 tsp. cinnamon", "1/4 tsp. nutmeg"], "directions": ["Put apples", "in microwave dish.\tMix 1/2 cup of the brown sugar with", "the", "apples", "and", "sprinkle with 1/4 teaspoon of the cinnamon.", "Mix", "flour,", "oats,", "1/2\tcup", "sugar,", "margarine, 1/2 teaspoon", "cinnamon and nutmeg together until crumbly;", "sprinkle over apples.", "Microwave uncovered on High for 6 minutes; rotate dish 1/2 turn.", "Microwave uncovered another 5 minutes."]}

text: Dressed Eggs Halve 12 hard-boiled eggs, mash yolks with sweet relish, celery seed, chives, sugar, salad dressing, salt, and pepper, refill whites, and sprinkle tops.
json: {"title": "Dressed Eggs", "ingredients": ["12 eggs, hard-boiled and peeled", "3 Tbsp. sweet relish", "1 tsp. celery seed", "1/2 tsp. chives", "1 Tbsp. sugar", "salad dressing", "salt and pepper to taste"], "directions": ["Cut eggs in half. Take out yolks. Mash yolks with fork until smooth. Add the rest of the ingredients; just enough salad dressing to get the right smoothness. With a knife, put yolks back in egg whites. Sprinkle top."]}

text: Strawberry Pizza Mix melted butter, flour, brown sugar, and pecans, press into a pan and bake at 350°F 20 to 25 minutes, cool, spread with a cream cheese and confectioners sugar mixture folded with Cool Whip, top with cooked strawberry glaze and fresh strawberries, and chill.
json: {"title": "Strawberry Pizza", "ingredients": ["2 sticks melted butter", "2 c. plain flour", "1/3 c. light brown sugar", "1 c. chopped pecans", "1 (8 oz.) pkg. softened cream cheese", "3 c. sifted confectioners sugar", "1 large Cool Whip (8 oz.)", "1 c. sugar", "1 c. water", "3 Tbsp. cornstarch", "3 Tbsp. strawberry jello", "1 Tbsp. lemon juice", "2 pt. fresh strawberries"], "directions": ["Crust:", "Mix first 4 ingredients.", "Press into a rectangular pan.", "Brown lightly at 350° for 20 to 25 minutes.", "Cool."]}

text: Pumpkin Bread Mix dry ingredients, add oil, water, eggs, and pumpkin, pour into greased loaf pans, and bake at 350°F for 55 minutes, adding raisins if desired.
json: {"title": "Pumpkin Bread", "ingredients": ["3 1/2 c. flour", "3 c. sugar", "2 tsp. baking soda", "1 1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. cinnamon", "1 tsp. nutmeg", "1 c. oil", "2/3 c. water", "4 eggs", "2 c. canned pumpkin"], "directions": ["Combine dry ingredients and make a hole in the center.", "Add oil, water, eggs and pumpkin; mix together.", "Pour into 4 small greased loaf pans.", "Bake at 350° for 55 minutes.", "If desired, raisins can be added to mixture."]}

text: Santa Fe Nachos Top tortilla chips with cheese and slices of summer sausage, microwave until melted, then garnish with jalapeños, olives, guacamole, and tomatoes.
json: {"title": "Santa Fe Nachos", "ingredients": ["summer sausage", "sharp cheddar or Monterey Jack cheese", "Tortilla Chips", "jalapeno peppers", "black olives", "guacamole", "chopped tomatoes"], "directions": ["Top tortilla with cheese. Place a slice of sausage on each chip. Microwave until cheese melts. Garnish with peppers and olives. Serve with guacamole and tomatoes."]}

text: Frozen Raspberry Salad Dissolve raspberry Jell-O in hot water, add raspberries, mix with cream cheese, sour cream, cranberry sauce, and salt, freeze until firm, cut, and serve.
json: {"title": "Frozen Raspberry Salad", "ingredients": ["1 pkg. raspberry Jell-O", "1 c. hot water", "1 pkg. frozen raspberries, partially thawed", "2 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 c. sour cream", "1 (16 oz.) can whole berry cranberry sauce", "dash of salt"], "directions": ["Dissolve Jell-O in hot water.", "Add raspberries and stir until berries separate.", "Cream the cream cheese and gradually blend in sour cream and cranberry sauce.", "Stir gelatin mixture in gently and add dash of salt.", "Freeze in glass dish until firm.", "Cut into squares and serve with or without extra sour cream."]}

text: Coconut Chews Cream shortening with confectioners sugar, add flour, press into a pan and bake briefly, top with a mixture of eggs, brown sugar, flour, baking powder, salt, vanilla, walnuts, and coconut, bake again, ice while warm, cool, and cut into bars.
json: {"title": "Coconut Chews", "ingredients": ["3/4 c. shortening (half butter or margarine)", "3/4 c. confectioners sugar", "1 1/2 c. Gold Medal flour", "2 eggs", "1 c. brown sugar, packed", "2 Tbsp. flour", "1/2 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. chopped walnuts", "1/2 c. flaked coconut", "Orange-Lemon Icing (recipe follows)"], "directions": ["Heat oven to 350°.", "Cream shortening and confectioners sugar. Blend in flour.", "Press mixture in bottom of ungreased baking pan (13 x 9 x 2-inches).", "Bake 12 to 15 minutes.", "Mix remaining ingredients; spread over hot, baked layer.", "Bake 20 minutes longer.", "While warm, spread with Orange-Lemon Icing.", "Cool.", "Cut into bars about 3 x 1-inch.", "Makes 32 bars."]}

text: Rice-Broccoli Casserole Sauté onion and celery in margarine, cook rice and broccoli, combine with soups and cheese spread, bake at 375°F 10 minutes, and serve or refrigerate before baking.
json: {"title": "Rice-Broccoli Casserole", "ingredients": ["1/2 c. chopped onion", "1/2 c. chopped celery", "2 tsp. margarine", "1 c. rice (1 pkg. Success rice)", "1 pkg. frozen cut broccoli", "1 pkg. frozen broccoli florets", "1 can cream of chicken soup", "1 can cream of mushroom soup", "1 small jar Cheez Whiz"], "directions": ["Saute onion and celery in shortening until soft.", "Cook rice and broccoli separately according to directions.", "Mix all ingredients together in a 2 quart buttered baking dish.", "Bake at 375° for 10 minutes.", "May be prepared in advance and stored in refrigerator before baking.", "Diced cooked chicken breast may be added for variety."]}

text: Party Mix Toss Cheerios, Corn Chex, pretzels, and nuts with melted butter, Worcestershire sauce, garlic salt, and celery salt, bake at 250°F for 30 minutes stirring once.
json: {"title": "Party Mix", "ingredients": ["2 c. Cheerios", "2 c. Corn Chex", "2 c. pretzel sticks", "1 1/2 c. mixed nuts", "1/3 c. melted butter", "1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1/2 tsp. garlic salt", "1/2 tsp. celery salt"], "directions": ["Heat oven to 250°.", "Mix cereals, pretzels and nuts in oblong pan 13 x 9 x 2-inch.", "Blend butter and seasonings and pour over cereal mixture.", "Mix well.", "Bake 30 minutes stirring gently after 15 minutes."]}

text: Fettucini with Lemon Vegetables Cook fettucini, sauté vegetables in butter with lemon peel, heat milk and cream cheese until smooth, stir in Parmesan, toss with noodles, season with salt and pepper, and serve vegetables on top.
json: {"title": "Fettucini With Lemon Vegetables", "ingredients": ["7 oz. fettucini", "4 c. bite size pieces green vegies", "1/4 c. butter", "1 Tbsp. lemon peel", "1/2 c. milk", "3 oz. pkg. cream cheese", "1/2 c. Parmesan cheese", "salt", "pepper"], "directions": ["Cook noodles; cook vegies in butter over medium heat for about 7 minutes and toss with lemon peel.", "Heat milk and cream cheese in skillet until smooth; stir in Parmesan and toss with noodles. Serve with vegies on top."]}

text: Easy Banana Pudding Prepare 2 large pkg. instant vanilla pudding as directed on the package, then stir in 1 (12 oz.) container Cool Whip. Layer the bottom of a 9 x 13-inch dish with 1 box vanilla wafers, top with 1/2 of the bananas (about 6), pour on 1/2 of the pudding mixture, then add another layer of vanilla wafers and bananas, pour on the remaining pudding mixture, top with vanilla wafers, cover, and refrigerate overnight.
json: {"title": "Easy Banana Pudding", "ingredients": ["2 large pkg. instant vanilla pudding", "1 (12 oz.) container Cool Whip", "1 box vanilla wafers", "bananas (about 6)"], "directions": ["Prepare pudding as directed on package. Stir in Cool Whip. Layer bottom of 9 x 13-inch dish with vanilla wafers. Top with 1/2 of the bananas. Pour 1/2 of the pudding mixture over that. Add another layer of vanilla wafers and bananas. Pour on remaining pudding mixture. Top with vanilla wafers. Cover and refrigerate overnight."]}

text: Apricot Nectar Cake Combine 1 box lemon supreme cake mix, 3/4 c. cooking oil, 1 c. apricot nectar, and 1/2 c. sugar, then add 4 eggs one at a time. Bake at 350° for 45 minutes to 1 hour.
json: {"title": "Apricot Nectar Cake", "ingredients": ["1 box lemon supreme cake mix", "3/4 c. cooking oil", "4 eggs", "1 c. apricot nectar", "1/2 c. sugar"], "directions": ["Combine cake mix, apricot nectar, oil and sugar.", "Add eggs, 1 at a time.", "Bake at 350° for 45 minutes to 1 hour."]}

text: Chicken Or Turkey Casserole Mix 1/2 Tbsp. garlic salt, 1 (8 oz.) sour cream, 1 small onion chopped (1/4 c.), 1/2 c. milk, and 1 can cream of chicken soup, then add about 2 c. chopped chicken or turkey. Top with crushed Ritz crackers, chip butter on top, and bake at 300° for 30 to 40 minutes.
json: {"title": "Chicken Or Turkey Casserole", "ingredients": ["1/2 Tbsp. garlic salt", "1 (8 oz.) sour cream", "1 small onion, chopped (1/4 c.)", "1/2 c. milk", "1 can cream of chicken soup", "about 2 c. chopped chicken or turkey", "crushed Ritz crackers", "butter"], "directions": ["Mix first 5 ingredients together and add to chopped chicken or turkey.", "Top with crushed Ritz crackers. Chip butter on top and bake at 300° for 30 to 40 minutes."]}

text: Strawberry Salad Dissolve 2 large pkg. strawberry Jell-O in 2 c. boiling water, then add the remaining water to make 4 c. hot water total and let it set until it begins to thicken; stir in 1 pt. strawberries, 3 bananas diced, and 1 c. chopped pecans, let stand until firm, spread 1 large container Cool Whip on top, and refrigerate.
json: {"title": "Strawberry Salad", "ingredients": ["2 large pkg. strawberry Jell-O", "1 pt. strawberries", "3 bananas, diced", "1 large container Cool Whip", "4 c. hot water", "1 c. chopped pecans"], "directions": ["Mix Jell-O with 2 cups boiling water, then add rest of water. Let set until it begins to thicken.", "Add fruit and nuts.", "Let stand until firm.", "Spread Cool Whip on top.", "Refrigerate."]}

text: Maple-Bacon Oven Pancake Heat oven to 425°, grease and flour a 9 x 13-inch pan, beat 1 1/2 c. Bisquick, 1 Tbsp. sugar, 3/4 c. milk, 1/4 c. syrup, and 2 eggs with a hand beater along with 1 cup of the 1 1/2 c. shredded cheese (reserve bacon and the remaining cheese), pour into the pan, bake uncovered 10 to 15 minutes, sprinkle with bacon and the remaining cheese, then bake 3 to 4 minutes more until the cheese is melted (serves 8 to 10).
json: {"title": "Maple-Bacon Oven Pancake", "ingredients": ["1 1/2 c. Bisquick", "1 Tbsp. sugar", "1 1/2 c. shredded cheese", "3/4 c. milk", "1/4 c. syrup", "2 eggs"], "directions": ["Heat oven to 425°.", "Grease and flour 9 x 13-inch pan.", "Beat all ingredients except bacon and 1 cup cheese with hand beater. Pour into pan.", "Bake, uncovered, for 10 to 15 minutes.", "Sprinkle pancake with bacon and cheese.", "Bake until the cheese is melted (3 to 4 minutes).", "Serves 8 to 10."]}

text: Coca-Cola Pork Chops Place 8 pork chops in a baking pan and season with salt and pepper to taste, mix 1 c. catsup with 1 c. Coca-Cola and pour over the pork chops, sprinkle with brown sugar, and bake at 350° for 1 hour.
json: {"title": "Coca-Cola Pork Chops", "ingredients": ["8 pork chops", "1 c. catsup", "1 c. Coca-Cola", "brown sugar", "salt and pepper to taste"], "directions": ["Place the pork chops in a baking pan; season with salt and pepper.", "Mix catsup and Coca-Cola and pour over pork chops. Sprinkle with brown sugar.", "Bake in 350° oven for 1 hour."]}

text: Fruit Salad Cook 3 oz. pkg. vanilla pudding in the fruit juices until it boils, then pour over 2 cans mandarin oranges, 2 cans pineapple chunks, 4 bananas sliced, strawberries, and grapes; eat immediately or refrigerate, and it’s also great with vanilla ice cream.
json: {"title": "Fruit Salad", "ingredients": ["2 cans mandarin oranges", "2 cans pineapple chunks", "4 bananas, sliced", "strawberries", "grapes", "3 oz. pkg. vanilla pudding"], "directions": ["Cook pudding in fruit juices until it boils.", "Pour over fruit. Eat immediately or refrigerate.", "Also great with vanilla ice cream."]}

text: Dirty Rice Bring 8 cups water and 1 tablespoon salt to a boil, add 3 c. raw rice, cover, bring back to a full boil, turn off the heat, and leave covered on the burner 30 minutes; sauté 1 lb. hamburger and 1 lb. hot sausage, sauté 1 green pepper chopped and 2 c. celery chopped, then combine everything with the cooked rice and add 2 c. green onions chopped (this makes a lot and can be cut in half).
json: {"title": "Dirty Rice", "ingredients": ["1 lb. hamburger", "1 green pepper, chopped", "2 c. celery, chopped", "3 c. raw rice", "1 lb. hot sausage", "1/4 tsp. garlic powder", "2 c. green onions, chopped"], "directions": ["Bring 8 cups water and 1 tablespoon salt to boil.", "Add rice. Cover.", "Bring back to full boil.", "Turn off heat.", "Leave covered on burner 30 minutes.", "Saute meat.", "Saute vegetables.", "Combine with cooked rice.", "This makes a lot.", "Can cut recipe in half."]}

text: Sunday Dinner Put 1 pick of the chick pack, 5 potatoes peeled and cut up, 3 carrots peeled and cut up, and 1 jar Chicken Tonight (French) into a roasting pan in the order given, cover, and bake at 325° to 350° from 8:30 a.m. until you get home from church; skin the chicken to remove as much fat as possible and serve with salad or applesauce.
json: {"title": "Sunday Dinner", "ingredients": ["1 pick of the chick pack", "5 potatoes, peeled and cut up", "3 carrots, peeled and cut up", "1 jar Chicken Tonight (French)"], "directions": ["Put all ingredients in roasting pan in order given.", "Cover and bake at 325° to 350° from 8:30 a.m. until you get home from church.", "I skin my chicken to remove as much fat as possible. Serve with salad or applesauce."]}

text: Chocolate Macaroon Bars Preheat oven to 350°, combine 1 1/4 c. graham cracker crumbs, 1/3 c. sugar, 1/4 c. cocoa, and 1/3 c. melted margarine, press firmly into the bottom of a 13 x 9-inch baking pan, and bake 10 minutes.
json: {"title": "Chocolate Macaroon Bars", "ingredients": ["1 1/4 c. graham cracker crumbs", "1/3 c. sugar", "1/4 c. cocoa", "1/3 c. melted margarine", "1 (14 oz.) can sweetened condensed milk", "1 (7 oz.) pkg. coconut flakes", "2 c. fresh bread crumbs (4 slices)", "2 eggs", "2 tsp. vanilla extract", "1 c. chocolate chips"], "directions": ["Preheat oven to 350°.", "Combine graham cracker crumbs, sugar, cocoa and margarine; press firmly on bottom of a 13 x 9-inch baking pan.", "Bake 10 minutes."]}

text: Chicken Breasts In Lemon Sauce Cut 4 boneless, skinless chicken breast halves (about 1 1/2 lb.) horizontally to make 2 thin slices each, coat with 1/2 c. all-purpose flour, heat 1/4 c. butter in a 12-inch skillet over medium heat, and cook the chicken with 2 tsp. chopped garlic in the butter for 4 to 6 minutes, turning once, until browned; add 1 c. dry white wine or apple juice and 2 Tbsp. lemon juice, sprinkle with 1/2 tsp. pepper, heat until hot, and sprinkle with 1 Tbsp. large capers, drained, if desired.
json: {"title": "Chicken Breasts In Lemon Sauce", "ingredients": ["4 boneless, skinless chicken breast halves (about 1 1/2 lb.)", "1/2 c. all-purpose flour", "1/4 c. butter", "2 tsp. chopped garlic", "1 c. dry white wine or apple juice", "2 Tbsp. lemon juice", "1/2 tsp. pepper", "1 Tbsp. large capers, drained (if desired)"], "directions": ["Cut each chicken breast horizontally to make 2 thin slices. Coat with flour. Heat butter in 12-inch skillet over medium heat. Cook chicken and garlic in butter for 4 to 6 minutes, turning once until chicken is brown.", "Add wine and lemon juice.", "Sprinkle with pepper.", "Heat until hot.", "Sprinkle with capers."]}

text: Spaghetti Meat Sauce Brown 1 lb. ground beef in a small Dutch oven until crumbly and drain well, stir in 1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce, 1 c. water, 2 Tbsp. dried onion flakes, 2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce, 1/2 tsp. garlic powder, and 1/4 tsp. pepper, bring to a boil over medium heat, cover and simmer 20 minutes stirring occasionally, add 1 (14 oz.) jar spaghetti sauce and simmer uncovered 20 minutes, cook 8 oz. spaghetti as directed and drain, then spoon meat sauce over spaghetti and sprinkle with grated Parmesan cheese (yields 4 servings).
json: {"title": "Spaghetti Meat Sauce", "ingredients": ["1 lb. ground beef", "1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce", "1 c. water", "2 Tbsp. dried onion flakes", "2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1/2 tsp. garlic powder", "1/4 tsp. pepper", "1 (14 oz.) jar spaghetti sauce", "8 oz. spaghetti", "grated Parmesan cheese"], "directions": ["Brown ground beef in small Dutch oven, stirring until it crumbles; drain well.", "Stir in tomato sauce, water, dried onion flakes, Worcestershire sauce, garlic powder and pepper.", "Bring to a boil over medium heat.", "Cover, reduce heat and simmer 20 minutes, stirring occasionally.", "Add spaghetti sauce and simmer uncovered 20 minutes.", "Cook spaghetti as package directs and drain.", "Spoon meat sauce over cooked spaghetti.", "Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.", "Yields 4 servings."]}

text: Old Fashion Punch Combine 2 Tbsp. sugar, 2 Tbsp. bitters, 2 1/2 c. whiskey, and 1/2 c. water, then just before serving add an ice ring and 2 quarts chilled 7-Up and decorate with sliced oranges and maraschino cherries.
json: {"title": "Old Fashion Punch", "ingredients": ["2 Tbsp. sugar", "2 Tbsp. bitters", "2 1/2 c. whiskey", "1/2 c. water"], "directions": ["Just before serving, add ice ring and 2 quarts chilled 7-Up. Add sliced oranges and maraschino cherries for decoration."]}

text: Dill Dip Mix 1 c. Hellmann’s mayonnaise, 1 c. sour cream, 1 Tbsp. minced onion, 1 tsp. seasoned salt, and 1/2 tsp. dill weed together, then let sit for 1 hour.
json: {"title": "Dill Dip", "ingredients": ["1 c. Hellmann's mayonnaise", "1 c. sour cream", "1 Tbsp. minced onion", "1 tsp. seasoned salt", "1/2 tsp. dill weed"], "directions": ["Mix ingredients together.", "Let sit for 1 hour."]}

text: Zucchini Stew Heat 1/4 c. oil in a large saucepot, add 2 large zucchini cut in large cubes, 2 green or red peppers cut up, 2 onions chopped, and 3 medium size tomatoes peeled and sliced, cover with a lid (do not add water because water cooks out of zucchini), cook until zucchini is soft about 1 hour, then add 1 can green beans drained last, and it’s especially good served with cooked smoked sausage or ham.
json: {"title": "Zucchini Stew", "ingredients": ["2 large zucchini, cut in large cubes", "2 green or red peppers, cut up", "2 onions, chopped", "3 medium size tomatoes, peeled and sliced", "1/4 c. oil", "1 can green beans, drained"], "directions": ["Heat oil in large saucepot; add zucchini, peppers, onions and tomatoes.", "Cover with lid.", "Do not add water as water cooks out of zucchini.", "Cook until zucchini is soft, about 1 hour.", "Add green beans last.", "Especially good served with cooked smoked sausage or ham."]}

text: Party Potatoes Prepare 4 c. mashed potatoes as you normally would but do not use salt, then add 1 pkg. Hidden Valley Ranch dressing mix.
json: {"title": "Party Potatoes", "ingredients": ["4 c. mashed potatoes", "1 pkg. Hidden Valley Ranch dressing mix"], "directions": ["Prepare mashed potatoes as you normally would, but do not use salt.", "Add the package of Ranch dressing mix to your potatoes."]}

text: Gran’s Toll House Cookies Sift 1 1/2 c. sifted flour once before measuring, then sift with 1 tsp. soda and 1 tsp. salt; cream 1 c. shortening until soft, add 3/4 c. brown sugar firmly packed and 3/4 c. granulated sugar gradually and cream until light and fluffy, add 2 eggs (unbeaten) one at a time beating after each, add 1 tsp. hot water, then add the sifted dry ingredients, stir in 1 c. nut meats cut fine (optional), 2 (14 oz.) pkg. Nestle semi-sweet chocolate in pieces, and 2 c. oatmeal (quick or regular; uncooked), add 1 tsp. vanilla and blend well, drop by half teaspoons on a greased cookie sheet, and bake at 375° for 8 minutes (makes 100).
json: {"title": "Gran'S Toll House Cookies", "ingredients": ["1 1/2 c. sifted flour", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. salt", "1 c. shortening", "3/4 c. brown sugar, firmly packed", "3/4 c. granulated sugar", "2 eggs (unbeaten)", "1 tsp. hot water", "1 c. nut meats, cut fine", "2 (14 oz.) pkg. Nestle semi-sweet chocolate, in pieces", "2 c. oatmeal (quick or regular; uncooked)", "1 tsp. vanilla"], "directions": ["Sift flour once before measuring, then sift with soda and salt. Cream shortening until soft.", "Add sugars gradually, creaming until light and fluffy.", "Add eggs one at a time, beating after each addition.", "Add hot water to creamed mixture, then sifted dry ingredients.", "Add nut meats, Nestle chocolate and oatmeal and mix thoroughly.", "Add vanilla and blend well.", "Drop by half teaspoons on a greased cookie sheet.", "Nut meats may be omitted.", "Bake at 375° for 8 minutes.", "Makes 100."]}

text: Hominy Casserole (Large Recipe; Make Half) Butter a dish and cook 1/2 large onion in 1/2 stick oleo, then add 1 can cream of mushroom soup, 2 cans yellow hominy drained, and 1 small jar hot Cheez Whiz (jalapeno Whiz), pour into the buttered dish, crush some Fritos on top, and bake at 350° until it bubbles, about 35 to 45 minutes.
json: {"title": "Hominy Casserole(Large Recipe; Make Half)", "ingredients": ["2 cans yellow hominy, drained", "1/2 stick oleo", "1/2 large onion", "1 can cream of mushroom soup", "1 small jar hot Cheez Whiz (jalapeno Whiz)", "some Fritos"], "directions": ["Butter dish; cook onion in oleo.", "Add soup, hominy and Cheez Whiz.", "Pour into buttered dish; crush Fritos to top the casserole. Cook at 350° until it bubbles, about 35 to 45 minutes."]}

text: “Glop” Cook and drain 2 c. dry macaroni (cooked) and 8 oz. rigatoni or other favorite pasta, then while it’s cooking heat 1/4 c. olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat, add 1 lb. medium shrimp peeled and deveined, 1 green pepper cut into short thin strips, 1 yellow or red pepper cut into short thin strips, 1 c. sliced mushrooms, 3 cloves garlic minced, and 1 Tbsp. dry basil crumbled, cook stirring frequently until shrimp are cooked through and peppers are almost tender (3 to 4 minutes), stir in 2 medium tomatoes coarsely chopped and 1 c. picante sauce and simmer 2 to 3 minutes stirring frequently, add pasta and mix well, and serve with grated Parmesan cheese and additional picante sauce if desired.
json: {"title": "\"Glop\"", "ingredients": ["2 lb. lean hamburg", "1 can beef bouillon", "1 small onion, chopped", "1 c. chopped celery", "1 c. frozen or fresh corn", "2 Tbsp. corn or potato starch", "2 Tbsp. ketchup", "1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce", "2 c. dry macaroni, cooked", "8 oz. rigatoni or other favorite pasta", "1/4 c. olive oil", "1 lb. medium shrimp, peeled and deveined", "1 green pepper, cut into short, thin strips", "1 yellow or red pepper, cut into short, thin strips", "1 c. sliced mushrooms", "3 cloves garlic, minced", "1 Tbsp. dry basil, crumbled", "2 medium tomatoes, coarsely chopped", "1 c. picante sauce", "grated Parmesan cheese"], "directions": ["Cook and drain pasta.", "While it's cooking, heat oil in large skillet over medium-high heat.", "Add shrimp, peppers, mushrooms, garlic and basil.", "Cook, stirring frequently, to prevent sticking, until shrimp are cooked through and peppers are almost tender (3 to 4 minutes).", "Stir in tomatoes and picante sauce; simmer 2 to 3 minutes (stirring frequently).", "Add pasta; mix well.", "Serve with cheese and additional picante sauce, if desired."]}

text: Poached Chicken Breast In Wine Place 4 (4 oz.) skinned, boned chicken breast halves between two sheets of heavy-duty plastic wrap and flatten to 1/4 inch, combine 3/4 c. Chablis or other dry wine with 2 1/2 c. sliced fresh mushrooms, 2 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley, 1/2 tsp. salt, and 1/4 tsp. pepper in a large skillet and bring to a boil over high heat, arrange chicken in a single layer, cover and reduce heat and simmer 15 minutes or until tender, remove chicken to a serving plate, mix 1 Tbsp. cornstarch with 2 tsp. water and stir into the skillet, bring to a boil and boil 1 minute stirring constantly, then pour sauce over chicken (yields 4 servings).
json: {"title": "Poached Chicken Breast In Wine", "ingredients": ["4 (4 oz.) skinned, boned chicken breast halves", "3/4 c. Chablis or other dry wine", "2 1/2 c. sliced fresh mushrooms", "2 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. pepper", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "2 tsp. water"], "directions": ["Place", "chicken between two sheets of heavy-duty plastic wrap. Remove chicken", "to", "serving", "plate.", "Combine", "cornstarch", "and water; stir", "into", "skillet.", "Bring", "mixture to a boil; boil 1 minute, stirring constantly.", "Pour sauce over chicken.", "Yields 4 servings."]}

text: Quick Spanish Rice Casserole Brown 1 lb. ground meat with 1 onion, season with salt and pepper to taste, add 2 cans Brown Beauty Spanish rice and 1 or 2 cans Ranch Style beans and heat to boiling, pour into a casserole, top with 1 lb. Cheddar cheese, add 1 tsp. chili powder if desired, and serve with Doritos and a salad (great for camping).
json: {"title": "Quick Spanish Rice Casserole", "ingredients": ["2 cans Brown Beauty Spanish rice", "1 or 2 cans Ranch Style beans", "1 lb. ground meat", "1 onion", "1 lb. Cheddar cheese", "1 tsp. chili powder (if desired)"], "directions": ["Brown meat and onion.", "Add salt and pepper to taste.", "Add rice and beans; heat to boiling and put in casserole.", "Top with cheese and serve with Doritos and a salad.", "Great for camping."]}

text: Glazed Pecans In one bowl beat 1 tbsp. water with 1 egg white until frothy but not stiff, in a second bowl mix 1 c. sugar with 1 tsp. salt and 1 tsp. cinnamon, preheat oven to 300 degrees, stir 1 lb. pecan halves into the egg white mixture until evenly coated, add the sugar mixture, spread on a large cookie sheet sprayed with Pam, bake at 300 degrees for 30 minutes stirring every 15 minutes (including after the last 15 minutes), then pour onto waxed paper until cooled and store in an airtight container.
json: {"title": "Glazed Pecans", "ingredients": ["1 lb. pecan halves", "1 tbsp. water", "1 tsp. salt", "1 egg white", "1 c. sugar", "1 tsp. cinnamon"], "directions": ["1st bowl - Combine water and egg white and beat until frothy but not stiff. 2nd bowl- Mix together sugar, salt, and cinnamon; set aside.", "Preheat oven to 300 degrees.", "Pour pecans into egg white and stir with a large serving spoon until the nuts are evenly coated.", "Add sugar mixture.", "Spread on large cookie sheet that has been sprayed with Pam and bake at 300 degrees for 30 minutes, stirring every 15 minutes-including after the last 15 minutes. Pour onto waxed paper until cooled.", "Store in an airtight container."]}

text: Crock Pot Pizza Brown 1 1/2 pounds hamburger with 1 chopped onion and 1 chopped green pepper and drain, add 2 small jars pizza sauce and simmer, cook and drain 1 large bag noodles, then layer meat, noodles, 1 can mushrooms, 1 bag pizza cheese, and 1 package pepperoni in the crock pot and cook on low for 90 minutes.
json: {"title": "Crock Pot Pizza", "ingredients": ["1 1/2 pounds hamburger", "2 small jars pizza sauce", "1 bag pizza cheese", "1 can mushrooms", "1 chopped onion", "1 chopped green pepper", "1 large bag noodles", "1 package pepperoni"], "directions": ["Brown meat with onions and peppers and drain.", "Add sauce and simmer.", "Cook noodles and drain.", "Layer meat, noodles, mushrooms, cheese and pepperoni in crock pot.", "Cook on low for 90 minutes."]}

text: Summer Squash Casserole Cook 2 lb. yellow sumer squash or zucchini sliced (6 c.) with 1/4 c. chopped onion in boiling salted water for 5 minutes and drain, mix 1 can condensed cream of chicken soup with 1 c. dairy sour cream and stir in 1 c. shredded carrot, fold in the drained squash and onion, mix 1 (8 oz.) pkg. herb seasoned stuffing mix (Pepperidge Farm; not cubed) with 1/2 c. butter or margarine melted, spread half the stuffing mixture in the bottom of a 9 x 13-inch baking dish, spoon the vegetable mixture on top, sprinkle with remaining stuffing, and bake at 350° for 25 to 30 minutes or until heated through.
json: {"title": "Summer Squash Casserole", "ingredients": ["2 lb. yellow sumer squash or zucchini, sliced (6 c.)", "1/4 c. chopped onion", "1 can condensed cream of chicken soup", "1 c. dairy sour cream", "1 c. shredded carrot", "1 (8 oz.) pkg. herb seasoned stuffing mix (Pepperidge Farm; not cubed)", "1/2 c. butter or margarine, melted"], "directions": ["In a saucepan cook sliced squash and chopped onion in boiling salted water for 5 minutes.", "Drain.", "Combine soup and sour cream. Stir in shredded carrot.", "Fold in drained squash and onion. Combine stuffing mix and butter or margarine.", "Spread half of stuffing mixture on bottom of 9 x 13-inch baking dish.", "Spoon vegetable mixture on top.", "Sprinkle remaining stuffing over vegetables.", "Bake in 350° oven for 25 to 30 minutes or until heated through."]}

text: Green Jello Salad Dissolve 2 pkg. lime Jell-O in 1 cup boiling water, add 1 cup cold water, mix in 1 carton cottage cheese, 1 can drained crushed pineapple, 1 Tbsp. sugar, and 1 tsp. white vinegar, then chill until set.
json: {"title": "Green Jello Salad", "ingredients": ["2 pkg. lime Jell-O", "1 carton cottage cheese", "1 can drained, crushed pineapple", "1 Tbsp. sugar", "1 tsp. white vinegar", "2 c. water"], "directions": ["Dissolve Jell-O in 1 cup boiling water.", "Add 1 cup cold water. Mix with other ingredients and chill until set."]}

text: German Potatoes Brown 1 small onion chopped in 2 Tbsp. butter, add 6 medium potatoes cut in cubes plus 4 Tbsp. parsley chopped and salt and pepper, barely cover with hot water, cover and cook until potatoes are tender (serves 6).
json: {"title": "German Potatoes", "ingredients": ["1 small onion, chopped", "2 Tbsp. butter", "6 medium potatoes, cut in cubes", "4 Tbsp. parsley, chopped", "salt and pepper"], "directions": ["Brown onion in hot butter; add potatoes, parsley and seasonings.", "Barely cover with hot water; cook in covered pan until potatoes are tender.", "Serves 6."]}

text: Fullabull’s Shepherd’s Pie Brown 1 1/2 lb. ground beef with 1 onion chopped and drain well, spread in a 13 x 9-inch pan, pour over 2 cans mixed vegetables (drained), mix 2 envelopes of the 3 envelopes brown gravy mix and pour over the layers, then continue with the 8 servings instant potatoes as the topping (remaining steps are not included in the provided lines).
json: {"title": "Fullabull'S Shepherd'S Pie", "ingredients": ["1 1/2 lb. ground beef", "1 onion, chopped", "2 cans mixed vegetables", "3 envelopes brown gravy mix", "8 servings instant potatoes"], "directions": ["Brown meat and onion; drain well.", "Place in a 13 x 9-inch pan. Pour the mixed vegetables (drained) over the meat mixture.", "Mix 2 envelopes of gravy mix; pour over the meat and vegetable layers."]}

text: Sauteed Bananas Peel bananas, cut in half lengthwise and again cut in half crosswise, sprinkle with flour, sauté in butter until delicately brown, drain, and sprinkle with confectioners sugar.
json: {"title": "Sauteed Bananas", "ingredients": ["bananas", "confectioners sugar", "flour", "butter"], "directions": ["Peel bananas, cut in half lengthwise, and again cut in half crosswise.", "Sprinkle with flour.", "Saute in butter until delicately brown.", "Drain.", "Sprinkle with confectioners sugar."]}

text: Never Fail Jello Salad Dissolve 1 large jello (any flavor) in 1 c. boiling water, partly dissolve 1 c. small marshmallows in the jello mixture, then add 1 c. cottage cheese, 1/2 c. mayonnaise, 1 (20 oz.) can crushed pineapple (not drained), and 9 oz. Cool Whip or small Cool Whip, then pour into a mold or pretty glass dish, remembering not to drain the pineapple.
json: {"title": "Never Fail Jello Salad", "ingredients": ["1 large jello (any flavor)", "1 c. boiling water", "1 c. small marshmallows", "1 c. cottage cheese", "1/2 c. mayonnaise", "1 (20 oz.) can crushed pineapple (not drained)", "9 oz. Cool Whip or small Cool Whip"], "directions": ["Dissolve jello with boiling water, then dissolve marshmallows partly in jello mixture.", "Add the rest of the ingredients and put in a mold or any pretty glass dish.", "Remember, do not drain pineapple."]}

text: Fruit Cobbler Melt 3/4 stick margarine and pour into a 2-inch deep dish, add fruit of your choice (I use peaches, strawberries, blackberries, cherries, etc.), mix 1 c. sugar with 1 c. milk and 1 c. flour, pour over fruit without stirring, and bake at 350° until brown or fruit is done (approximately 30 minutes).
json: {"title": "Fruit Cobbler", "ingredients": ["3/4 stick margarine", "fruit of your choice (I use peaches, strawberries, blackberries, cherries, etc.)", "1 c. sugar", "1 c. milk", "1 c. flour"], "directions": ["Melt margarine.", "Put in 2-inch deep dish.", "Add fruit of your choice.", "Mix together sugar, milk and flour.", "Mix well and pour over fruit.", "Do not stir.", "Cook until brown or fruit is done at 350° (approximately 30 minutes)."]}

text: Poppy Seed Cake Beat 4 eggs, 1/4 c. poppy seed, 1/2 c. pineapple juice, 1 tsp. almond extract, 1/2 c. shortening, and 1/2 c. rum for 2 minutes, then add 1 pkg. white cake mix and 1 pkg. instant vanilla pudding and beat 2 more minutes, grease a Bundt pan, pour in batter, dust top with cinnamon-sugar, bake at 350° for 45 to 55 minutes, and when cool sprinkle with powdered sugar.
json: {"title": "Poppy Seed Cake", "ingredients": ["4 eggs", "1/4 c. poppy seed", "1/2 c. pineapple juice", "1 pkg. white cake mix", "1 pkg. instant vanilla pudding", "cinnamon-sugar", "powdered sugar", "1 tsp. almond extract", "1/2 c. shortening", "1/2 c. rum"], "directions": ["Beat first 6 ingredients for 2 minutes.", "Then add cake mix and pudding.", "Beat for 2 additional minutes.", "Grease Bundt pan.", "Pour in batter.", "Dust top with cinnamon-sugar.", "Bake at 350° for 45 to 55 minutes.", "When cool, sprinkle with powdered sugar."]}

text: Magloubeh Soak 1 lb. rice for 1 hour in warm water, cook 2 lb. chicken or lamb in water, remove the meat and add a little butter or margarine to the water, use this leftover water with the rice, fry 2 large eggplant and 1 head cauliflower in cooking oil (and a few potatoes sliced thin if optional), then in a large pot layer the meat on the bottom, then the eggplant and cauliflower, then the rice and the meat water on top, cover and cook to a boil until the water begins to dry (about 15 to 20 minutes), turn heat down to low until it is all dry, turn heat off and let set for 20 to 30 minutes, then turn upside down onto a platter and serve with yogurt or salad (season with salt and pepper to taste and 1/2 tsp. bahar).
json: {"title": "Magloubeh", "ingredients": ["2 lb. chicken or lamb", "1 lb. rice", "2 large eggplant", "1 head cauliflower", "a few potatoes, sliced thin (optional)", "salt and pepper to taste", "1/2 tsp. bahar (Middle Eastern spice)"], "directions": ["Soak the rice for 1 hour in warm water.", "Cook the meat in water.", "Remove the meat and add a little butter or margarine in the water.", "Put this water left over with the rice.", "Fry the eggplant and cauliflower with cooking oil.", "In a large pot, put the meat in the bottom, then the eggplant and cauliflower, then the rice and water from meat on top.", "Cover pot and cook to a boil until the water begins to dry (about 15 to 20 minutes).", "Turn heat down to low until it is all dry.", "Turn heat off and let set for 20 to 30 minutes.", "Turn upside down on a platter.", "Serves a lot.", "Serve with yogurt or salad."]}

text: Whole Wheat Carrot Cake Blend 1 c. oil with 1 c. brown sugar and 1 c. sugar until mixed, add 1 tsp. vanilla and beat in 4 eggs one at a time, in another bowl blend 1/3 c. dry milk powder, 1 tsp. baking powder, 2 tsp. cinnamon, 1 tsp. soda, 1 tsp. salt, and 2 c. whole wheat flour, add dry ingredients to the egg mixture until well blended, stir in 3 c. finely shredded carrots and 1 c. chopped walnuts by hand, pour into a greased and floured tube or Bundt pan, bake at 350° for 50 to 60 minutes, cool in pan, invert onto serving plate, and sprinkle with powdered sugar (optional glaze or cream cheese icing).
json: {"title": "Whole Wheat Carrot Cake", "ingredients": ["1 c. oil", "1 c. brown sugar", "4 eggs", "1/3 c. dry milk powder", "1 tsp. baking powder", "2 tsp. cinnamon", "1 c. chopped walnuts", "1 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 c. whole wheat flour", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. salt", "3 c. finely shredded carrots"], "directions": ["In large mixing bowl blend oil and sugars until mixed.", "Add vanilla and beat in eggs, one at a time.", "In another bowl blend dry ingredients.", "Add to egg mixture until well blended.", "By hand, stir in carrots and walnuts.", "pour into greased and floured tube or Bundt pan.", "Bake at 350° for 50 to 60 minutes.", "Cool in pan; invert on serving plate and sprinkle with powdered sugar.", "Could use glaze or cream cheese icing."]}

text: Pickled Squash Soak 8 c. sliced squash, 8 c. sliced onions, and 5 bell peppers sliced in 1 gal. water with 1 c. salt for 1 hour, then drain and rinse well (remaining steps using 2 c. vinegar, 3 c. sugar, 2 tsp. mustard seed, 2 tsp. celery seed, and 1 tsp. curry powder are not included in the provided lines).
json: {"title": "Pickled Squash", "ingredients": ["8 c. sliced squash", "8 c. sliced onions", "5 bell peppers, sliced", "1 c. salt in 1 gal. water", "2 c. vinegar", "3 c. sugar", "2 tsp. mustard seed", "2 tsp. celery seed", "1 tsp. curry powder"], "directions": ["Soak squash, onions and peppers in salt water 1 hour.", "Drain and rinse well."]}

text: Pasta Salad Dice and mix together 1/4 lb. Provolone cheese, 1/4 lb. salami, 1/4 lb. pepperoni, 1 large pepper, 1 small jar olives, 3 tomatoes, 2 onions, 3 stems celery, and 1 box medium shells cooked and drained.
json: {"title": "Pasta Salad", "ingredients": ["1/4 lb. Provolone cheese", "1/4 lb. salami", "1/4 lb. pepperoni", "1 large pepper", "1 small jar olives", "3 tomatoes", "2 onions", "3 stems celery", "1 box medium shells, cooked and drained"], "directions": ["Dice and mix all ingredients together."]}

text: Vegetable Burger Soup Brown 1 lb. ground beef and drain off fat, stir in 2 cups of water plus 1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes, 1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce, 1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen mixed vegetables, 1/4 c. dry onion soup mix, and 1 tsp. sugar, bring to a boil, reduce heat, cover, and simmer 20 minutes (serves 6 to 8).
json: {"title": "Vegetable Burger Soup", "ingredients": ["1 lb. ground beef", "1 (16 oz.) can tomatoes", "1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce", "1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen mixed vegetables", "1/4 c. dry onion soup mix", "1 tsp. sugar"], "directions": ["Brown meat and drain off fat.", "Stir in 2 cups of water and remaining ingredients.", "Bring to a boil.", "Reduce heat and cover. Simmer 20 minutes.", "Serves 6 to 8."]}

text: Corn Light Bread Mix 2 c. self-rising meal, 1/2 c. plain flour, 3/4 c. sugar, 1 tsp. salt, 1/2 tsp. baking powder, 1/2 tsp. soda, 2 c. buttermilk, and 1 Tbsp. lard, pour into a regular size loaf pan, bake at 350° for 1 hour, and let cool before serving.
json: {"title": "Corn Light Bread", "ingredients": ["2 c. self-rising meal", "1/2 c. plain flour", "3/4 c. sugar", "1 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 tsp. soda", "2 c. buttermilk", "1 Tbsp. lard"], "directions": ["Mix ingredients and pour into a regular size loaf pan. Bake at 350° for 1 hour.", "Let cool before serving."]}

text: Salad Luncheon Beans Brown 1/2 to 1 lb. ground beef with 1 medium onion chopped and drain, then in a 2-quart baking dish mix (do not drain) 1 large (28 oz.) can Bush’s beans, 1 (15 1/2 oz.) can butter beans, 1 (15 oz.) can red kidney beans, and 1 (16 oz.) can pork and beans with the beef, then add 1/2 c. catsup, 1 Tbsp. mustard, 1/4 c. brown sugar, and 1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce and bake on low heat for 5 to 6 hours.
json: {"title": "Salad Luncheon Beans", "ingredients": ["1/2 to 1 lb. ground beef", "1 medium onion, chopped", "1 large (28 oz.) can Bush's beans", "1 (15 1/2 oz.) can butter beans", "1 (15 oz.) can red kidney beans", "1 (16 oz.) can pork and beans", "1/2 c. catsup", "1 Tbsp. mustard", "1/4 c. brown sugar", "1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce"], "directions": ["Do not drain any beans; mix together.", "Brown beef and onion; drain.", "In a 2-quart baking dish, mix together with all beans and beef, catsup, mustard, brown sugar and Worcestershire sauce.", "Bake on low heat for 5 to 6 hours."]}

text: Crustless Pumpkin Pie Beat 3 eggs, mix in 3/4 c. honey, 1/2 tsp. ginger, 1/2 tsp. nutmeg, 1/2 tsp. cinnamon, 1/2 tsp. salt, and 1 3/4 c. pumpkin or sweetened squash, add 1 c. canned milk, butter or oil a deep 9-inch pie pan, pour in mixture, bake at 325° for 1 hour, and cool thoroughly before cutting.
json: {"title": "Crustless Pumpkin Pie", "ingredients": ["3 eggs", "3/4 c. honey", "1/2 tsp. ginger", "1/2 tsp. nutmeg", "1/2 tsp. cinnamon", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 3/4 c. pumpkin or sweetened squash", "1 c. canned milk"], "directions": ["Beat eggs.", "Add the next 6 ingredients and mix well.", "Add milk.", "Butter or oil a deep 9-inch pie pan.", "Pour mixture into pan.", "Bake at 325° for 1 hour.", "Cool thoroughly before cutting."]}

text: D’s Danish Mix 4 c. flour with 3 tsp. sugar, 1 tsp. salt, and 1 c. oleo as for pie crust, dissolve 1 pkg. yeast in 1 c. warm milk and add to 3 eggs beaten, mix dry and liquid ingredients thoroughly and refrigerate overnight, then bring to room temperature and turn out onto a floured board, knead well and rest a bit, divide dough into 4 parts, roll one part thin as for pie crust and brush with melted butter, sprinkle with sugar, cinnamon, nuts and/or raisins or spread with a filling such as poppy seed or dates, roll tightly, bake as is or slice 3/4 inch thick and bake in muffin tins, bake at 375° about 20 minutes and use sugar/lemon icing if desired, then repeat with the other 3 parts.
json: {"title": "D'S Danish", "ingredients": ["4 c. flour", "3 tsp. sugar", "1 tsp. salt", "1 c. oleo", "3 eggs, beaten", "1 c. warm milk", "1 pkg. yeast"], "directions": ["Mix flour,", "sugar,", "salt,", "and\toleo", "as for pie crust. Dissolve yeast", "in warm milk; add to eggs.\tMix dry and liquid ingredients", "thoroughly and refrigerate overnight.\tThen bring to room", "temperature", "and", "turn", "out", "on floured board.", "Knead well. Rest", "a", "bit", "(self", "and", "dough).", "Divide", "dough into 4 parts. Roll one part thin as for pie crust; brush with melted butter. Sprinkle", "with", "sugar, cinnamon, nuts and/or raisins. You can also", "spread", "with\ta", "filling", "such as poppy seed or dates (as for jelly roll).", "Roll", "tightly.", "Bake", "as is or cut 3/4 inch slices and bake in\tmuffin\ttins.", "Bake at 375° about 20 minutes. Sugar/lemon icing may be used.", "Repeat with other 3 parts of dough."]}

text: Picnic Potato Salad Coarsely dice 1 1/2 cooked potatoes and 3 hard-boiled eggs with 3/4 tsp. salt, dash of pepper, and 1/2 tsp. celery seed, add 1/2 c. diced cucumbers, 1/2 c. chopped onion, 1/4 c. grated carrots, 1/2 c. diced celery, and 1/2 c. sweet pickles/relish, mix 3/4 c. salad dressing with 2 Tbsp. prepared mustard and pour over, toss until well coated adding more salad dressing as needed, then add 1/4 c. bacon bits or shredded cheese and garnish with 1 medium tomato wedged.
json: {"title": "Picnic Potato Salad", "ingredients": ["1 1/2 cooked potatoes", "3 hard-boiled eggs", "3/4 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. celery seed", "1/2 c. diced celery", "2 Tbsp. prepared mustard", "1/4 c. bacon bits or shredded cheese", "1/2 c. sweet pickles/relish", "1/4 c. grated carrots", "3/4 c. salad dressing", "1/2 c. diced cucumbers", "1/2 c. chopped onion", "dash of pepper", "1 medium tomato, wedged"], "directions": ["Coarsely dice potatoes and eggs with salt, pepper and celery seed.", "Add diced cucumbers, onion, carrots, celery and pickles/relish.", "Mix salad dressing/Miracle Whip with mustard and pour over mixture.", "Toss until well coated, adding more salad dressing as needed.", "Add bacon bits or shredded cheese and garnish with tomato wedges."]}

text: Ribbon Layer Jello Make 4 (3 oz.) pkg. jello separately using 1 c. hot water and 1/2 c. cold water for each, dissolve 2 pkg. Knox gelatine in 1/2 cup cold water and set aside, bring 2 c. milk with 1 c. sugar to a boil, add gelatine mixture plus 1 pt. sour cream and 2 tsp. vanilla, beat until thick about 10 minutes, divide into 3 parts, then layer jello and the creamy mixture in the desired order, letting each layer set 45 minutes before adding the next (for example red on top for Christmas or green on top for St. Pat’s day), and note it’s time consuming but very decorative.
json: {"title": "Ribbon Layer Jello", "ingredients": ["4 (3 oz.) pkg. jello, make each pkg. separately", "1 c. hot water for each pkg. jello", "1/2 c. cold water for each pkg. jello", "2 pkg. Knox gelatine", "2 c. milk", "2 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. sugar", "1 pt. sour cream"], "directions": ["Dissolve Knox gelatine in 1/2 cup cold water; put aside. Bring to a boil, milk and sugar.", "Add gelatine mixture, sour cream and vanilla.", "Beat until thick, about 10 minutes, with electric mixer.", "Separate this into 3 parts.", "Layer jello in desired order.", "(Red on top for Christmas or green on top for St. Pat's day.", "Christmas layers are green, white mixture, orange white mixture, yellow white mixture and red.)", "Let each layer set 45 minutes before adding next layer.", "Mix each jello separate before making layers.", "Time consuming but very decorative."]}

text: Chicken Fettucini In a double boiler melt 1 c. butter with 4 chicken bouillon cubes, stir in 8 shallots chopped, 1 c. whipping cream, 1/4 lb. mushrooms sliced, pepper, and 1 c. Parmesan cheese and simmer until mushrooms are soft and cheese is melted, add 1 chicken cooked deboned and sliced or chopped and heat until warm, then pour sauce over 1 lb. fettucini cooked and drained, tossing gently, and garnish with additional Parmesan cheese and parsley.
json: {"title": "Chicken Fettucini", "ingredients": ["1 c. butter", "4 chicken bouillon cubes", "8 shallots, chopped", "1 c. whipping cream", "1/4 lb. mushrooms, sliced", "pepper", "1 c. Parmesan cheese", "1 lb. fettucini, cooked and drained", "1 chicken, cooked, deboned and sliced or chopped"], "directions": ["In double boiler, melt butter with bouillon cubes.", "Mix in shallots, cream, mushrooms, pepper and Parmesan cheese.", "Simmer until mushrooms are soft and cheese is melted.", "Add cooked chicken; heat until warm.", "Pour sauce over noodles, tossing gently. Garnish with additional Parmesan cheese and parsley."]}

text: “Spicy” Cake Preheat oven to 350°, cut 1/2 c. walnuts, 1/2 c. raisins, 1/2 c. dried apricots, and 1 apple into pieces, add 2 1/2 c. wheat flour to it, then incorporate 4 eggs, 1 3/4 c. brown sugar, salt, 1 Tbsp. allspice, 1 Tbsp. cinnamon, 1 tsp. cardamom, 1 tsp. cilantro, 1 tsp. ginger, and 1/2 tsp. cloves (remaining steps are not included in the provided lines).
json: {"title": "\"Spicy\" Cake", "ingredients": ["4 eggs", "1 3/4 c. brown sugar", "salt", "1 Tbsp. allspice", "1 Tbsp. cinnamon", "1 tsp. cardamom", "1 tsp. cilantro", "1 tsp. ginger", "1/2 tsp. cloves", "1/2 c. walnuts", "1/2 c. raisins", "1/2 c. dried apricots", "1 apple", "2 1/2 c. wheat flour"], "directions": ["Preheat oven to 350°.", "Cut nuts and fruits into pieces.", "Add flour to it."]}

text: Lemon Chip Cookies Mix 2 c. flour, 1/2 c. sugar, 3 oz. cream cheese, and 1/2 c. margarine, pack into a 9 x 13-inch pan and bake 15 to 20 minutes at 350°, mix 4 eggs, 1 c. sugar, 1/2 tsp. baking powder, 1/3 c. lemon juice, 1/4 c. flour, and 1 c. lemon chips, pour over the baked bottom, bake at 350° for 25 minutes, cool, and cut into squares.
json: {"title": "Lemon Chip Cookies", "ingredients": ["2 c. flour", "1/2 c. sugar", "3 oz. cream cheese", "1/2 c. margarine", "4 eggs", "1 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. baking powder", "1/3 c. lemon juice", "1/4 c. flour", "1 c. lemon chips"], "directions": ["Mix first 4 ingredients.", "Pack in 9 x 13-inch pan.", "Bake 15 to 20 minutes at 350°.", "Mix last 6 ingredients.", "Pour on top of baked bottom.", "Bake at 350° for 25 minutes.", "Cool; cut in squares."]}

text: Pineapple Pie Sift 1 c. sugar with 1 Tbsp. plain flour, mix with 3 eggs separated, 1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple, 1 tsp. vanilla, margarine (size of walnut), and an unbaked pie crust, pour into the raw crust and bake at 300° for 40 minutes or until thickened, beat the egg whites and add 3 Tbsp. sugar until stiff, spread over pie, and brown.
json: {"title": "Pineapple Pie", "ingredients": ["1 c. sugar", "1 Tbsp. plain flour", "3 eggs, separated", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed pineapple", "1 tsp. vanilla", "margarine (size of walnut)", "unbaked pie crust", "3 Tbsp. sugar"], "directions": ["Sift sugar and flour together.", "Mix all ingredients together; pour into raw crust.", "Bake 40 minutes or until thickened in 300° oven.", "Beat egg whites.", "Add 3 tablespoons sugar and beat until stiff.", "Spread over pie and brown."]}

text: Persimmon Pudding Preheat oven to 325°, melt 1/2 stick margarine in a large rectangular pan, mix 2 c. persimmon pulp with 2 c. sugar or less, 2 eggs, 1 c. milk or cream, 1 1/2 to 2 c. flour, 2 tsp. cinnamon, a pinch of cloves, a pinch of salt, 1 tsp. soda, and 1 tsp. baking powder, add the melted margarine, pour batter into the pan, and bake 1 hour at 325°.
json: {"title": "Persimmon Pudding", "ingredients": ["2 c. persimmon pulp", "2 c. sugar or less", "2 eggs", "1 c. milk or cream", "1 1/2 to 2 c. flour", "2 tsp. cinnamon", "pinch of cloves", "pinch of salt", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 stick margarine"], "directions": ["Preheat oven to 325°.", "Melt margarine in large rectangular pan.", "Mix all ingredients together; add melted margarine.", "Mix. Pour batter into pan margarine was in.", "Bake one hour at 325°."]}

text: Pie Crust Mix dry ingredients (4 c. flour, 1 Tbsp. sugar, and 1/2 tsp. salt), cut in 1 3/4 c. Crisco, then mix in 1 egg, 1 Tbsp. vinegar, and 1/2 c. ice water (makes 2 double crusts).
json: {"title": "Pie Crust", "ingredients": ["4 c. flour", "1 3/4 c. Crisco", "1 Tbsp. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 egg", "1 Tbsp. vinegar", "1/2 c. ice water"], "directions": ["Mix dry ingredients (flour, sugar and salt).", "Add Crisco.", "Add and mix egg, vinegar and ice water.", "Makes 2 double crusts."]}

text: Cajun Crawfish Cornbread Combine 2 c. cornmeal with 1 tsp. salt and 1 tsp. baking powder, beat 6 eggs, chop 2 medium onions and 1/2 c. jalapeno peppers, grate 16 oz. Cheddar cheese, then mix eggs with onions, peppers, cheese, 2/3 c. oil, 2 cans creamed corn, and 2 lb. crawfish tails, combine with the cornmeal mixture, pour into a greased 12 x 14-inch baking dish, and bake at 375° for 55 minutes or until golden brown.
json: {"title": "Cajun Crawfish Cornbread", "ingredients": ["2 c. cornmeal", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. baking powder", "6 eggs", "2 medium onions", "16 oz. Cheddar cheese", "2/3 c. oil", "2 cans creamed corn", "2 lb. crawfish tails", "1/2 c. jalapeno peppers"], "directions": ["In bowl, combine cornmeal, salt and soda.", "In medium bowl, beat eggs; chop onions and jalapeno peppers.", "Grate cheese and add beaten eggs, onions, peppers, cheese, oil, corn and crawfish tails. Combine this mixture with cornmeal mix and mix well.", "Pour into greased 12 x 14-inch baking dish.", "Bake at 375° for 55 minutes or until golden brown."]}

text: Fat-Free Banana Crunch Muffins Preheat oven to 350° about 40 minutes before serving or early in the day, spray 24 mini muffin cups with nonstick cooking spray, mix 1 c. all-purpose flour, 1/2 c. wheat and barley cereal nuggets, 1/2 c. sugar, 1/2 tsp. baking powder, 1/2 tsp. baking soda, and 2 medium-size ripe bananas mashed (about 1 c.), then whisk together 1/2 c. plain nonfat yogurt, 1/4 c. thawed frozen no-cholesterol egg substitute, and 1/2 tsp. vanilla extract and stir in the flour mixture just until moistened, spoon into muffin cups, bake 20 minutes or until tops are golden and a toothpick comes out clean, remove to wire racks, and serve warm or cool (makes 24 muffins, each muffin contains 55 calories, 0 g fat, 0 mg cholesterol and 65 mg sodium, calories from fat 0%).
json: {"title": "Fat-Free Banana Crunch Muffins", "ingredients": ["1 c. all-purpose flour", "1/2 c. wheat and barley cereal nuggets", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 tsp. baking soda", "2 medium-size ripe bananas, mashed (about 1 c.)", "1/2 c. plain nonfat yogurt", "1/4 c. thawed frozen no-cholesterol egg substitute", "1/2 tsp. vanilla extract"], "directions": ["About 40 minutes before serving or early in the day:", "Preheat oven to 350°.", "Spray 24 mini muffin pan cups (1 3/4 x 1-inch) with nonstick cooking spray.", "In medium bowl, mix first 6 ingredients. In large bowl with wire whisk or fork, mix bananas, yogurt, egg substitute and vanilla; stir in flour mixture just until moistened. Spoon batter into muffin pan cups.", "Bake muffins 20 minutes or until tops are golden and toothpick inserted in center of muffins comes out clean.", "Remove from muffin pan cups to wire racks.", "Serve muffins warm or let cool on wire racks to serve later.", "Makes 24 muffins.", "Each muffin contains 55 calories, 0 g fat, 0 mg cholesterol and 65 mg sodium.", "Calories from fat:", "0%."]}

text: Chili Con Carne Brown 2 yellow onions with 3 lb. ground beef and drain, add 2 cans tomato sauce, 2 to 3 c. water, 3 cans kidney beans, 5 Tbsp. chili powder, 1 pkg. chili seasoning, and salt, Tabasco and red pepper to taste, then simmer and serve when ready (it’s even better the second day).
json: {"title": "Chili Con Carne", "ingredients": ["3 lb. ground beef", "2 yellow onions", "2 cans tomato sauce", "2 to 3 c. water", "3 cans kidney beans", "5 Tbsp. chili powder", "1 pkg. chili seasoning", "salt, Tabasco and red pepper to taste"], "directions": ["Brown onions and meat; drain.", "Add other ingredients; simmer. It's ready when you're ready, but even better the second day."]}

text: Spaghetti Casserole Brown 1 lb. hamburger with 1 onion and 1 green pepper and drain, mix with 1 small pkg. spaghetti, 2 cans tomato sauce, 1 small jar Ragu sauce (no meat), and 1 can cream of mushroom soup in a 9 x 13-inch dish, sprinkle top with grated Cheddar cheese, and bake at 350° for 30 minutes.
json: {"title": "Spaghetti Casserole", "ingredients": ["1 small pkg. spaghetti", "1 lb. hamburger", "1 onion", "1 green pepper", "2 cans tomato sauce", "1 small jar Ragu sauce (no meat)", "1 can cream of mushroom soup"], "directions": ["Brown hamburger, onion and pepper in skillet and drain.", "Mix all the ingredients together in 9 x 13-inch dish.", "Sprinkle top with grated Cheddar cheese.", "Bake for 30 minutes at 350°."]}

text: Cold Bread Pudding Soak one mixing bowl of cold biscuits (crumbled) in sweet milk (for soaking), add 1 Tbsp. butter cut into pieces plus 2 cups sugar and 4 eggs beaten, spray your pan with Pam, pour in the mixture, and bake at 375° until done, about 1 hour.
json: {"title": "Cold Bread Pudding", "ingredients": ["cold biscuits (crumbled)", "sweet milk (for soaking)", "1 Tbsp. butter (cut into pieces)", "4 eggs, beaten", "2 cups sugar"], "directions": ["One mixing bowl of crumbled up cold biscuits soaked in sweet milk. Add butter, sugar and eggs. Spray your pan with Pam, pour in mixture. Bake at 375° until done. About 1 hour."]}

text: Persimmon Cake Heat oven to 350°, mix 3 c. persimmons cut in chunks with 2 tsp. baking soda and set aside, mix 1/2 c. butter or margarine with 1 2/3 c. sugar plus 2 tsp. vanilla and 1 tsp. lemon juice and set aside, mix 2 c. flour with 1 tsp. salt, 1 tsp. cinnamon, 1 tsp. nutmeg, and 1 tsp. cloves and set aside, blend butter mixture with flour mixture then add persimmon mixture, stir in 1/2 c. raisins and 1/2 c. chopped nuts, pour into 1 large loaf pan or 2 small loaf pans, and bake at 350° for 50 minutes (large loaf) or 30 minutes (small loaves).
json: {"title": "Persimmon Cake", "ingredients": ["3 c. persimmons, cut in chunks", "2 tsp. baking soda", "1/2 c. butter or margarine", "1 2/3 c. sugar", "2 eggs", "2 tsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. lemon juice", "2 c. flour", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. cinnamon", "1 tsp. nutmeg", "1 tsp. cloves", "1/2 c. raisins", "1/2 c. chopped nuts"], "directions": ["Heat oven to 350°.", "Mix together the persimmons and baking soda; set aside.", "Mix together the butter, sugar, vanilla and lemon juice; set aside.", "Mix together the flour, salt, cinnamon, nutmeg and cloves; set aside.", "Blend butter mixture with flour mixture. Add persimmon mixture.", "Add raisins and nuts.", "Put in 1 large loaf pan or 2 small loaf pans.", "Bake at 350° for 50 minutes for large loaf or 30 minutes for small loaves."]}

text: Graham Cracker Cake Mix 2 c. sugar with 5 eggs and 2 sticks margarine, add 1 lb. box graham crackers crushed, then add 1 can coconut, 1 c. pecans, 1 bottle maraschino cherries chopped, and 1 Tbsp. vanilla; dissolve 2 Tbsp. baking powder in 1/4 c. milk and pour into batter, then bake at 350° for 1 hour.
json: {"title": "Graham Cracker Cake", "ingredients": ["1 lb. box graham crackers, crushed", "2 c. sugar", "2 sticks margarine", "1 c. pecans", "1/4 c. milk", "2 Tbsp. baking powder", "1 bottle maraschino cherries, chopped", "5 eggs", "1 can coconut", "1 Tbsp. vanilla"], "directions": ["Mix sugar, eggs and margarine in bowl, then add cracker crumbs. Add coconut, pecans, cherries and vanilla.", "Add baking powder in the milk and pour into batter.", "Bake at 350° for 1 hour."]}

text: No Bake Cookies Put 1 stick oleo, 1/3 c. cocoa, 2 c. sugar, and 1/2 c. milk in a saucepan, bring to a boil and boil 1 minute, remove from heat and stir in 3 c. oatmeal, 1/2 c. peanut butter, and 1 tsp. vanilla, then drop by spoonfuls onto waxed paper and chill.
json: {"title": "No Bake Cookies", "ingredients": ["1 stick oleo", "1/3 c. cocoa", "2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. milk", "3 c. oatmeal", "1/2 c. peanut butter", "1 tsp. vanilla"], "directions": ["Put oleo, cocoa, sugar and milk in saucepan.", "Bring to a boil. Boil one minute.", "Add oatmeal, peanut butter and vanilla.", "Mix well.", "Drop by spoonfuls onto waxed paper.", "Chill."]}

text: Butterscotch Squares (Servings: 4) Cream 1 lb. margarine or butter with 2 lb. 8 oz. brown sugar on medium speed for 5 minutes, add 10 eggs (1 lb.) one at a time plus 1 Tbsp. vanilla, mix on low until blended, combine 1 lb. 8 oz. flour (all-purpose) with 2 Tbsp. baking powder and 1 tsp. salt, add to creamed mixture and mix on low until blended, add 12 oz. nuts chopped if using and mix to blend, spread evenly in 2 greased 12 x 18 x 2-inch baking pans, bake at 325° for 25 minutes, cut 5 x 6-inch, yield 60 portions.
json: {"title": "Butterscotch Squares(Servings:  4)", "ingredients": ["1 lb. margarine or butter", "2 lb. 8 oz. brown sugar", "10 eggs (1 lb.)", "1 Tbsp. vanilla", "1 lb. 8 oz. flour (all-purpose)", "2 Tbsp. baking powder", "1 tsp. salt", "12 oz. nuts, chopped (optional)"], "directions": ["Cream margarine and sugar on medium speed for 5 minutes.", "Add eggs, one at a time, and vanilla.", "Mix on low speed until blended. Combine dry ingredients.", "Add to creamed mixture.", "Mix on low speed until blended.", "Add nuts; mix to blend.", "Spread mixture evenly in 2 greased 12 x 18 x 2-inch baking pans.", "Bake at 325° for 25 minutes.", "Cut 5 x 6-inch.", "Yield:", "60 portions."]}

text: Sausage And Egg Quiche Brown 1 lb. sausage and drain off fat, beat 8 eggs and mix in 2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese, 2 c. Mozzarella cheese, and salt and pepper, stir in the sausage, pour into 2 pie shells, and bake 30 minutes at 350°.
json: {"title": "Sausage And Egg Quiche", "ingredients": ["2 pie shells", "1 lb. sausage", "8 eggs", "2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese", "2 c. Mozzarella cheese", "salt and pepper"], "directions": ["Brown sausage and drain off fat.", "Beat eggs.", "Add in cheeses and sausage.", "Pour into pie shells.", "Bake 30 minutes at 350°."]}

text: Date Nut Balls Cook 1 1/2 sticks butter (not oleo or margarine) with 8 oz. chopped dates and 1 c. sugar until very thick, stir in 1 c. chopped pecans, 2 c. Rice Krispies, and 1 tsp. vanilla, cool until lukewarm, roll into balls, then roll in sifted confectioners sugar.
json: {"title": "Date Nut Balls", "ingredients": ["1 1/2 sticks butter (not oleo or margarine)", "8 oz. chopped dates", "1 c. sugar", "1 c. chopped pecans", "2 c. Rice Krispies", "1 tsp. vanilla"], "directions": ["Cook butter, dates and sugar until very thick. Add remaining ingredients. Mix. Cool until lukewarm. Roll into balls, then roll in sifted confectioners sugar."]}

text: Broccoli Cheese Soup Sauté 1 1/2 c. chopped onion in 1/2 c. butter or margarine, add 3/4 c. all-purpose flour and stir into a paste, gradually add 1 (10 1/2 oz.) can condensed chicken broth (undiluted) and 1 qt. milk, cook until thickened about 8 to 10 minutes, add 2 c. sliced carrots parboiled, 1 c. sliced celery parboiled, and 2 c. broccoli florets parboiled and heat through, then add 1/2 lb. process American cheese cut into cubes and heat until cheese is melted and vegetables are tender (yield 6 to 8 servings, about 2 quarts).
json: {"title": "Broccoli Cheese Soup", "ingredients": ["1 1/2 c. chopped onion", "1/2 c. butter or margarine", "3/4 c. all-purpose flour", "1 (10 1/2 oz.) can condensed chicken broth (undiluted)", "1 qt. milk", "2 c. sliced carrots, parboiled", "1 c. sliced celery, parboiled", "2 c. broccoli florets, parboiled", "1/2 lb. process American cheese, cut into cubes"], "directions": ["In a large saucepan, saute onion in butter.", "Add flour and stir to make paste.", "Gradually add chicken broth and milk.", "Cook until mixture thickens, about 8 to 10 minutes.", "Add carrots, celery and broccoli; heat through.", "Add cheese; heat until cheese is melted and vegetables are tender.", "Yield:", "6 to 8 servings (2 quarts)."]}

text: Sausages And Seashells Prick 8 Italian sweet sausages with a fork, cover with cold water, bring to a boil, simmer uncovered about 10 minutes, drain and dry, slice into rounds, heat 3 Tbsp. olive oil or margarine in a skillet and add sausage with 1 medium onion finely chopped, 1 garlic clove minced, and 2 Tbsp. chopped parsley, cook stirring often until golden brown, add 1 large can tomatoes chopped and 1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce, simmer covered while you cook 1 lb. small seashells pasta, drain pasta and mix with sausage and sauce.
json: {"title": "Sausages And Seashells", "ingredients": ["1 lb. small seashells pasta", "8 Italian sweet sausages", "3 Tbsp. olive oil or margarine", "1 medium onion, finely chopped", "1 garlic clove, minced", "2 Tbsp. chopped parsley", "1 large can tomatoes, chopped", "1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce"], "directions": ["Prick the sausages with a sharp fork, cover with cold water and bring to a boil.", "Simmer, uncovered, about 10 minutes; drain and dry.", "Slice in rounds.", "Heat the oil in a skillet and add the sausage, onion, garlic and parsley.", "Cook, stirring often, until meat and vegetables are golden brown, then add tomatoes and tomato sauce.", "Simmer covered while you prepare pasta.", "Drain pasta and mix with sausage and sauce."]}

text: Barbara Mandrell’s Four Layer Dessert Combine 1 c. flour with 1 c. chopped nuts and 1/2 c. melted margarine, press into the bottom of an 11 3/4 x 7 1/2-inch baking dish, bake at 350° for 15 minutes and cool, mix 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese softened with 1 c. sifted powdered sugar until blended and fold in 1 c. whipped topping, spread over the crust and chill, prepare 1 small pkg. instant chocolate pudding with part of the 4 c. milk divided as directed and spread over the cream cheese layer, prepare 1 small pkg. instant vanilla pudding with the remaining milk as directed and spread over the chocolate layer, then cut into squares and garnish with whipped topping and chopped nuts.
json: {"title": "Barbara Mandrell'S Four Layer Dessert", "ingredients": ["1 c. flour", "1 c. chopped nuts", "1/2 c. melted margarine", "1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 c. whipped topping", "1 small pkg. instant chocolate pudding", "1 small pkg. instant vanilla pudding", "4 c. milk, divided", "1 c. sifted powdered sugar", "whipped topping", "chopped nuts"], "directions": ["Combine flour, nuts and melted margarine and mix well.", "Press into bottom of 11 3/4 x 7 1/2-inch baking dish.", "Bake at 350° for 15 minutes.", "Cool.", "Combine softened cream cheese and powdered sugar and mix well until blended.", "Fold in whipped topping. Spread over crust.", "Chill.", "Prepare chocolate pudding; mix as directed on package.", "Spread over cream cheese mixture.", "Prepare vanilla pudding mix as directed on package and spread over chocolate pudding.", "Cut into squares and garnish with additional whipped topping and chopped nuts."]}

text: Zucchini Bread Beat 3 eggs then add 1 c. oil, 2 c. sugar, and 3 tsp. vanilla and mix well, stir in 1 (16 oz.) crushed pineapple, sift together 3 c. flour, 1 tsp. soda, 1 tsp. salt, 1/2 tsp. allspice, 1/2 tsp. baking powder, and 2 tsp. cinnamon, stir in 2 1/2 c. grated zucchini, mix well, pour into loaf pans, and bake at 325° for 1 hour and 45 minutes.
json: {"title": "Zucchini Bread", "ingredients": ["3 eggs", "1 c. oil", "2 c. sugar", "3 tsp. vanilla", "3 c. flour", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. allspice", "1/2 tsp. baking powder", "2 tsp. cinnamon", "2 1/2 c. grated zucchini", "1 (16 oz.) crushed pineapple"], "directions": ["Beat eggs; add oil, sugar and vanilla.", "Mix well.", "Add crushed pineapple.", "Sift dry ingredients.", "Stir in zucchini.", "Mix well all ingredients.", "Pour into loaf pans.", "Bake at 325° for 1 hour and 45 minutes."]}

text: Corn Crepes In a blender combine 2 eggs, 2 egg yolks, 2 c. milk, 1 c. flour, 1/2 c. finely ground cornmeal, 1 tsp. sugar, a dash of salt, and 2 Tbsp. butter and blend until smooth, refrigerate at least 1 hour, whisk batter, heat a 9-inch nonstick pan over medium-high heat and rub lightly with butter, pour about 1/4 cup batter into the center and tilt to coat the bottom, cook about 1 minute until the top looks dry, flip and cook briefly, then repeat with remaining batter (makes 12 crepes; leftovers keep wrapped in the fridge 2 days).
json: {"title": "Corn Crepes", "ingredients": ["2 eggs", "2 egg yolks", "2 c. milk", "1 c. flour", "1/2 c. finely ground cornmeal", "1 tsp. sugar", "dash of salt", "2 Tbsp. butter"], "directions": ["In blender combine eggs, egg yolks, milk, flour, cornmeal, sugar and salt.", "Blend until smooth.", "Mixture should be consistency of unbeaten whipping cream.", "Set aside in refrigerator at least 1 hour.", "Remove batter from refrigerator and stir well with whisk. Heat 9-inch nonstick pan over medium-high heat.", "Rub lightly with butter.", "Pour about 1/4 cup of crepe batter in center of pan, tilting and angling pan to spread batter evenly over entire bottom.
