json: {"title": "Dirt Pie", "ingredients": ["2 pkg. instant French vanilla pudding (unprepared, keep in dry form)", "8 oz. cream cheese, softened", "3 1/2 c. milk", "3/4 c. powdered sugar", "1 pkg. Oreos", "8 or 12 oz. whipped topping"], "directions": ["In deep bowl, put pudding, cream cheese and 1/2 cup of milk. Mix until creamy with hand mixer.", "Add powdered sugar and mix thoroughly, then add remaining milk, 1/2 cup at a time, and mix until creamy.", "Crumble enough Oreo cookies to line bottom of dish as a crust in a lasagna pan.", "Add the pudding mix and top with whipped topping.", "Refrigerate until serving.", "Prior to serving, crumble a few more Oreos on the top to provide a crisp, crunchy taste."]}

text: Rich Beef and Gravy Mix 1 pkg. onion soup mix, 1/4 c. water, and 1 can cream of mushroom soup in a crock-pot, add 2 to 2 1/2 lb. round steak cut into pieces, cover, cook on Low 6 to 8 hours, and serve over potatoes, noodles, or rice.
json: {"title": "Rich Beef And Gravy(Crock-Pot Recipe)", "ingredients": ["2 to 2 1/2 lb. round steak", "1 (1 1/2 oz.) pkg. onion soup mix", "1/4 c. water", "1 (10 1/2 oz.) can cream of mushroom soup"], "directions": ["Mix dry and liquid ingredients in crock-pot.", "Cut steak into small pieces.", "Add to other ingredients.", "Cover and cook on low for 6 to 8 hours.", "Serve over mashed potatoes, noodles or rice. Serves 4 to 6."]}

text: Chicken Maranda Place cooked, deboned chicken in a casserole, spread 1 can cream of chicken soup, 1 can cream of celery soup, and 1 small can Pet milk over chicken and mix well, combine remaining ingredients with 1 pkg. cornbread mix and 1 c. chicken broth, add as topping, and bake at 450°F for 20 minutes until golden.
json: {"title": "Chicken Maranda", "ingredients": ["1 large chicken, cooked, skinned and deboned", "1 can cream of chicken soup", "1 can cream of celery soup", "1 small can Pet milk (same amount of regular milk may be used)", "1 Tbsp. sage", "1 pkg. cornbread mix", "1 c. chicken broth"], "directions": ["Put chicken in large casserole dish.", "Spread chicken soup, celery soup and milk over chicken.", "Mix all these well with chicken.", "Mix remaining ingredients and add last for topping. (Can use cornmeal and egg with sage and chicken broth instead of packaged mixes.", "Add cornbread last.) Bake at 450° for 20 minutes or until bread is golden brown."]}

text: Apple-Banana Bread Combine 4 beaten eggs, 1 1/2 c. mashed bananas, 1 c. packed brown sugar, 1/2 c. oil, 1/3 c. milk, and 1 tsp. salt, mix dry ingredients separately, combine, fold in 1 chopped apple and 1 c. nuts, pour into pans, and bake at 325°F for about 1 hour.
json: {"title": "Apple-Banana Bread", "ingredients": ["4 eggs, beaten", "1 1/2 c. mashed bananas", "1 c. brown sugar, packed", "1/2 c. oil", "1 tsp. salt", "1/3 c. milk", "3 1/2 c. flour", "1 3/4 tsp. baking soda", "1 3/4 tsp. baking powder", "1 large apple, chopped", "1 c. chopped nuts"], "directions": ["Combine eggs, banana, sugar, oil and milk.", "In a separate bowl mix flour, salt, baking soda and baking powder.", "Add to banana mixture.", "Fold in apple and nuts.", "Pour batter into 3 small greased and floured pans or two (9 x 5-inch) pans.", "Bake at 325° for about 1 hour.", "Cool in pans 10 minutes; remove to wire racks to cool."]}

text: Mock Lobster Salad Crush 30 soda crackers, mix 1 1/2 c. chopped celery, 1 chopped green pepper, 3 diced hard-boiled eggs, and 1 diced onion, stir together 1 1/2 c. tomato juice and 1 1/2 c. mayonnaise, combine with vegetables and crackers, refrigerate overnight, and serve chilled.
json: {"title": "Mock Lobster Salad", "ingredients": ["30 soda crackers", "1 1/2 c. celery, finely chopped", "1 small green pepper, chopped", "3 eggs, boiled and diced", "1 small onion, diced", "1 1/2 c. tomato juice", "1 1/2 c. mayonnaise"], "directions": ["Crush the soda crackers in a large bowl.", "Mix all vegetables together in another bowl, then mix tomato juice and mayonnaise with all the vegetables.", "Pour this mixture over the crushed crackers. Let all of this mixture stand in the refrigerator overnight.", "Serve on crackers or on a bed of lettuce."]}

text: Buttermilk Cake Cream 2 c. sugar and 3/4 c. Crisco, beat in 3 eggs one at a time, sift dry ingredients, alternate adding with 1 c. buttermilk, add 1 Tbsp. almond flavoring and 1 tsp. vanilla, mix well, and bake in a greased Bundt pan at 350°F for 1 hour.
json: {"title": "Buttermilk Cake", "ingredients": ["2 c. sugar", "3/4 c. Crisco", "3 eggs", "2 c. all-purpose flour", "1 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 tsp. baking soda", "1/8 tsp. salt", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 Tbsp. almond flavoring", "1 tsp. vanilla"], "directions": ["Cream sugar and shortening.", "Beat in eggs 1 at a time.", "Sift dry ingredients together.", "Blend in alternating with buttermilk. Beat well.", "Add almond and vanilla.", "Mix well.", "Bake in greased and floured Bundt pan for 1 hour at 350°."]}

text: Foolproof Chocolate Fudge Melt 3 (6 oz.) pkg. chocolate morsels with 1 (14 oz.) can condensed milk over low heat, stir in dash of salt and 1 1/2 tsp. vanilla, spread into an 8-inch pan, chill until set, and cut into squares.
json: {"title": "Foolproof Chocolate Fudge", "ingredients": ["3 6 oz. pkg. semi-sweet chocolate morsels", "1 14 oz. can Eagle Brand sweetened condensed milk", "Dash salt", "1 1/2 tsp. vanilla extract", "1/2 C. chopped nuts, optional"], "directions": ["In heavy saucepan, over low heat, melt morsels with sweetened condensed milk. Stir in vanilla and spread evenly onto wax paper lined 8-inch square pan. Chill 2 hours or until set. Turn fudge onto cutting board, peel off paper and cut into squares. Cover and store at room temperature."]}

text: Sweet and Sour Seashells Pour 2 Tbsp. corn oil, 3/4 c. sugar, 1/2 c. cider vinegar, 1/2 c. wine vinegar, 1/2 c. water, 3 Tbsp. mustard, 1/8 tsp. salt, and 1/8 tsp. pepper over 1 lb. cooked seashell pasta with sliced cucumbers and diced onions, marinate 3 to 4 hours, and serve chilled.
json: {"title": "Sweet And Sour Seashells", "ingredients": ["1 lb. small seashells, cooked", "2 Tbsp. corn oil", "3/4 c. sugar", "1/2 c. cider vinegar", "1/2 c. wine vinegar", "1/2 c. water", "3 Tbsp. French's mustard", "1/8 tsp. salt", "1/8 tsp. black pepper", "2 small cucumbers", "2 small onions, diced"], "directions": ["Pour all ingredients over noodles and let marinate in refrigerator for 3 to 4 hours.", "Wash cucumbers and leave skins on. Cut cucumbers in half lengthwise, then slice."]}

text: Cornbread Salad Mix 2 pkg. cooked and crumbled cornbread, 1 1/2 c. onion, 1 chopped green pepper, 3 tomatoes, 8 to 10 slices bacon, 1 1/2 c. Velveeta, 1 1/2 c. dressing or mayo, 2 Tbsp. mustard, salt and pepper, let set overnight, and serve.
json: {"title": "Cornbread Salad", "ingredients": ["2 pkg. Jiffy cornbread mix, cooked, cooled and crumbled", "1 1/2 c. chopped onion", "1 medium green pepper, chopped", "3 medium firm tomatoes", "8 to 10 slices bacon, cooked, drained and crumbled", "1 1/2 c. cubed light Velveeta cheese", "1 1/2 c. salad dressing or mayo", "2 Tbsp. mustard", "salt and pepper to taste"], "directions": ["Mix well and let set overnight.", "Will make 2 quarts and 1 pint.", "You can cut this in half."]}

text: Ham and Rice Casserole Mix 1 can cream of mushroom soup, 1/2 c. milk, 1 1/3 c. precooked rice, and 1 c. diced ham in an 8 x 8-inch pan and bake at 375°F for 25 minutes.
json: {"title": "Ham And Rice Casserole", "ingredients": ["1 can cream of mushroom soup", "1/2 c. milk", "1 1/3 c. precooked rice", "1 c. diced ham"], "directions": ["Mix all ingredients in 8 x 8-inch pan.", "Bake at 375° for 25 minutes."]}

text: Zucchini Muffins Preheat oven to 400°F, grease muffin cups, mix flour, sugar, pecans, oats, baking powder, salt, and cinnamon, add beaten eggs, oil, and shredded zucchini, stir until moistened, and bake 25 minutes.
json: {"title": "Zucchini Muffins", "ingredients": ["2 1/2 c. flour", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "1 c. chopped pecans", "1/2 c. quick cooking oats", "1 Tbsp. baking powder", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. cinnamon", "4 eggs", "1 medium zucchini, shredded", "3/4 c. oil"], "directions": ["Preheat oven to 400°.", "Grease muffin cups.", "In large bowl, mix the first 7 ingredients.", "Beat eggs; stir in oil and zucchini. Stir all together until moistened.", "Bake for 25 minutes."]}

text: Chicken Parmesan Dip 4 chicken breasts in Italian dressing then Progresso bread crumbs, bake at 350°F for 30 minutes, top with Mozzarella for the last 3 to 5 minutes, simmer spaghetti sauce with onion and garlic, cook noodles, and serve together.
json: {"title": "Chicken Parmesan", "ingredients": ["4 boneless chicken breasts", "Italian dressing", "Progresso bread crumbs", "1 jar spaghetti sauce", "1 whole small peeled onion", "1 peeled clove garlic", "spaghetti noodles", "Mozzarella cheese"], "directions": ["Dip chicken in Italian dressing, then bread crumbs.", "Bake at 350° for 30 minutes.", "Add a layer of Mozzarella cheese the last few minutes (3 to 5) of cooking.", "Cook jar of spaghetti sauce over low heat.", "Add onion and garlic clove.", "Remove when finished cooking.", "Cook spaghetti noodles.", "Prepare plate."]}

text: Simple Cherry-Pineapple Crisp Spread crushed pineapple in a baking dish, top with cherry pie filling, sprinkle with yellow cake mix, drizzle with melted margarine, and bake at 350°F until golden.
json: {"title": "Simple Cherry-Pineapple Crisp", "ingredients": ["1 can crushed pineapple", "1 can cherry pie filling", "1 box yellow cake mix", "1 stick margarine"], "directions": ["Spread crushed pineapple in the bottom of baking dish. Spread cherry pie filling over the pineapple.", "Spread yellow cake mix over pineapple and cherry filling.", "Melt margarine and drizzle over the other ingredients.", "Bake at 350° until golden brown on top."]}

text: Wacky Cake Mix 3 c. flour, 2 c. sugar, 1/2 c. cocoa, 1 tsp. salt, and 2 tsp. baking soda, add 2 Tbsp. vinegar, 1 c. oil, and 2 c. cold water, pour into pan, and bake at 350°F for 35 to 40 minutes.
json: {"title": "Wacky Cake", "ingredients": ["3 c. flour", "2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. cocoa", "1 tsp. salt", "2 tsp. baking soda", "2 Tbsp. vinegar", "1 c. oil", "2 c. cold water"], "directions": ["Mix all ingredients together.", "Pour into greased and floured 9 x 13-inch pan.", "Bake at 350° for 35 to 40 minutes."]}

text: Cherry Torte Cream 1 c. soft butter with 1 c. sugar, add 2 tsp. vanilla and 4 to 5 egg yolks, then mix in 1/4 tsp. soda, 1 tsp. baking powder, and 3 c. flour. Spread the dough onto a cookie sheet, forming raised edges, cover with cherry pie filling, beat the egg whites until stiff and add 6 Tbsp. sugar, spread over the filling, sprinkle with ground nuts, and bake at 350°F for 25 to 30 minutes.
json: {"title": "Cherry Torte", "ingredients": ["1 c. soft butter", "1 c. sugar", "2 tsp. vanilla", "4 to 5 egg yolks", "1/4 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. baking powder", "3 c. flour"], "directions": ["Spread out on cookie sheet and make edges up side.", "Cover with cherry pie filling.", "Beat egg whites until stiff.", "Add 6 tablespoons sugar.", "Cover filling and sprinkle with ground nuts. Bake at 350° for 25 to 30 minutes."]}

text: Red Raspberry Cordial In a 1-gallon jar combine 4 c. raspberries, 4 c. sugar, and 2 c. gin or vodka, stir well, cover tightly, and let stand for 4 months stirring once a week. Strain through cheesecloth, pressing the solids well, return liquid to the jar, and store; makes about 4 cups.
json: {"title": "Red Raspberry Cordial", "ingredients": ["4 c. raspberries", "4 c. sugar", "2 c. gin or vodka"], "directions": ["In a 1-gallon jar fitted with a lid, combine the raspberries, sugar and the gin.", "Stir the mixture well.", "Secure the lid.", "Let mixture stand, stirring it once a week, for 4 months.", "Strain the mixture through a cheesecloth lined sieve into a pitcher, pressing hard on the solids.", "Return it to the jar.", "Makes about 4 cups."]}

text: Pavlova (Australia’s National Dessert) Line a baking sheet with wax paper and lightly grease, draw an 8-inch circle, beat 4 egg whites at room temperature until foamy, add 1/4 tsp. salt and 1/4 tsp. cream of tartar and beat until stiff glossy peaks form, gradually beat in 1 c. sugar, shape into the circle, bake, cool completely, then top with 2 c. sweetened whipping cream and 3 c. fruit of your choice.
json: {"title": "Pavlova(Australia'S National Dessert)", "ingredients": ["4 egg whites, at room temperature", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. cream of tartar", "1 c. sugar", "2 c. sweetened whipping cream", "3 c. fruit of your choice"], "directions": ["Line cookie sheet with wax paper; grease lightly.", "Draw 8-inch circle in middle of sheet.", "Beat egg whites until foamy.", "Add salt and cream of tartar; beat until stiff, glossy peaks form.", "Add sugar gradually; beat 2 minutes."]}

text: Chunky Cheddar Chili Beans Brown 1 lb. ground beef with onions, drain, add 1 can kidney beans, 1 lb. can chopped tomatoes, 6 oz. tomato paste, 1 Tbsp. chili powder, 2 tsp. sugar, 1 tsp. salt, and 1/4 tsp. pepper, cover and simmer for 45 minutes, then add cubed Cheddar cheese just before serving.
json: {"title": "Chunky Cheddar Chili Beans", "ingredients": ["1 lb. ground beef", "1 can kidney beans, rinsed and drained", "1/2 c. chopped onions", "1 lb. can whole tomatoes, chopped", "6 oz. can tomato paste", "1 Tbsp. chili powder", "2 tsp. sugar", "1 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. pepper", "cubed Cheddar cheese"], "directions": ["Brown beef and onions.", "Drain.", "Add all ingredients.", "Cover and simmer 45 minutes.", "Add cheese just before serving while hot."]}

text: Lazy Day Chicken Preheat oven to 350°F, place 1 1/4 lb. boneless skinless chicken breasts in a sprayed baking pan, mix 1 can chunky tomato sauce, 2 Tbsp. dried onion flakes, 1 packet instant beef flavored broth mix, and 1/2 c. water, pour over chicken, cover and bake 30 minutes, uncover and bake 30 minutes longer.
json: {"title": "Lazy Day Chicken", "ingredients": ["1 1/4 lb. boneless, skinless chicken breast", "1 can Hunt's Special chunky tomato sauce", "2 Tbsp. dried onion flakes", "1 packet instant beef flavored broth mix", "1/2 c. water"], "directions": ["Preheat oven to 350°.", "Place chicken in baking pan that has been sprayed with a nonstick cooking spray.", "In a small bowl, combine remaining ingredients and pour over chicken.", "Cover and bake 30 minutes.", "Remove cover; continue baking 30 minutes longer."]}

text: Chicken Pot Pie Mix cooked diced chicken with 1 can cream of celery soup, 1 can cream of chicken soup, 1 soup can water, and 1 can Veg-All, pour into a 9 x 13-inch baking dish, and bake until heated through.
json: {"title": "Chicken Pot Pie", "ingredients": ["breast of chicken, cooked and diced", "1 can cream of celery soup", "1 can cream of chicken soup", "1 soup can water", "1 can Veg-All, well drained"], "directions": ["Mix all together and pour into a 9 x 13-inch baking dish."]}

text: Frito Salad Drain 1 can Ranch Style beans, then mix with 2 diced tomatoes, 1 chopped head lettuce, 2 c. grated cheese, and 1 bottle Catalina dressing, adding 1 medium bag Fritos just before serving.
json: {"title": "Frito Salad", "ingredients": ["2 tomatoes, diced", "1 head lettuce, chopped", "2 c. grated cheese", "1 medium bag Fritos", "1 bottle Catalina dressing", "1 can Ranch Style beans"], "directions": ["Drain beans.", "Mix all ingredients together, except Fritos. Add Fritos just before serving."]}

text: Marinated Beef Slices Cut 1/2 lb. cooked rare sirloin or roast beef into julienne strips, add 1 thinly sliced onion, 3/4 tsp. salt, a dash of pepper, sprinkle with 1 1/2 Tbsp. lemon juice, mix in 1 c. dairy sour cream, chill well, and serve with crackers.
json: {"title": "Marinated Beef Slices", "ingredients": ["1/2 lb. cooked sirloin or roast beef (rare)", "1 onion, thinly sliced and separated in rings", "3/4 tsp. salt", "dash of pepper", "1 1/2 Tbsp. lemon juice", "1 c. dairy sour cream"], "directions": ["Slice meat in julienne strips.", "Add sliced onion, salt and pepper to taste.", "Sprinkle lemon juice over mixture and mix in sour cream.", "Chill well.", "Serve in crystal bowl with crackers. Great appetizer!"]}

text: Chicken and Stuffing Bake Place 3 c. cut cooked chicken or turkey in a 2-quart casserole, toss 3 1/2 c. herb seasoned croutons with 1 medium chopped onion, 1 chopped celery stalk, 1/3 c. margarine or butter, and 1/2 c. water, reserve 1 1/2 c., spread remaining stuffing over chicken, mix 1 c. condensed cream of chicken soup with 1 1/2 c. water and pour over, top with reserved stuffing, and bake uncovered at 350°F for about 30 minutes.
json: {"title": "Chicken And Stuffing Bake", "ingredients": ["3 c. cut cooked chicken or turkey", "1 medium stalk celery, chopped", "1/2 c. water", "1 c. condensed cream of chicken soup", "3 1/2 c. herb seasoned croutons", "1 medium onion", "1/3 c. margarine or butter", "1 1/2 c. water"], "directions": ["Place chicken in ungreased 2-quart casserole or 9 x 9 x 2-inch baking pan.", "Toss croutons, celery and onion with the 1/2 cup water and the margarine until croutons are moistened.", "Reserve about 1 1/2 cups of this stuffing.", "Spread remaining stuffing over chicken.", "Mix soup with 1 1/2 cups water; pour over stuffing.", "Top with reserved stuffing.", "Cook, uncovered, in a 350° oven for about 30 minutes."]}

text: Turkey Casserole Mix 4 c. turkey with juices, 1 can cream of mushroom soup, 1 can cream of celery soup, 1 can cream of chicken soup, and 1 1/2 c. Minute rice, then bake at 350°F for 40 minutes.
json: {"title": "Turkey Casserole", "ingredients": ["4 c. or 1 (28 oz.) can turkey, cut into small chunks (including juice)", "1 can cream of mushroom soup", "1 can cream of celery soup", "1 can cream of chicken soup", "1 1/2 c. Minute rice"], "directions": ["Mix together and bake for 40 minutes at 350°."]}

text: Pancakes Beat 1 egg until fluffy, beat in 1 c. all-purpose flour, 2 Tbsp. oil, 1 c. buttermilk, 1 Tbsp. sugar, 1 tsp. baking powder, 1/2 tsp. baking soda, and 1/2 tsp. salt until smooth, thin with 1/4 c. milk if desired, cook on a griddle until golden brown, making about 9 pancakes.
json: {"title": "Pancakes", "ingredients": ["1 egg", "1 c. all-purpose flour", "2 Tbsp. oil", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 Tbsp. sugar", "1 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 tsp. baking soda", "1/2 tsp. salt"], "directions": ["Beat egg until fluffy.", "Beat in remaining ingredients until smooth.", "For thinner pancakes, add 1/4 cup milk.", "Cook on griddle or skillet until golden brown.", "Makes about 9 pancakes."]}

text: Easy Jello Salad Mix 8 oz. cottage cheese, 6 oz. Cool Whip, 3 oz. Jell-O, and well-drained fruit of choice, then chill before serving.
json: {"title": "Easy Jello Salad", "ingredients": ["8 oz. cottage cheese", "6 oz. Cool Whip", "3 oz. Jell-O", "fruit, well drained"], "directions": ["You may use any combination of Jell-O and fruit you want. (Lime Jell-O and pineapple, orange Jell-O and mandarin oranges.)"]}

text: Linguine Salad Combine 1 lb. cooked linguine with 1 chopped large tomato, 1 chopped large cucumber, 1 chopped large onion, 1 bottle Italian dressing (16 oz.), and 1/2 jar Salad Supreme, mixing well and adding broccoli if desired.
json: {"title": "Linguine Salad", "ingredients": ["1 lb. linguine, cooked", "1 large tomato", "1 large cucumber", "1 large onion", "1 bottle Italian dressing (16 oz.)", "1/2 jar Salad Supreme"], "directions": ["For option, try broccoli.", "Mix all together."]}

text: Hobo Bread (Brown Bread) Combine 2 1/2 c. leftover coffee, 4 tsp. baking soda, 2 c. raisins, 1 c. white sugar, 1 1/2 c. chopped nuts, 4 c. sifted flour, and 1/4 tsp. salt, pour into 3 greased coffee cans, and bake as directed.
json: {"title": "Hobo Bread(Brown Bread)", "ingredients": ["2 1/2 c. leftover coffee or prepared instant", "4 tsp. baking soda", "2 c. raisins", "1 c. white sugar", "1 1/2 c. chopped nuts", "4 c. sifted flour", "1/4 tsp. salt"], "directions": ["You will need 3 coffee cans."]}

text: Meltaways Mix 8 oz. softened cream cheese, 1 c. softened margarine or butter, and 2 c. flour, wrap and refrigerate overnight, divide dough into quarters, roll each into an 8-inch circle, brush with melted butter, sprinkle filling, cut into 8 triangles, roll up, brush with egg yolk mixed with 2 Tbsp. water, and bake.
json: {"title": "Meltaways", "ingredients": ["1 (8 oz.) softened cream cheese", "1 c. softened margarine or butter", "2 c. flour"], "directions": ["Mix in a bowl the cream cheese, margarine or butter and flour. Wrap in wax paper and refrigerate overnight.", "Divide in quarters and roll each into 8-inch circles.", "Melt 1 stick of butter and brush on dough, then sprinkle filling.", "Cut each circle into 8 triangles, rolling large end to pointed end and pinch ends.", "Beat egg yolk with 2 tablespoons water and brush on top."]}

text: Snickerdoodles Cream together 1/2 c. butter, 1/2 c. shortening, 1 1/2 c. sugar, and 2 eggs, blend in 2 3/4 c. flour, 2 tsp. cream of tartar, 1 tsp. soda, and 1/4 tsp. salt, shape into balls, roll in a mixture of 2 Tbsp. sugar and 2 tsp. cinnamon, and bake at 400°F for 8 to 10 minutes.
json: {"title": "Snickerdoodles", "ingredients": ["1/2 c. butter, softened", "1/2 c. shortening", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "2 eggs", "2 3/4 c. flour", "2 tsp. cream of tartar", "1 tsp. soda", "1/4 tsp. salt", "2 Tbsp. sugar", "2 tsp. cinnamon"], "directions": ["Heat oven to 400°.", "Mix thoroughly the butter, shortening, 1 1/2 cups sugar and eggs. Blend in flour, cream of tartar, soda and salt.", "Shape dough by rounded teaspoonful into balls.", "Mix 2 tablespoons sugar and the cinnamon.", "Roll balls in mixture and place 2-inches apart on ungreased baking sheet. Bake 8 to 10 minutes or until set. Remove immediately from baking sheet."]}

text: Sundown Cooler Chill 34 oz. lemon-lime soda and 1 liter dry white wine, then pour over ice with thinly sliced lemon and lime; makes 16 punch cups.
json: {"title": "Sundown Cooler", "ingredients": ["34 oz. lemon lime soda", "1 (1 liter) bottle dry white wine", "1 lemon, thinly sliced", "1 lime, thinly sliced"], "directions": ["Chill ingredients; pour over ice and sliced fruit.", "Makes 16 punch cups."]}

text: Oreo Dirt Cake Crush 1 1/4 lb. Oreo cookies and layer half in the bottom of a glass bowl, cream 1/4 c. margarine with 1 c. powdered sugar and 8 oz. cream cheese, add 12 oz. Cool Whip, 2 packages instant chocolate pudding, and 3 1/2 c. milk, mix well, pour over cookies, and top with remaining crushed Oreos.
json: {"title": "Oreo Dirt Cake", "ingredients": ["1 1/4 lb. oreo cookies", "1/4 C margarine", "1 C powdered sugar", "8 oz cream cheese", "12 oz Cool Whip", "2 small packages instant chocolate pudding", "3 1/2 C milk"], "directions": ["Crush oreos and layer 1/2 on bottom of glass bowl or flower pot. Cream together margarine, powdered sugar and cream cheese. Add Cool Whip, dry pudding mix", "and milk, mixing well.", "Pour on top of oreos. Add remaining crushed oreos to top."]}

text: Parmesan Meat Loaf Combine 1 lb. ground beef, 1 c. large curd cottage cheese, 1/2 c. oatmeal, 1 beaten egg, 1/4 c. catsup, 2 Tbsp. mustard, 2 tsp. chopped onion, 1 tsp. salt, and pepper to taste, pack lightly into an 8-inch square pan, bake at 350°F for 20 minutes, sprinkle with 1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese, bake 10 minutes longer, let stand 5 minutes, and cut into squares.
json: {"title": "Parmesan Meat Loaf", "ingredients": ["1 lb. ground beef", "1 c. large curd cottage cheese", "1/2 c. oatmeal", "1 egg, beaten", "1/4 c. catsup", "2 Tbsp. mustard", "2 tsp. chopped onion", "1 tsp. salt", "pepper to taste", "1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese"], "directions": ["Combine all ingredients except Parmesan cheese.", "Mix thoroughly.", "Pack lightly into an 8-inch square baking pan.", "Bake at 350° for 20 minutes. Sprinkle top with cheese.", "Bake 10 minutes longer.", "Let stand for 5 minutes. Cut into squares.", "Yields 6 servings."]}

text: Spinach Squares Combine 1 c. flour, 1 tsp. baking powder, 2 beaten eggs, 1 c. milk, and 1/4 c. melted butter or margarine, stir in 1/2 c. chopped onion, 1/2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese, and 1 (10 oz.) pkg. chopped spinach, pour into a greased 9 x 13-inch pan, bake at 350°F for 35 minutes, and cut into squares.
json: {"title": "Spinach Squares", "ingredients": ["1 c. all-purpose flour", "1 tsp. baking powder", "2 eggs, beaten", "1 c. milk", "1/4 c. melted butter or margarine", "1/2 c. chopped onion", "1/2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese", "1 (10 oz.) pkg. chopped spinach, thawed and drained"], "directions": ["In a large bowl, combine flour, salt and baking powder.", "Stir in beaten eggs, milk and butter.", "Add remaining ingredients and stir until moistened.", "Pour into lightly greased 9 x 13-inch pan. Bake at 350° for 35 minutes.", "Cut into 1-inch squares.", "Makes 2 dozen."]}

text: Sweet Baked Beans Mix 2 small cans pork and beans, 1 chopped small onion, 1 chopped large dill pickle, 1 c. sugar, 1/2 c. brown sugar, 1 Tbsp. ketchup, and 1 tsp. mustard, bake at 350°F for 20 minutes, and optionally top with bacon strips.
json: {"title": "Sweet Baked Beans", "ingredients": ["2 small cans pork and beans", "1 small onion, chopped", "1 large dill pickle, chopped", "1 c. sugar", "1/2 c. brown sugar", "1 Tbsp. ketchup", "1 tsp. mustard"], "directions": ["Mix altogether in a baking dish.", "Bake at 350° for 20 minutes. Spread bacon strips across (optional)."]}

text: Butterscotch Torte Mix 3 egg yolks with 1 c. sugar, 1 tsp. vanilla, 1 tsp. almond flavoring, and 1/2 tsp. baking powder, whip 3 egg whites until stiff and fold in, then fold in 1 c. graham cracker crumbs and 1/2 c. chopped nuts, pour into a greased 9 x 13-inch pan, bake at 325°F for 30 minutes, cool, and spread with 1/2 pt. whipped cream.
json: {"title": "Butterscotch Torte", "ingredients": ["3 egg yolks", "1 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. almond", "1/2 tsp. baking powder", "3 egg whites", "1 c. graham cracker crumbs", "1/2 c. chopped nuts", "1/2 pt. whipping cream"], "directions": ["Mix together egg yolks, sugar, vanilla, almond and baking powder.", "Set aside.", "Whip egg whites until very stiff and fold into yolk mixture.", "Also fold in graham cracker crumbs and nuts. Pour into greased 9 x 13-inch cake pan.", "Bake at 325° for 30 minutes.", "Cool.", "Whip the whipping cream and spread over cool cake."]}

text: Mexican Bean Salad Combine 2 cans Ranch Style red beans, 1 chopped tomato, 1 chopped onion, 3/4 lb. grated Cheddar cheese, and pepper to taste, then just before serving add 1 c. Catalina dressing and about 1/2 bag crushed Fritos.
json: {"title": "Mexican Bean Salad", "ingredients": ["2 cans Ranch Style red beans, washed and dried in colander", "1 tomato, chopped", "1 onion, chopped", "3/4 lb. grated cheese (Cheddar)", "pepper to taste"], "directions": ["At the last minute before serving, add 1 cup Catalina dressing and about 1/2 bag crushed Fritos."]}

text: Hungarian Goulash Cut 2 lb. beef into 1-inch pieces and brown in 4 Tbsp. fat, add 1 c. sliced onions and 1 minced garlic clove, lightly brown, mix 3/4 c. catsup, 3/8 c. Worcestershire sauce, 1 tsp. vinegar, 1 Tbsp. brown sugar, 2 1/2 tsp. paprika, 2 tsp. salt, 1 tsp. dry mustard, and a dash of red pepper, stir into meat, add 3 c. water, cover and simmer 2 to 2 1/2 hours, thicken with 2 Tbsp. flour mixed with 1/4 c. water, and serve over cooked noodles with parsley.
json: {"title": "Hungarian Goulash", "ingredients": ["2 lb. beef (chuck or rump)", "4 Tbsp. fat", "1 c. sliced onions", "1 small clove garlic, minced", "3/4 c. catsup", "3/8 c. Worcestershire sauce", "1 tsp. vinegar", "1 Tbsp. brown sugar", "2 1/2 tsp. paprika", "2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. dry mustard", "dash of red pepper", "3 c. water", "2 Tbsp. flour", "1/4 c. water", "parsley to taste", "cooked noodles"], "directions": ["Cut beef into 1-inch pieces and brown in hot fat.", "Add onion and garlic; brown lightly.", "Mix together catsup, Worcestershire sauce, vinegar, brown sugar, paprika, salt, mustard and pepper. Stir in with meat.", "Add 3 cups water; cover and simmer 2 to 2 1/2 hours.", "Thicken with mixture of 2 tablespoons flour and 1/4 cup water.", "Pour goulash over cooked noodles and garnish with parsley. Serves 8."]}

text: Broccoli Cornbread Mix 3/4 c. cottage cheese with 1 tsp. salt, add 4 eggs, then stir in chopped broccoli, finely chopped onion, 1 stick melted butter, and 1 box Jiffy corn muffin mix, beat until smooth, and bake at 400°F for 20 minutes or until golden.
json: {"title": "Broccoli Cornbread", "ingredients": ["1 box Jiffy corn muffin mix", "4 eggs", "3/4 c. cottage cheese", "1 small onion, finely chopped", "10 oz. broccoli, chopped", "1 stick melted butter", "1 tsp. salt"], "directions": ["Mix cottage cheese and salt.", "Add eggs.", "Mix broccoli, onion and butter.", "Then add cornmeal mix.", "Beat until smooth.", "Bake at 400° for 20 minutes or until golden brown."]}
